00113 enum
00114 {
00115       EX_NORTH                                                    = 0,
00116       EX_NORTHEAST                                          = 4,
00117       EX_EAST                                                           = 8,
00118       EX_SOUTHEAST                                          = 12,
00119       EX_SOUTH                                                    = 16,
00120       EX_SOUTHWEST                                          = 20,
00121       EX_WEST                                                           = 24,
00122       EX_NORTHWEST                                          = 28,
00123       EX_NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS       = 32,
00124       EX_DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT
00125 } ExtendedWorldDirections;

00319 void HandleVehicleMovementSound( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fOn )
00320 {
00321       VEHICLETYPE *pVehicle = &( pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ] );
00322 
00323       if ( fOn )
00324       {
00325             if ( pVehicle->iMovementSoundID == NO_SAMPLE )
00326             {
00327                   pVehicle->iMovementSoundID = PlayJA2Sample( pVehicle->iMoveSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );               
00328             }
00329       }
00330       else
00331       {
00332             if ( pVehicle->iMovementSoundID != NO_SAMPLE )
00333             {
00334                   SoundStop( pVehicle->iMovementSoundID );              
00335                   pVehicle->iMovementSoundID = NO_SAMPLE;
00336             }
00337       }
00338 }
00339 
00340 
00341 void AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fSet )
00342 {
00343   if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
00344   {
00345     return;
00346   }
00347 
00348       // Check if we are a vehicle first....
00349       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00350       {
00351             // Turn off sound effects....
00352             if ( fSet )
00353             {
00354                   HandleVehicleMovementSound( pSoldier, FALSE );
00355             }
00356       }
00357 
00358       // Turn off sound effects....
00359       if ( fSet )
00360       {
00361             // Position light....
00362             // SetCheckSoldierLightFlag( pSoldier );        
00363       }
00364       else
00365       {
00366             // DeleteSoldierLight( pSoldier );
00367       }
00368 
00369       pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove = fSet;
00370 
00371       if ( !fSet )
00372       {
00373             // return reason to default value
00374             pSoldier->ubReasonCantFinishMove = REASON_STOPPED_NO_APS;
00375       }
00376 }
00377 
00378 void HandleCrowShadowVisibility( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00379 {
00380       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
00381       {
00382             if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CROW_FLY ) 
00383             {
00384                   if ( pSoldier->pAniTile != NULL )
00385                   {
00386                         if ( pSoldier->bLastRenderVisibleValue != -1 )
00387                         {
00388                               HideAniTile( pSoldier->pAniTile, FALSE );
00389                         }
00390                         else
00391                         {
00392                               HideAniTile( pSoldier->pAniTile, TRUE );
00393                         }
00394                   }
00395             }
00396       }
00397 }
00398 
00399 void HandleCrowShadowNewGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00400 {
00401       ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
00402 
00403       memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
00404 
00405       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
00406       {
00407             if ( pSoldier->pAniTile != NULL )
00408             {
00409                   DeleteAniTile( pSoldier->pAniTile );
00410                   pSoldier->pAniTile = NULL;
00411             }
00412 
00413             if ( pSoldier->sGridNo != NOWHERE )
00414             {
00415                   if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CROW_FLY ) 
00416                   {
00417                         AniParams.sGridNo                                     = (INT16)pSoldier->sGridNo;
00418                         AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_SHADOW_LEVEL;
00419                         AniParams.sDelay                                      = pSoldier->sAniDelay;
00420                         AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
00421                         AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_LOOPING | ANITILE_USE_DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME;
00422                         AniParams.sX                                                      = pSoldier->sX;
00423                         AniParams.sY                                                      = pSoldier->sY;
00424                         AniParams.sZ                                                      = 0;
00425                         strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\FLY_SHDW.STI" );
00426 
00427                         AniParams.uiUserData3                           = pSoldier->bDirection;
00428 
00429                         pSoldier->pAniTile = CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
00430 
00431                         HandleCrowShadowVisibility( pSoldier );
00432                   }
00433             }
00434       }
00435 }
00436 
00437 
00438 void HandleCrowShadowRemoveGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00439 {
00440       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
00441       {
00442             if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CROW_FLY ) 
00443             {
00444                   if ( pSoldier->pAniTile != NULL )
00445                   {
00446                         DeleteAniTile( pSoldier->pAniTile );
00447                         pSoldier->pAniTile = NULL;
00448                   }
00449             }
00450       }
00451 }
00452 
00453 
00454 void HandleCrowShadowNewDirection( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00455 {
00456       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
00457       {
00458             if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CROW_FLY ) 
00459             {
00460                   if ( pSoldier->pAniTile != NULL )
00461                   {
00462                         pSoldier->pAniTile->uiUserData3     = pSoldier->bDirection;
00463                   }
00464             }
00465       }
00466 }
00467 
00468 void HandleCrowShadowNewPosition( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00469 {
00470       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
00471       {
00472             if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CROW_FLY ) 
00473             {
00474                   if ( pSoldier->pAniTile != NULL )
00475                   {
00476                         pSoldier->pAniTile->sRelativeX      = pSoldier->sX;
00477                         pSoldier->pAniTile->sRelativeY      = pSoldier->sY;
00478                   }
00479             }
00480       }
00481 }
00482 
00483 
00484 
00485 INT8 CalcActionPoints(SOLDIERTYPE *pSold)
00486 {
00487   UINT8 ubPoints,ubMaxAPs;
00488       INT8  bBandage;
00489 
00490   // dead guys don't get any APs (they shouldn't be here asking for them!)
00491   if (!pSold->bLife)
00492     return(0);
00493 
00494       // people with sleep dart drug who have collapsed get no APs
00495       if ( (pSold->bSleepDrugCounter > 0) && pSold->bCollapsed )
00496             return( 0 );
00497 
00498   // Calculate merc's action points at 100% capability (range is 10 - 25)
00499   // round fractions of .5 up (that's why the +20 before the division!
00500       ubPoints = 5 + (((10 * EffectiveExpLevel( pSold ) +
00501                      3 * EffectiveAgility( pSold )   +
00502                                                              2 * pSold->bLifeMax   +
00503                                                              2 * EffectiveDexterity( pSold ) ) + 20) / 40);
00504 
00505   //if (GameOption[INCREASEDAP] % 2 == 1)
00506     //points += AP_INCREASE;
00507 
00508       //Madd: Add in AP Bonuses (Penalties) from worn gear
00509       ubPoints += GetGearAPBonus ( pSold );
00510 
00511       // Calculate bandage
00512       bBandage = pSold->bLifeMax - pSold->bLife - pSold->bBleeding;
00513 
00514   // If injured, reduce action points accordingly (by up to 2/3rds)
00515   if (pSold->bLife < pSold->bLifeMax)
00516   {
00517     ubPoints -= (2 * ubPoints * (pSold->bLifeMax - pSold->bLife + (bBandage / 2))) /
00518               (3 * pSold->bLifeMax);
00519    }
00520 
00521   // If tired, reduce action points accordingly (by up to 1/2)
00522   if (pSold->bBreath < 100)
00523     ubPoints -= (ubPoints * (100 - pSold->bBreath)) / 200;
00524 
00525       if (pSold->sWeightCarriedAtTurnStart > 100)
00526       {
00527             ubPoints = (UINT8) ( ((UINT32)ubPoints) * 100 / pSold->sWeightCarriedAtTurnStart );
00528       }
00529 
00530   // If resulting APs are below our permitted minimum, raise them to it!
00531   if (ubPoints < AP_MINIMUM)
00532             ubPoints = AP_MINIMUM;
00533 
00534   // make sure action points doesn't exceed the permitted maximum
00535   ubMaxAPs = gubMaxActionPoints[ pSold->ubBodyType ]; 
00536 
00537   //if (GameOption[INCREASEDAP] % 2 == 1)
00538     // maxAPs += AP_INCREASE;
00539 
00540 
00541   // If resulting APs are below our permitted minimum, raise them to it!
00542   if (ubPoints > ubMaxAPs)
00543      ubPoints = ubMaxAPs;
00544 
00545       if ( pSold->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
00546       {
00547             // use same as young monsters
00548             ubPoints = (ubPoints * AP_YOUNG_MONST_FACTOR) / 10;
00549       }
00550       else if (pSold->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER)
00551       {
00552             // young monsters get extra APs
00553             if ( pSold->ubBodyType == YAF_MONSTER || pSold->ubBodyType == YAM_MONSTER || pSold->ubBodyType == INFANT_MONSTER )
00554             {
00555                   ubPoints = (ubPoints * AP_YOUNG_MONST_FACTOR) / 10;
00556             }
00557 
00558             // if frenzied, female monsters get more APs! (for young females, cumulative!)
00559             if (pSold->bFrenzied)
00560             {
00561 
00562                   ubPoints = (ubPoints * AP_MONST_FRENZY_FACTOR) / 10;
00563             }
00564       }
00565 
00566       // adjust APs for phobia situations
00567       if ( pSold->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
00568       {
00569             if ( (gMercProfiles[ pSold->ubProfile ].bPersonalityTrait == CLAUSTROPHOBIC) && (gbWorldSectorZ > 0) )
00570             {
00571                   ubPoints = (ubPoints * AP_CLAUSTROPHOBE) / 10;
00572             }
00573             else if ( (gMercProfiles[ pSold->ubProfile ].bPersonalityTrait == FEAR_OF_INSECTS) && (MercSeesCreature( pSold ) ) )
00574             {
00575                   ubPoints = (ubPoints * AP_AFRAID_OF_INSECTS) / 10;
00576             }
00577       }
00578 
00579       // Adjusat APs due to drugs...
00580       HandleAPEffectDueToDrugs( pSold, &ubPoints );
00581 
00582       // If we are a vehicle, adjust APS...
00583       if ( pSold->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00584       {
00585             AdjustVehicleAPs( pSold, &ubPoints );
00586       }
00587 
00588 //Madd
00589 //    if ( pSold->bTeam != CIV_TEAM && pSold->bTeam != gbPlayerNum && gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel == DIF_LEVEL_INSANE )
00590 //          ubPoints += 5; // everything and everyone moves a little faster against you on insane...
00591 
00592 
00593       //Kaiden: Took your idea a step further adding the bonus for each difficulty level
00594       // and then externalized it. AND added it to the Dont max out points section below.
00595             if ( pSold->bTeam != CIV_TEAM && pSold->bTeam != gbPlayerNum)
00596             {
00597 
00598                   switch( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel )
00599                   {
00600                         case DIF_LEVEL_EASY:
00601 
00602                               ubPoints += gGameExternalOptions.iEasyAPBonus;
00603                               break;
00604 
00605                         case DIF_LEVEL_MEDIUM:
00606 
00607                               ubPoints += gGameExternalOptions.iExperiencedAPBonus;
00608                               break;
00609 
00610                         case DIF_LEVEL_HARD:
00611 
00612                               ubPoints += gGameExternalOptions.iExpertAPBonus;
00613                               break;
00614 
00615                         case DIF_LEVEL_INSANE:
00616 
00617                               ubPoints += gGameExternalOptions.iInsaneAPBonus; 
00618                               break;
00619 
00620                         default:
00621                               ubPoints +=0;
00622                   }
00623             }
00624 
00625       // if we are in boxing mode, adjust APs... THIS MUST BE LAST!
00626       if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING || gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == PRE_BOXING )
00627       {
00628             ubPoints /= 2;
00629       }
00630 
00631   return (ubPoints);
00632 }
00633 
00634 void CalcNewActionPoints( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00635 {
00636       if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING || gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == PRE_BOXING )
00637       {
00638             // if we are in boxing mode, carry 1/2 as many points
00639             if (pSoldier->bActionPoints > MAX_AP_CARRIED / 2)
00640             {
00641                   pSoldier->bActionPoints = MAX_AP_CARRIED / 2;
00642             }
00643       }
00644       else
00645       {
00646             if (pSoldier->bActionPoints > MAX_AP_CARRIED)
00647             {
00648                   pSoldier->bActionPoints = MAX_AP_CARRIED;
00649             }
00650       }
00651 
00652       pSoldier->bActionPoints                         += CalcActionPoints( pSoldier);
00653 
00654       // Don't max out if we are drugged....
00655       if ( !GetDrugEffect( pSoldier, DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ) )
00656       {  //Kaiden: If Enemy, they can max out, but their Max is NOW = MAX + diffAPBonus
00657              // No sense in giving them a bonus if some of the points are wasted because we
00658              // Didn't raise their cap by the same amount.
00659             if ( pSoldier->bTeam != CIV_TEAM && pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum)
00660             {
00661                   switch( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel )
00662                   {
00663                         case DIF_LEVEL_EASY:
00664 
00665                               pSoldier->bActionPoints = __min( pSoldier->bActionPoints, (gubMaxActionPoints[ pSoldier->ubBodyType ] + gGameExternalOptions.iEasyAPBonus)); 
00666                               break;
00667 
00668                         case DIF_LEVEL_MEDIUM:
00669 
00670                               pSoldier->bActionPoints = __min( pSoldier->bActionPoints, (gubMaxActionPoints[ pSoldier->ubBodyType ] + gGameExternalOptions.iExperiencedAPBonus));
00671                               break;
00672 
00673                         case DIF_LEVEL_HARD:
00674 
00675                               pSoldier->bActionPoints = __min( pSoldier->bActionPoints, (gubMaxActionPoints[ pSoldier->ubBodyType ] + gGameExternalOptions.iExpertAPBonus));
00676                               break;
00677 
00678                         case DIF_LEVEL_INSANE:
00679 
00680                               pSoldier->bActionPoints = __min( pSoldier->bActionPoints, (gubMaxActionPoints[ pSoldier->ubBodyType ] + gGameExternalOptions.iInsaneAPBonus)); 
00681                               break;
00682 
00683                         default:
00684             pSoldier->bActionPoints                         = __min( pSoldier->bActionPoints, gubMaxActionPoints[ pSoldier->ubBodyType ] );
00685                   }
00686 
00687             }
00688             else
00689             { //Kaiden: Players just max out normally unless drugged
00690                   pSoldier->bActionPoints = __min( pSoldier->bActionPoints, gubMaxActionPoints[ pSoldier->ubBodyType ] );
00691             }
00692 
00693       }
00694 
00695       pSoldier->bInitialActionPoints      = pSoldier->bActionPoints;
00696 }
00697 
00698 
00699 void  DoNinjaAttack( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00700 {
00701       //UINT32                                  uiMercFlags;
00702       UINT16                                    usSoldierIndex;
00703       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pTSoldier;
00704       UINT8                                     ubTDirection;
00705       UINT8                                     ubTargetStance;
00706 
00707 
00708       usSoldierIndex = WhoIsThere2( pSoldier->sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
00709       if ( usSoldierIndex != NOBODY )
00710       {     
00711             GetSoldier( &pTSoldier, usSoldierIndex );       
00712 
00713             // Look at stance of target
00714             ubTargetStance = gAnimControl[ pTSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight;
00715 
00716             // Get his life...if < certain value, do finish!
00717             if ( (pTSoldier->bLife <= 30 || pTSoldier->bBreath <= 30) && ubTargetStance != ANIM_PRONE )
00718             {
00719                   // Do finish!
00720                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, NINJA_SPINKICK, 0 , FALSE );
00721             }
00722             else
00723             {
00724                   if ( ubTargetStance != ANIM_PRONE )
00725                   {
00726                         if ( Random( 2 ) == 0 )
00727                         {
00728                               ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, NINJA_LOWKICK, 0 , FALSE );
00729                         }
00730                         else
00731                         {
00732                               ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, NINJA_PUNCH, 0 , FALSE );
00733                         }
00734 
00735                         // CHECK IF HE CAN SEE US, IF SO CHANGE DIRECTION
00736                         if ( pTSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == 0 && pTSoldier->bTeam != pSoldier->bTeam )
00737                         {
00738                               if ( !( pTSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_MONSTER | SOLDIER_ANIMAL | SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ) )
00739                               {
00740                                     ubTDirection = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, pTSoldier );
00741                                     SendSoldierSetDesiredDirectionEvent( pTSoldier, ubTDirection );
00742                               }
00743                         }
00744                   }
00745                   else
00746                   {
00747                         // CHECK OUR STANCE
00748                         if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_CROUCH )
00749                         {
00750                               // SET DESIRED STANCE AND SET PENDING ANIMATION
00751                               SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
00752                               pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = PUNCH_LOW;
00753                         }
00754                         else
00755                         {
00756                               // USE crouched one
00757                               // NEED TO CHANGE STANCE IF NOT CROUCHD!
00758                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, PUNCH_LOW, 0 , FALSE );
00759                         }
00760                   }
00761             }
00762       }
00763 
00764       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == 33 )
00765       {
00766             UINT32 uiSoundID;
00767             SOUNDPARMS        spParms;
00768             INT32       iFaceIndex;
00769 
00770             // Play sound!
00771             memset(&spParms, 0xff, sizeof(SOUNDPARMS));
00772 
00773             spParms.uiSpeed = RATE_11025;
00774             spParms.uiVolume = (INT8)CalculateSpeechVolume( HIGHVOLUME );
00775 
00776             // If we are an enemy.....reduce due to volume
00777             if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
00778             {
00779                   spParms.uiVolume = SoundVolume( (UINT8)spParms.uiVolume, pSoldier->sGridNo );
00780             }
00781             spParms.uiLoop = 1;
00782             spParms.uiPan = SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo );
00783             spParms.uiPriority=GROUP_PLAYER;
00784 
00785             if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == NINJA_SPINKICK )
00786             {
00787                   uiSoundID = SoundPlay( "BATTLESNDS\\033_CHOP2.WAV", &spParms );
00788             }
00789             else
00790             {
00791                   if ( Random( 2 ) == 0 )
00792                   {
00793                         uiSoundID = SoundPlay( "BATTLESNDS\\033_CHOP3.WAV", &spParms );
00794                   }
00795                   else
00796                   {
00797                         uiSoundID = SoundPlay( "BATTLESNDS\\033_CHOP1.WAV", &spParms );
00798                   }
00799             }
00800 
00801 
00802             if ( uiSoundID != SOUND_ERROR )
00803             {
00804                   pSoldier->uiBattleSoundID = uiSoundID;
00805 
00806                   if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
00807                   {
00808                         // Get soldier's face ID
00809                         iFaceIndex = pSoldier->iFaceIndex;
00810 
00811                         // Check face index
00812                         if ( iFaceIndex != -1 )
00813                         {
00814                               ExternSetFaceTalking( iFaceIndex, uiSoundID );
00815                         }
00816                   }
00817             }
00818       }
00819 
00820 }
00821 
00822 
00823 BOOLEAN CreateSoldierCommon( UINT8 ubBodyType, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usSoldierID, UINT16 usState )
00824 {
00825       BOOLEAN fSuccess = FALSE;
00826       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00827 
00828       //if we are loading a saved game, we DO NOT want to reset the opplist, look for enemies, or say a dying commnet
00829       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
00830       {
00831             // Set initial values for opplist!
00832             InitSoldierOppList( pSoldier );
00833             HandleSight( pSoldier, SIGHT_LOOK );  
00834 
00835             // Set some quote flags
00836             if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
00837             {
00838                   pSoldier->fDyingComment = FALSE;
00839             }
00840             else
00841             {
00842                   pSoldier->fDyingComment = TRUE;
00843             }
00844       }
00845 
00846       // ATE: Reset some timer flags...
00847       pSoldier->uiTimeSameBattleSndDone = 0;
00848       // ATE: Reset every time.....
00849       pSoldier->fSoldierWasMoving                     = TRUE;
00850   pSoldier->iTuringSoundID          = NO_SAMPLE;
00851   pSoldier->uiTimeSinceLastBleedGrunt = 0;
00852 
00853   if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER )
00854   {
00855     pSoldier->iPositionSndID = NewPositionSnd( NOWHERE, POSITION_SOUND_FROM_SOLDIER, (UINT32)pSoldier, QUEEN_AMBIENT_NOISE );
00856   }
00857 
00858 
00859       // ANYTHING AFTER HERE CAN FAIL
00860       do
00861       {
00862 
00863             if (usSoldierID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID)
00864             {
00865                   pSoldier->pKeyRing = (KEY_ON_RING *) MemAlloc( NUM_KEYS * sizeof( KEY_ON_RING ) );
00866                   memset(  pSoldier->pKeyRing , 0, NUM_KEYS * sizeof( KEY_ON_RING ) );
00867 
00868                   for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUM_KEYS; iCounter++ )
00869                   {
00870                         pSoldier->pKeyRing[ iCounter ].ubKeyID = INVALID_KEY_NUMBER;
00871                   }
00872             }
00873             else
00874             {
00875                   pSoldier->pKeyRing = NULL;
00876             }
00877             // Create frame cache
00878             if( InitAnimationCache( usSoldierID, &( pSoldier->AnimCache) ) == FALSE )
00879             {
00880                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Soldier: Failed animation cache creation" ) );
00881                   break;
00882             }
00883 
00884             if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
00885             {
00886                   // Init new soldier state
00887                   // OFFSET FIRST ANIMATION FRAME FOR NEW MERCS
00888                   if ( usState != STANDING )
00889                   {
00890                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usState, (UINT8)0, TRUE );
00891                   }
00892                   else
00893                   {
00894                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usState, (UINT8)Random( 10 ), TRUE );
00895                   }
00896             }
00897             else
00898             {
00899                   /// if we don't have a world loaded, and are in a bad anim, goto standing.
00900                   // bad anims are: HOPFENCE, 
00901                   // CLIMBDOWNROOF, FALLFORWARD_ROOF,FALLOFF, CLIMBUPROOF
00902                   if( !gfWorldLoaded &&
00903                               ( usState == HOPFENCE ||
00904                                     usState == CLIMBDOWNROOF ||
00905                                     usState == FALLFORWARD_ROOF ||
00906                                     usState == FALLOFF ||
00907                                     usState == CLIMBUPROOF ) )
00908                   {
00909                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STANDING, 0, TRUE );
00910                   }
00911                   else
00912                   {
00913                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usState, pSoldier->usAniCode, TRUE );
00914                   }
00915 
00916             }
00917 
00918 
00919             //if ( pSoldier->pBackGround != NULL )
00920             //    MemFree( pSoldier->pBackGround );
00921 
00922             // INIT ANIMATION DATA
00923             //if((pSoldier->pBackGround=MemAlloc(SOLDIER_UNBLIT_SIZE))==NULL)
00924             //{
00925             //    DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Soldier: Failed unblit memory allocation" ) );
00926             //    break;
00927             //}
00928             //memset(pSoldier->pBackGround, 0, SOLDIER_UNBLIT_SIZE);
00929 
00930             //if((pSoldier->pZBackground=MemAlloc(SOLDIER_UNBLIT_SIZE))==NULL)
00931             //{
00932             //    DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Soldier: Failed unblit memory allocation" ) );
00933             //    break;
00934             //}
00935             //memset(pSoldier->pZBackground, 0, SOLDIER_UNBLIT_SIZE);
00936 
00937             // Init palettes
00938             if( CreateSoldierPalettes( pSoldier ) == FALSE )
00939             {
00940                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Soldier: Failed in creating soldier palettes" ) );
00941                   break;
00942             }
00943             
00944             fSuccess = TRUE;
00945 
00946       } while( FALSE );
00947 
00948       if ( !fSuccess )
00949       {
00950             DeleteSoldier( (pSoldier ) );
00951       }
00952 
00953       return( fSuccess );
00954 
00955 }
00956 
00957 
00958 
00959 BOOLEAN DeleteSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00960 {
00961       UINT32            cnt;
00962       INT32             iGridNo;
00963       INT8              bDir;
00964       BOOLEAN           fRet;
00965 
00966       if ( pSoldier != NULL )
00967       {
00968             //if(pSoldier->pBackGround!=NULL)
00969                   //MemFree(pSoldier->pBackGround);
00970 
00971             //if(pSoldier->pZBackground!=NULL)
00972                   //MemFree(pSoldier->pZBackground);
00973 
00974             if( pSoldier->sGridNo != NOWHERE )
00975             {
00976                   // Remove adjacency records
00977                   for (bDir = 0; bDir < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; bDir++)
00978                   {
00979                         iGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo + DirIncrementer[ bDir ];
00980                         if( iGridNo >= 0 && iGridNo < WORLD_MAX )
00981                         {
00982                               gpWorldLevelData[ iGridNo ].ubAdjacentSoldierCnt--;
00983                         }
00984                   }
00985             }
00986             
00987             // Delete key ring
00988             if (pSoldier->pKeyRing)
00989             {
00990                   MemFree( pSoldier->pKeyRing );
00991                   pSoldier->pKeyRing = NULL;
00992             }
00993 
00994             // Delete faces
00995             DeleteSoldierFace( pSoldier );
00996 
00997             // FREE PALETTES
00998             if ( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette != NULL )
00999             {
01000                   MemFree( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette );
01001                   pSoldier->p8BPPPalette = NULL;
01002             }
01003 
01004             if ( pSoldier->p16BPPPalette != NULL )
01005             {
01006                   MemFree( pSoldier->p16BPPPalette );
01007                   pSoldier->p16BPPPalette = NULL;
01008             }
01009 
01010             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_SOLDIER_SHADES; cnt++ )
01011             {
01012                   if ( pSoldier->pShades[ cnt ] != NULL )
01013                   {
01014                         MemFree( pSoldier->pShades[ cnt ] );
01015                         pSoldier->pShades[ cnt ] = NULL;
01016                   }
01017             }
01018             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_SOLDIER_EFFECTSHADES; cnt++ )
01019             {
01020                   if ( pSoldier->pEffectShades[ cnt ] != NULL )
01021                   {
01022                         MemFree( pSoldier->pEffectShades[ cnt ] );
01023                         pSoldier->pEffectShades[ cnt ] = NULL;
01024                   }
01025             }
01026 
01027             // Delete glows
01028             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 20; cnt++ )
01029             {
01030                   if ( pSoldier->pGlowShades[ cnt ] != NULL )
01031                   {
01032                         MemFree( pSoldier->pGlowShades[ cnt ] );
01033                         pSoldier->pGlowShades[ cnt ] = NULL;
01034                   }
01035 
01036             }
01037 
01038 
01039     if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER )
01040     {
01041       DeletePositionSnd( pSoldier->iPositionSndID );
01042     }
01043 
01044             // Free any animations we may have locked...
01045             UnLoadCachedAnimationSurfaces( pSoldier->ubID, &( pSoldier->AnimCache) );
01046 
01047             // Free Animation cache
01048             DeleteAnimationCache( pSoldier->ubID, &( pSoldier->AnimCache) );
01049 
01050             // Soldier is not active
01051             pSoldier->bActive = FALSE;
01052 
01053             // Remove light
01054             DeleteSoldierLight( pSoldier );
01055 
01056             // Remove reseved movement value
01057             UnMarkMovementReserved( pSoldier );
01058       
01059       }
01060 
01061       // REMOVE SOLDIER FROM SLOT!
01062       fRet = RemoveMercSlot( pSoldier );
01063       
01064       if (!fRet)
01065       {
01066             RemoveAwaySlot( pSoldier );
01067       }
01068 
01069       return( TRUE );
01070 }
01071 
01072 BOOLEAN CreateSoldierLight( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01073 {
01074       if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01075       {
01076             return( FALSE );
01077       }
01078 
01079       // DO ONLY IF WE'RE AT A GOOD LEVEL
01080       if ( pSoldier->iLight == -1 )
01081       {
01082             // ATE: Check for goggles in headpos....
01083             if ( GetTotalVisionRangeBonus( pSoldier, NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT ) >= UVGOGGLES_BONUS )         
01084             {
01085                   if( ( pSoldier->iLight=LightSpriteCreate("Light4", 0 ) )==(-1))
01086                   {
01087                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Soldier: Failed loading light" ) );
01088                         return( FALSE );
01089                   }
01090                   else
01091                   {
01092                         LightSprites[ pSoldier->iLight ].uiFlags |= MERC_LIGHT;
01093                   }
01094             }
01095             else if ( GetTotalVisionRangeBonus( pSoldier, NORMAL_LIGHTLEVEL_NIGHT ) >= NIGHTSIGHTGOGGLES_BONUS )        
01096             {
01097                   if( ( pSoldier->iLight=LightSpriteCreate("Light3", 0 ) )==(-1))
01098                   {
01099                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Soldier: Failed loading light" ) );
01100                         return( FALSE );
01101                   }
01102                   else
01103                   {
01104                         LightSprites[ pSoldier->iLight ].uiFlags |= MERC_LIGHT;
01105                   }
01106             }
01107             else
01108             {
01109                   if( ( pSoldier->iLight=LightSpriteCreate("Light2", 0 ) )==(-1))
01110                   {
01111                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Soldier: Failed loading light" ) );
01112                         return( FALSE );
01113                   }
01114                   else
01115                   {
01116                         LightSprites[ pSoldier->iLight ].uiFlags |= MERC_LIGHT;
01117                   }
01118             }
01119 
01120     if ( pSoldier->bLevel != 0 )
01121     {
01122               LightSpriteRoofStatus(pSoldier->iLight, TRUE );
01123     }
01124       }
01125 
01126       return( TRUE );
01127 }
01128 
01129 BOOLEAN ReCreateSoldierLight( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01130 {
01131       if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01132       {
01133             return( FALSE );
01134       }
01135 
01136       if ( !pSoldier->bActive ) 
01137       {
01138             return( FALSE );
01139       }
01140 
01141       if ( !pSoldier->bInSector )
01142       {
01143             return( FALSE );
01144       }
01145 
01146       // Delete Light!
01147       DeleteSoldierLight( pSoldier );
01148 
01149       if ( pSoldier->iLight == -1 )
01150       {
01151             CreateSoldierLight( pSoldier );
01152       }
01153 
01154       return( TRUE );
01155 }
01156 
01157 
01158 BOOLEAN ReCreateSelectedSoldierLight(  )
01159 {
01160       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01161 
01162       if ( gusSelectedSoldier == NO_SOLDIER )
01163       {
01164             return( FALSE );
01165       }
01166 
01167       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ];
01168 
01169       return( ReCreateSoldierLight( pSoldier ) );
01170 }
01171 
01172 
01173 BOOLEAN DeleteSoldierLight( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01174 {
01175       if( pSoldier->iLight!=(-1) )
01176       {
01177             LightSpriteDestroy( pSoldier->iLight );   
01178             pSoldier->iLight = -1;
01179       }
01180 
01181       return( TRUE );
01182 }
01183 
01184 // FUNCTIONS CALLED BY EVENT PUMP
01185 /////////////////////////////////
01186 
01187 BOOLEAN ChangeSoldierState( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usNewState, UINT16 usStartingAniCode, BOOLEAN fForce )
01188 {
01189       EV_S_CHANGESTATE  SChangeState;
01190 
01191       // Send message that we have changed states
01192       SChangeState.usNewState                    = usNewState;
01193       SChangeState.usSoldierID                   = pSoldier->ubID;
01194       SChangeState.uiUniqueId                    = pSoldier -> uiUniqueSoldierIdValue;
01195       SChangeState.usStartingAniCode = usStartingAniCode;
01196       SChangeState.sXPos                                     = pSoldier->sX;
01197       SChangeState.sYPos                                     = pSoldier->sY;
01198       SChangeState.fForce                                    = fForce;
01199       SChangeState.uiUniqueId                    = pSoldier -> uiUniqueSoldierIdValue;
01200 
01201       //AddGameEvent( S_CHANGESTATE, 0, &SChangeState );
01202       EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, SChangeState.usNewState, SChangeState.usStartingAniCode, SChangeState.fForce );
01203 
01204 
01205       return( TRUE );
01206 }
01207 
01208 
01209 // This function reevaluates the stance if the guy sees us!
01210 BOOLEAN ReevaluateEnemyStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usAnimState )
01211 {
01212       INT32       cnt, iClosestEnemy = NOBODY;
01213       INT16       sTargetXPos, sTargetYPos;
01214       BOOLEAN     fReturnVal = FALSE;
01215       INT16       sDist, sClosestDist = 10000;
01216 
01217       // make the chosen one not turn to face us
01218       if ( OK_ENEMY_MERC( pSoldier ) && pSoldier->ubID != gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne && gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_UNDERAICONTROL) ) 
01219       {
01220             if ( pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition == TURNING_FROM_PRONE_OFF )
01221             {
01222                   // If we are a queen and see enemies, goto ready
01223                   if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER )
01224                   {
01225                         if ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].uiFlags & ( ANIM_BREATH ) )
01226                         {
01227                               if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 )
01228                               {
01229                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, QUEEN_INTO_READY, 0 , TRUE );
01230                                     return( TRUE );
01231                               }
01232                         }
01233                   }
01234 
01235                   // ATE: Don't do this if we're not a merc.....
01236                   if ( !IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( pSoldier ) )
01237                   {
01238                         return( FALSE );
01239                   }
01240             
01241                   if ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].uiFlags & ( ANIM_MERCIDLE | ANIM_BREATH ) )
01242                   {
01243                         if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 )
01244                         {
01245                               // Pick a guy this buddy sees and turn towards them!
01246                               for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++ )
01247                               {
01248                                     if ( pSoldier->bOppList[ cnt ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
01249                                     {
01250                                           sDist = PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, MercPtrs[ cnt ]->sGridNo );
01251                                           if (sDist < sClosestDist)
01252                                           {
01253                                                 sClosestDist = sDist;
01254                                                 iClosestEnemy = cnt;
01255                                           }
01256                                     }
01257                               }
01258 
01259                               if (iClosestEnemy != NOBODY)
01260                               {
01261                                     // Change to fire ready animation
01262                                     ConvertGridNoToXY( MercPtrs[ iClosestEnemy ]->sGridNo, &sTargetXPos, &sTargetYPos );
01263 
01264                                     pSoldier->fDontChargeReadyAPs = TRUE;
01265 
01266                                     // Ready weapon
01267                                     fReturnVal = SoldierReadyWeapon( pSoldier, sTargetXPos, sTargetYPos, FALSE );
01268 
01269                                     return( fReturnVal );
01270                               }
01271                               
01272                         }
01273                   }
01274             }
01275       }
01276       return( FALSE );
01277 
01278 }
01279 
01280  
01281 void CheckForFreeupFromHit( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT32 uiOldAnimFlags, UINT32 uiNewAnimFlags, UINT16 usOldAniState, UINT16 usNewState )
01282 {
01283       // THIS COULD POTENTIALLY CALL EVENT_INITNEWAnim() if the GUY was SUPPRESSED
01284       // CHECK IF THE OLD ANIMATION WAS A HIT START THAT WAS NOT FOLLOWED BY A HIT FINISH
01285       // IF SO, RELEASE ATTACKER FROM ATTACKING
01286 
01287   // If old and new animations are the same, do nothing!
01288   if ( usOldAniState == QUEEN_HIT && usNewState == QUEEN_HIT )
01289   {
01290     return;
01291   }
01292 
01293       if ( usOldAniState != usNewState && ( uiOldAnimFlags & ANIM_HITSTART ) && !( uiNewAnimFlags & ANIM_HITFINISH ) && !( uiNewAnimFlags & ANIM_IGNOREHITFINISH ) && !(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_TURNINGFROMHIT ) )
01294       {
01295             // Release attacker
01296             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Releasesoldierattacker, normal hit animation ended NEW: %s ( %d ) OLD: %s ( %d )", gAnimControl[ usNewState ].zAnimStr, usNewState, gAnimControl[ usOldAniState ].zAnimStr, pSoldier->usOldAniState ) );
01297             ReleaseSoldiersAttacker( pSoldier );
01298 
01299             //FREEUP GETTING HIT FLAG
01300             pSoldier->fGettingHit = FALSE;
01301 
01302             // ATE: if our guy, have 10% change of say damn, if still conscious...
01303             if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
01304             {
01305                   if ( Random( 10 ) == 0 )
01306                   {
01307                         DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 ) );
01308                   }
01309             }
01310       }
01311 
01312       // CHECK IF WE HAVE FINSIHED A HIT WHILE DOWN
01313       // OBLY DO THIS IF 1 ) We are dead already or 2 ) We are alive still
01314       if ( ( uiOldAnimFlags & ANIM_HITWHENDOWN ) && ( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) || pSoldier->bLife != 0 ) )
01315       {
01316             // Release attacker
01317             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Releasesoldierattacker, animation of kill on the ground ended") );
01318             ReleaseSoldiersAttacker( pSoldier );
01319 
01320             //FREEUP GETTING HIT FLAG
01321             pSoldier->fGettingHit = FALSE;
01322 
01323             if ( pSoldier->bLife == 0 )
01324             {
01325                   //ATE: Set previous attacker's value!
01326                   // This is so that the killer can say their killed quote....
01327                   pSoldier->ubAttackerID = pSoldier->ubPreviousAttackerID;
01328             }
01329       }
01330 }
01331 
01332 
01333 // THIS IS CALLED FROM AN EVENT ( S_CHANGESTATE )!
01334 BOOLEAN EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usNewState, UINT16 usStartingAniCode, BOOLEAN fForce )
01335 {
01336       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim");
01337       UINT16  usNewGridNo = 0;
01338       INT16       sAPCost = 0;
01339       INT16       sBPCost = 0;
01340       UINT32      uiOldAnimFlags;
01341       UINT32  uiNewAnimFlags;
01342       UINT16      usSubState;
01343       UINT16      usItem;
01344       BOOLEAN     fTryingToRestart = FALSE;
01345 
01346       CHECKF( usNewState < NUMANIMATIONSTATES );
01347 
01348       ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01349       //                DO SOME CHECKS ON OUR NEW ANIMATION!
01350       /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01351 
01352       // If we are NOT loading a game, continue normally
01353       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01354       {
01355             // CHECK IF WE ARE TRYING TO INTURRUPT A SCRIPT WHICH WE DO NOT WANT INTERRUPTED!
01356             if ( pSoldier->fInNonintAnim )
01357             {
01358                   return( FALSE );
01359             }
01360 
01361             if ( pSoldier->fRTInNonintAnim )
01362             {
01363       if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
01364       {
01365                     return( FALSE );
01366       }
01367       else
01368       {
01369         pSoldier->fRTInNonintAnim = FALSE;
01370       }
01371             }
01372 
01373 
01374             // Check if we can restart this animation if it's the same as our current!
01375             if ( usNewState == pSoldier->usAnimState )
01376             {
01377                   if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_NORESTART ) && !fForce )
01378                   {     
01379                         fTryingToRestart = TRUE;
01380                   }     
01381             }
01382 
01383             // Check state, if we are not at the same height, set this ani as the pending one and
01384             // change stance accordingly
01385             // ATE: ONLY IF WE ARE STARTING AT START OF ANIMATION!
01386             if ( usStartingAniCode == 0 )
01387             {
01388                   if ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].ubHeight != gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight && 
01389                                !( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ( ANIM_STANCECHANGEANIM | ANIM_IGNORE_AUTOSTANCE ) ) )
01390                   {
01391 
01392                         // Check if we are going from crouched height to prone height, and adjust fast turning accordingly
01393                         // Make guy turn while crouched THEN go into prone
01394                         if ( ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_PRONE && gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_CROUCH ) && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01395                         {
01396                               pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone = TRUE;
01397                               pSoldier->ubPendingStanceChange = gAnimControl[ usNewState ].ubEndHeight;
01398                               pSoldier->usPendingAnimation        = usNewState;
01399                               return( TRUE );
01400                         }
01401                         // Check if we are in realtime and we are going from stand to crouch
01402                         else if ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_CROUCH && gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND && ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) && ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
01403                         {
01404                               pSoldier->ubDesiredHeight = gAnimControl[ usNewState ].ubEndHeight;
01405                               // Continue with this course of action IE: Do animation and skip from stand to crouch
01406                         }
01407                         // Check if we are in realtime and we are going from crouch to stand
01408                         else if ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND && gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_CROUCH && ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) && ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) && pSoldier->usAnimState != HELIDROP )
01409                         {
01410                               pSoldier->ubDesiredHeight = gAnimControl[ usNewState ].ubEndHeight;
01411                               // Continue with this course of action IE: Do animation and skip from stand to crouch
01412                         }
01413                         else
01414                         {
01415                               // ONLY DO FOR EVERYONE BUT PLANNING GUYS
01416                               if ( pSoldier->ubID < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS )
01417                               {
01418                                     // Set our next moving animation to be pending, after
01419                                     pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = usNewState;
01420                                     // Set new state to be animation to move to new stance
01421                                     SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ usNewState ].ubHeight );
01422                                     return( TRUE );
01423                               }
01424                         }
01425                   }
01426             }
01427 
01428             if ( usNewState == ADJACENT_GET_ITEM )
01429             {
01430                   if ( pSoldier->ubPendingDirection != NO_PENDING_DIRECTION )
01431                   {
01432                         EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->ubPendingDirection, FALSE, pSoldier->usAnimState );
01433                         pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = NO_PENDING_DIRECTION;
01434                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = ADJACENT_GET_ITEM;
01435                         pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone    = TRUE;
01436                         SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
01437                         return( TRUE );
01438                   }
01439             }
01440 
01441 
01442             if ( usNewState == CLIMBUPROOF )
01443             {
01444                   if ( pSoldier->ubPendingDirection != NO_PENDING_DIRECTION )
01445                   {
01446                         EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->ubPendingDirection );
01447                         pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = NO_PENDING_DIRECTION;
01448                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = CLIMBUPROOF;
01449                         pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone    = TRUE;
01450                         SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
01451                         return( TRUE );
01452                   }
01453             }
01454 
01455             if ( usNewState == CLIMBDOWNROOF )
01456             {
01457                   if ( pSoldier->ubPendingDirection != NO_PENDING_DIRECTION )
01458                   {
01459                         EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->ubPendingDirection );
01460                         pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = NO_PENDING_DIRECTION;
01461                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = CLIMBDOWNROOF;
01462                         pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = FALSE;
01463                         pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone    = TRUE;
01464                         SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
01465                         return( TRUE );
01466                   }
01467             }
01468 
01469             // ATE: Don't raise/lower automatically if we are low on health,
01470             // as our gun looks lowered anyway....
01471             //if ( pSoldier->bLife > INJURED_CHANGE_THREASHOLD )
01472             {
01473                   // Don't do some of this if we are a monster!
01474       // ATE: LOWER AIMATION IS GOOD, RAISE ONE HOWEVER MAY CAUSE PROBLEMS FOR AI....
01475                   if ( !(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER ) && pSoldier->ubBodyType != ROBOTNOWEAPON && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
01476                   {
01477                         // If this animation is a raise_weapon animation
01478                         if ( ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_RAISE_WEAPON ) && !( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ( ANIM_RAISE_WEAPON | ANIM_NOCHANGE_WEAPON ) ) )
01479                         {
01480                               // We are told that we need to rasie weapon
01481                               // Do so only if
01482                               // 1) We have a rifle in hand...
01483                               usItem = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
01484 
01485 //                            if ( usItem != NOTHING && (Item[ usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED) && usItem != ROCKET_LAUNCHER && usItem != RPG7 )
01486                               if ( usItem != NOTHING && (Item[ usItem ].twohanded ) && !Item[usItem].rocketlauncher )
01487                               {
01488                                     // Switch on height!
01489                                     switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
01490                                     {
01491                                           case ANIM_STAND:
01492 
01493                                                 // 2) OK, all's fine... lower weapon first....
01494                                                 pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = usNewState;
01495                                                 // Set new state to be animation to move to new stance
01496                                                 usNewState = RAISE_RIFLE;
01497                                     }
01498                               }
01499                         }
01500 
01501                         // If this animation is a lower_weapon animation
01502                         if ( ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_LOWER_WEAPON ) && !( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ( ANIM_LOWER_WEAPON | ANIM_NOCHANGE_WEAPON ) ) )
01503                         {
01504                               // We are told that we need to rasie weapon
01505                               // Do so only if
01506                               // 1) We have a rifle in hand...
01507                               usItem = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
01508 
01509 //                            if ( usItem != NOTHING && (Item[ usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED) && usItem != ROCKET_LAUNCHER && usItem != RPG7 )
01510                               if ( usItem != NOTHING && (Item[ usItem ].twohanded ) && !Item[usItem].rocketlauncher )
01511                               {
01512                                     // Switch on height!
01513                                     switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
01514                                     {
01515                                           case ANIM_STAND:
01516 
01517                                                 // 2) OK, all's fine... lower weapon first....
01518                                                 pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = usNewState;
01519                                                 // Set new state to be animation to move to new stance
01520                                                 usNewState = LOWER_RIFLE;
01521                                     }
01522                               }
01523                         }
01524                   }
01525             }
01526 
01527             // Are we cowering and are tyring to move, getup first...
01528             if ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING && pSoldier->usAnimState == COWERING && gAnimControl[ usNewState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND )
01529             {
01530                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = usNewState;
01531                   // Set new state to be animation to move to new stance
01532                   usNewState = END_COWER;
01533             }
01534             
01535             // If we want to start swatting, put a pending animation
01536             if( pSoldier->usAnimState != START_SWAT && usNewState == SWATTING )
01537             {
01538                   // Set new state to be animation to move to new stance
01539                   usNewState = START_SWAT;
01540             }
01541 
01542             if( pSoldier->usAnimState == SWATTING && usNewState == CROUCHING )
01543             {
01544                   // Set new state to be animation to move to new stance
01545                   usNewState = END_SWAT;
01546             }
01547 
01548             if( pSoldier->usAnimState == WALKING && usNewState == STANDING && pSoldier->bLife < INJURED_CHANGE_THREASHOLD && pSoldier->ubBodyType <= REGFEMALE && !MercInWater( pSoldier ) )
01549             {
01550                   // Set new state to be animation to move to new stance
01551                   usNewState = END_HURT_WALKING;
01552             }
01553 
01554             // Check if we are an enemy, and we are in an animation what should be overriden
01555             // by if he sees us or not.
01556             if ( ReevaluateEnemyStance( pSoldier, usNewState ) )
01557             {
01558                   return( TRUE );
01559             }
01560 
01561             // OK.......
01562             if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType > REGFEMALE )
01563             {
01564                   if ( pSoldier->bLife < INJURED_CHANGE_THREASHOLD )
01565                   {
01566                         if ( usNewState == READY_RIFLE_STAND )
01567                         {
01568                         //    pSoldier->usPendingAnimation2 = usNewState;
01569                         //    usNewState = FROM_INJURED_TRANSITION;
01570                         }
01571                   }
01572             }
01573 
01574             // Alrighty, check if we should free buddy up!
01575             if ( usNewState == GIVING_AID )
01576             {
01577                   UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
01578             }
01579 
01580 
01581             // SUBSTITUDE VARIOUS REG ANIMATIONS WITH ODD BODY TYPES
01582             if ( SubstituteBodyTypeAnimation( pSoldier, usNewState, &usSubState ) )
01583             {
01584                   usNewState = usSubState;
01585             }
01586 
01587             // CHECK IF WE CAN DO THIS ANIMATION!
01588             if ( IsAnimationValidForBodyType( pSoldier, usNewState ) == FALSE )
01589             {
01590                   return( FALSE );
01591             }
01592 
01593             // OK, make guy transition if a big merc...
01594             if ( pSoldier->uiAnimSubFlags & SUB_ANIM_BIGGUYTHREATENSTANCE )
01595             {
01596                   if ( usNewState == KNEEL_DOWN && pSoldier->usAnimState != BIGMERC_CROUCH_TRANS_INTO )
01597                   {
01598                         UINT16 usItem;
01599 
01600                         // Do we have a rifle?
01601                         usItem = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
01602 
01603                         if ( usItem != NOTHING )
01604                         {
01605                               if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN && !Item[usItem].rocketlauncher )
01606                               {
01607 //                                  if ( (Item[ usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED) )
01608                                     if ( (Item[ usItem ].twohanded ) )
01609                                     {
01610                                           usNewState = BIGMERC_CROUCH_TRANS_INTO;
01611                                     }
01612                               }
01613                         }
01614                   }
01615 
01616                   if ( usNewState == KNEEL_UP && pSoldier->usAnimState != BIGMERC_CROUCH_TRANS_OUTOF )
01617                   {
01618                         UINT16 usItem;
01619 
01620                         // Do we have a rifle?
01621                         usItem = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
01622 
01623                         if ( usItem != NOTHING )
01624                         {
01625                               if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN && !Item[usItem].rocketlauncher )
01626                               {
01627 //                                  if ( (Item[ usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED) )
01628                                     if ( (Item[ usItem ].twohanded ) )
01629                                     {
01630                                           usNewState = BIGMERC_CROUCH_TRANS_OUTOF;
01631                                     }
01632                               }
01633                         }
01634                   }
01635             }
01636 
01637             // OK, if we have reverse set, do the side step!
01638             if ( pSoldier->bReverse )
01639             {
01640                   if ( usNewState == WALKING || usNewState == RUNNING || usNewState == SWATTING )
01641                   {
01642                         // CHECK FOR SIDEWAYS!
01643                         if ( pSoldier->bDirection == gPurpendicularDirection[ pSoldier->bDirection ][ pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ] ] )
01644                         {
01645                               // We are perpendicular!
01646                               usNewState = SIDE_STEP;
01647                         }
01648                         else
01649                         {
01650                               if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_CROUCH )
01651                               {
01652                                     usNewState = SWAT_BACKWARDS;
01653                               }
01654                               else
01655                               {
01656                                     // Here, change to  opposite direction
01657                                     usNewState = WALK_BACKWARDS;
01658                               }
01659                         }
01660                   }
01661             }
01662 
01663     // ATE: Patch hole for breath collapse for roofs, fences
01664     if ( usNewState == CLIMBUPROOF || usNewState == CLIMBDOWNROOF || usNewState == HOPFENCE )
01665     {
01666       // Check for breath collapse if a given animation like
01667               if ( CheckForBreathCollapse( pSoldier ) || pSoldier->bCollapsed )
01668               {
01669                         // UNset UI
01670                         UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
01671 
01672                         SoldierCollapse( pSoldier );
01673                               
01674                         pSoldier->bBreathCollapsed = FALSE;
01675 
01676                   return( FALSE );
01677 
01678               }
01679     }
01680 
01681             // If we are in water.....and trying to run, change to run
01682             if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == LOW_WATER || pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == MED_WATER )
01683             {
01684                   // Check animation
01685                   // Change to walking
01686                   if ( usNewState == RUNNING )
01687                   {
01688                         usNewState = WALKING;
01689                   }
01690             }
01691 
01692             // Turn off anipause flag for any anim!
01693             pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_PAUSEANIMOVE);
01694 
01695             // Unset paused for no APs.....
01696             AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, FALSE );
01697 
01698             if ( usNewState == CRAWLING && pSoldier->usDontUpdateNewGridNoOnMoveAnimChange == 1 )
01699             {
01700                   if ( pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition != TURNING_FROM_PRONE_ENDING_UP_FROM_MOVE )
01701                   {
01702                         pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = TURNING_FROM_PRONE_START_UP_FROM_MOVE;
01703                   }
01704 
01705                   // ATE: IF we are starting to crawl, but have to getup to turn first......
01706                   if ( pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition == TURNING_FROM_PRONE_START_UP_FROM_MOVE )
01707                   {
01708                         usNewState = PRONE_UP;
01709                         pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = TURNING_FROM_PRONE_ENDING_UP_FROM_MOVE;
01710                   }
01711             }
01712             
01713             // We are about to start moving
01714             // Handle buddy beginning to move...
01715             // check new gridno, etc
01716             // ATE: Added: Make check that old anim is not a moving one as well
01717             if ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING && !( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) || ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING && fForce ) )
01718             {
01719                   BOOLEAN fKeepMoving;
01720 
01721                   if ( usNewState == CRAWLING && pSoldier->usDontUpdateNewGridNoOnMoveAnimChange == LOCKED_NO_NEWGRIDNO )
01722                   {
01723                         // Turn off lock once we are crawling once...
01724                         pSoldier->usDontUpdateNewGridNoOnMoveAnimChange = 1;
01725                   }                 
01726 
01727                   // ATE: Additional check here if we have just been told to update animation ONLY, not goto gridno stuff...
01728                   if ( !pSoldier->usDontUpdateNewGridNoOnMoveAnimChange  )
01729                   {
01730                         if ( usNewState != SWATTING  )
01731                         {
01732                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Handling New gridNo for %d: Old %s, New %s", pSoldier->ubID, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].zAnimStr , gAnimControl[ usNewState ].zAnimStr)  );
01733 
01734                               if ( !( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_SPECIALMOVE ) )
01735                               {
01736                                 // Handle goto new tile...
01737                                 if ( HandleGotoNewGridNo( pSoldier, &fKeepMoving, TRUE, usNewState ) )
01738                                 {
01739                                       if ( !fKeepMoving )
01740                                       {
01741                                             return( FALSE );
01742                                       }
01743 
01744                                       // Make sure desy = zeroed out...
01745                                       // pSoldier->fPastXDest = pSoldier->fPastYDest = FALSE;
01746                                 }
01747                                 else
01748                                 {
01749                       if ( pSoldier->bBreathCollapsed )
01750                       {
01751                                     // UNset UI
01752                                     UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
01753 
01754                                     SoldierCollapse( pSoldier );
01755                                       
01756                                     pSoldier->bBreathCollapsed = FALSE;
01757                       }
01758                                       return( FALSE );
01759                                 }
01760           }
01761           else
01762           {
01763                                     // Change desired direction
01764                                     // Just change direction
01765                                     EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDestination( pSoldier, pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ], FALSE, pSoldier->usAnimState );
01766           }
01767 
01768                               //check for services
01769                               ReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier );
01770                               GivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier );
01771 
01772 
01773                               // Check if we are a vehicle, and start playing noise sound....
01774                               if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01775                               {
01776                                     HandleVehicleMovementSound( pSoldier, TRUE );
01777                               }
01778                         }
01779                   }
01780             }
01781             else
01782             {
01783                   // Check for stopping movement noise...
01784                   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01785                   {
01786                         HandleVehicleMovementSound( pSoldier, FALSE );
01787 
01788                         // If a vehicle, set hewight to 0
01789                         SetSoldierHeight( pSoldier, (FLOAT)( 0 ) );
01790                   }
01791 
01792             }
01793 
01794             // Reset to false always.....
01795             // ( Unless locked ) 
01796     if ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING )
01797     {
01798               if ( pSoldier->usDontUpdateNewGridNoOnMoveAnimChange != LOCKED_NO_NEWGRIDNO )
01799               {
01800                     pSoldier->usDontUpdateNewGridNoOnMoveAnimChange = FALSE;
01801               }
01802     }
01803 
01804             if ( fTryingToRestart )
01805             {
01806                   return( FALSE );
01807             }
01808 
01809       }
01810 
01811 
01812       // ATE: If this is an AI guy.. unlock him!
01813       if ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemySightingOnTheirTurn )
01814       {
01815             if ( gTacticalStatus.ubEnemySightingOnTheirTurnEnemyID == pSoldier->ubID )
01816             {
01817                   pSoldier->fPauseAllAnimation = FALSE;
01818                   gTacticalStatus.fEnemySightingOnTheirTurn = FALSE;
01819             }
01820       }
01821 
01822       ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01823       //                HERE DOWN - WE HAVE MADE A DESCISION!
01824       /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01825 
01826       uiOldAnimFlags = gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags;
01827       uiNewAnimFlags = gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags;
01828 
01829       usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc( pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ] ) );
01830 
01831 
01832       // CHECKING IF WE HAVE A HIT FINISH BUT NO DEATH IS DONE WITH A SPECIAL ANI CODE
01833       // IN THE HIT FINSIH ANI SCRIPTS
01834 
01835       // CHECKING IF WE HAVE FINISHED A DEATH ANIMATION IS DONE WITH A SPECIAL ANI CODE
01836       // IN THE DEATH SCRIPTS
01837 
01838 
01839       // CHECK IF THIS NEW STATE IS NON-INTERRUPTABLE
01840       // IF SO - SET NON-INT FLAG
01841       if ( uiNewAnimFlags & ANIM_NONINTERRUPT )
01842       {
01843             pSoldier->fInNonintAnim = TRUE;
01844       }
01845 
01846       if ( uiNewAnimFlags & ANIM_RT_NONINTERRUPT )
01847       {
01848             pSoldier->fRTInNonintAnim = TRUE;
01849       }
01850 
01851       // CHECK IF WE ARE NOT AIMING, IF NOT, RESET LAST TAGRET!
01852       if ( !(gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_FIREREADY ) && !(gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_FIREREADY ) )
01853       {
01854             // ATE: Also check for the transition anims to not reset this
01855             // this should have used a flag but we're out of them....
01856             if ( usNewState != READY_RIFLE_STAND && usNewState != READY_RIFLE_PRONE && usNewState != READY_RIFLE_CROUCH && usNewState != ROBOT_SHOOT )
01857             {
01858                   pSoldier->sLastTarget = NOWHERE;
01859             }
01860       }
01861 
01862       // If a special move state, release np aps
01863       if ( ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_SPECIALMOVE ) )
01864       {
01865             AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, FALSE );
01866       }
01867 
01868       if ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_UPDATEMOVEMENTMODE )
01869       {
01870             if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
01871             {
01872                   // pSoldier->usUIMovementMode =  GetMoveStateBasedOnStance( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ usNewState ].ubEndHeight );   
01873             }
01874       }
01875 
01876       // ATE: If not a moving animation - turn off reverse....
01877       if ( !( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) )
01878       {
01879             pSoldier->bReverse = FALSE;
01880       }
01881 
01882       // ONLY DO FOR EVERYONE BUT PLANNING GUYS
01883       if ( pSoldier->ubID < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS )
01884       {
01885 
01886             // Do special things based on new state
01887             switch( usNewState )
01888             {
01889                   case STANDING:
01890 
01891                         // Update desired height
01892                         pSoldier->ubDesiredHeight            = ANIM_STAND;
01893                         break;
01894 
01895                   case CROUCHING:
01896 
01897                         // Update desired height
01898                         pSoldier->ubDesiredHeight            = ANIM_CROUCH;
01899                         break;
01900 
01901                   case PRONE:
01902 
01903                         // Update desired height
01904                         pSoldier->ubDesiredHeight            = ANIM_PRONE;
01905                         break;
01906 
01907                   case READY_RIFLE_STAND:
01908                   case READY_RIFLE_PRONE:
01909                   case READY_RIFLE_CROUCH:
01910                   case READY_DUAL_STAND:
01911                   case READY_DUAL_CROUCH:
01912                   case READY_DUAL_PRONE:
01913 
01914                         // OK, get points to ready weapon....
01915                         if ( !pSoldier->fDontChargeReadyAPs )
01916                         {
01917                               sAPCost = GetAPsToReadyWeapon( pSoldier, usNewState );
01918                               DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, sBPCost );
01919                         }
01920                         else
01921                         {
01922                               pSoldier->fDontChargeReadyAPs = FALSE;
01923                         }
01924                         break;
01925 
01926                   case WALKING:
01927 
01928                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
01929                         pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
01930                         break;
01931 
01932                   case SWATTING:
01933 
01934                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
01935                         pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
01936                         break;
01937 
01938                   case CRAWLING:
01939 
01940                         // Turn off flag...
01941                         pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = TURNING_FROM_PRONE_OFF;
01942                         pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
01943                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
01944                         break;
01945 
01946                   case RUNNING:
01947 
01948                         // Only if our previous is not running
01949                         if ( pSoldier->usAnimState != RUNNING )
01950                         {
01951                               sAPCost = AP_START_RUN_COST;
01952                               DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, sBPCost );
01953                         }
01954                         // Set pending action count to 0
01955                         pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
01956                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
01957                         break;
01958 
01959                   case ADULTMONSTER_WALKING:
01960                         pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
01961                         break;
01962 
01963                   case ROBOT_WALK:
01964                         pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
01965                         break;
01966 
01967                   case KNEEL_UP:
01968                   case KNEEL_DOWN:
01969                   case BIGMERC_CROUCH_TRANS_INTO:
01970                   case BIGMERC_CROUCH_TRANS_OUTOF:
01971 
01972                         if ( !pSoldier->fDontChargeAPsForStanceChange )
01973                         {
01974                               DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_CROUCH, BP_CROUCH );
01975                         }
01976                         pSoldier->fDontChargeAPsForStanceChange = FALSE;
01977                         break;
01978 
01979                   case PRONE_UP:
01980                   case PRONE_DOWN:
01981 
01982                         // ATE: If we are NOT waiting for prone down...
01983                         if ( pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition < TURNING_FROM_PRONE_START_UP_FROM_MOVE && !pSoldier->fDontChargeAPsForStanceChange )
01984                         {
01985                               // ATE: Don't do this if we are still 'moving'....
01986                               if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == pSoldier->sFinalDestination || pSoldier->usPathIndex == 0 )
01987                               {
01988                                     DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_PRONE, BP_PRONE );
01989                               }
01990                         }
01991                         pSoldier->fDontChargeAPsForStanceChange = FALSE;
01992                         break;
01993 
01994                         //Deduct points for stance change
01995                         //sAPCost = GetAPsToChangeStance( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ usNewState ].ubEndHeight );
01996                         //DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
01997                         //break;
01998 
01999                   case START_AID:
02000 
02001                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_START_FIRST_AID, BP_START_FIRST_AID );
02002                         break;
02003 
02004                   case CUTTING_FENCE:
02005                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_USEWIRECUTTERS, BP_USEWIRECUTTERS );
02006                         break;
02007 
02008                   case PLANT_BOMB:
02009 
02010                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_DROP_BOMB, 0 );
02011                         break;
02012 
02013                   case STEAL_ITEM:
02014 
02015                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_STEAL_ITEM, 0 );
02016                         break;
02017 
02018       case CROW_DIE:
02019 
02020         // Delete shadow of crow....
02021                     if ( pSoldier->pAniTile != NULL )
02022                     {
02023                           DeleteAniTile( pSoldier->pAniTile );
02024                           pSoldier->pAniTile = NULL;
02025                     }
02026         break;
02027 
02028                   case CROW_FLY:
02029                         
02030                         // Ate: startup a shadow ( if gridno is set )
02031                         HandleCrowShadowNewGridNo( pSoldier );
02032                         break;
02033 
02034                   case CROW_EAT:
02035 
02036                         // ATE: Make sure height level is 0....
02037                         SetSoldierHeight( pSoldier, (FLOAT)(0) );
02038                         HandleCrowShadowRemoveGridNo( pSoldier );
02039                         break;
02040 
02041                   case USE_REMOTE:
02042 
02043                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_USE_REMOTE, 0 );
02044                         break;
02045 
02046                   //case PUNCH:
02047 
02048                         //Deduct points for punching
02049                         //sAPCost = MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE );
02050                         //DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
02051                         //break;
02052 
02053                   case HOPFENCE:
02054 
02055                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_JUMPFENCE, BP_JUMPFENCE );
02056                         break;
02057 
02058                   // Deduct aps for falling down....
02059                   case FALLBACK_HIT_STAND:
02060                   case FALLFORWARD_FROMHIT_STAND:
02061 
02062                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_FALL_DOWN, BP_FALL_DOWN );
02063                         break;
02064 
02065                   case FALLFORWARD_FROMHIT_CROUCH:
02066 
02067                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, (AP_FALL_DOWN/2), (BP_FALL_DOWN/2) );
02068                         break;
02069 
02070                   case QUEEN_SWIPE:
02071 
02072                         // ATE: set damage counter...
02073                         pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 = 0;
02074                         break;
02075 
02076                   case CLIMBDOWNROOF:
02077 
02078                 // disable sight
02079                 gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= DISALLOW_SIGHT;
02080 
02081                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_CLIMBOFFROOF, BP_CLIMBOFFROOF ); 
02082                         break;
02083
