02084                   case CLIMBUPROOF:
02085 
02086                 // disable sight
02087                 gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= DISALLOW_SIGHT;
02088 
02089                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_CLIMBROOF, BP_CLIMBROOF );                   
02090                         break;
02091 
02092                   case JUMP_OVER_BLOCKING_PERSON:
02093                         
02094                         // Set path....
02095                         {
02096                               UINT16 usNewGridNo;
02097 
02098                               DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_JUMP_OVER, BP_JUMP_OVER );                   
02099 
02100                               usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( pSoldier->bDirection ) );
02101                               usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)usNewGridNo, DirectionInc( pSoldier->bDirection ) );
02102 
02103                               pSoldier->usPathDataSize = 0;
02104                               pSoldier->usPathIndex    = 0;
02105                               pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = pSoldier->bDirection;
02106                               pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
02107                               pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = pSoldier->bDirection;
02108                               pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
02109                               pSoldier->sFinalDestination = usNewGridNo;
02110                               // Set direction
02111                               EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDestination( pSoldier, pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ], FALSE, JUMP_OVER_BLOCKING_PERSON );
02112                         }
02113                         break;
02114                   
02115 
02116                   case GENERIC_HIT_STAND:
02117                   case GENERIC_HIT_CROUCH:
02118                   case STANDING_BURST_HIT:
02119                   case ADULTMONSTER_HIT:
02120                   case ADULTMONSTER_DYING:
02121                   case COW_HIT:
02122                   case COW_DYING:
02123                   case BLOODCAT_HIT:
02124                   case BLOODCAT_DYING:
02125                   case WATER_HIT:
02126                   case WATER_DIE:
02127                   case DEEP_WATER_HIT:
02128                   case DEEP_WATER_DIE:
02129                   case RIFLE_STAND_HIT:
02130                   case LARVAE_HIT:
02131                   case LARVAE_DIE:
02132                   case QUEEN_HIT:
02133                   case QUEEN_DIE:
02134                   case INFANT_HIT:
02135                   case INFANT_DIE:
02136                   case CRIPPLE_HIT:
02137                   case CRIPPLE_DIE:
02138                   case CRIPPLE_DIE_FLYBACK:
02139                   case ROBOTNW_HIT:
02140                   case ROBOTNW_DIE:
02141 
02142                         // Set getting hit flag to TRUE
02143                         pSoldier->fGettingHit = TRUE;
02144                         break;
02145 
02146                   case CHARIOTS_OF_FIRE:
02147                   case BODYEXPLODING:
02148 
02149                         // Merc on fire!
02150                         pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 = PlaySoldierJA2Sample( pSoldier->ubID, ( FIRE_ON_MERC ), RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 5, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ), TRUE );                
02151                         break;
02152             }
02153       }
02154 
02155       // Remove old animation profile
02156       HandleAnimationProfile( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState, TRUE );
02157 
02158 
02159       // From animation control, set surface
02160       if ( SetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, usNewState ) == FALSE )
02161       {
02162             return( FALSE );
02163       }
02164 
02165 
02166       // Set state
02167       pSoldier->usOldAniState = pSoldier->usAnimState;
02168       pSoldier->sOldAniCode = pSoldier->usAniCode;
02169 
02170       // Change state value!
02171       pSoldier->usAnimState = usNewState;
02172 
02173       pSoldier->sZLevelOverride = -1;
02174 
02175       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_LOCKPENDINGACTIONCOUNTER ) )
02176       {
02177             //ATE Cancel ANY pending action...
02178             if ( pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount > 0 && ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usOldAniState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) )
02179             {
02180                   // Do some special things for some actions
02181                   switch( pSoldier->ubPendingAction )
02182                   {
02183                         case MERC_GIVEITEM:
02184 
02185                               // Unset target as enaged
02186                               MercPtrs[ pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4 ]->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_ENGAGEDINACTION);
02187                               break;
02188                   }
02189                   pSoldier->ubPendingAction            = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
02190             }
02191             else
02192             {
02193                   // Increment this for almost all animations except some movement ones...
02194                   // That's because this represents ANY animation other than the one we began when the pending action was started
02195                   // ATE: Added to ignore this count if we are waiting for someone to move out of our way...
02196                   if ( usNewState != START_SWAT && usNewState != END_SWAT && !( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_NOCHANGE_PENDINGCOUNT ) && !pSoldier->fDelayedMovement && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ENGAGEDINACTION ) )
02197                   {
02198                         pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount++;
02199                   }
02200             }
02201       }
02202 
02203       // Set new animation profile
02204       HandleAnimationProfile( pSoldier, usNewState, FALSE );
02205 
02206       // Reset some animation values
02207       pSoldier->fForceShade = FALSE;
02208 
02209       CheckForFreeupFromHit( pSoldier, uiOldAnimFlags, uiNewAnimFlags, pSoldier->usOldAniState, usNewState );
02210 
02211       // CHECK IF WE ARE AT AN IDLE ACTION
02212 #if 0
02213       if ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_IDLE )
02214       {
02215             pSoldier->bAction = ACTION_DONE;
02216       }
02217       else
02218       {
02219             pSoldier->bAction = ACTION_BUSY;
02220       }
02221 #endif
02222 
02223       // Set current frame
02224       pSoldier->usAniCode  = usStartingAniCode;
02225 
02226       // ATE; For some animations that could use some variations, do so....
02227       if (usNewState == CHARIOTS_OF_FIRE || usNewState == BODYEXPLODING )
02228       {
02229             pSoldier->usAniCode = (UINT16)( Random( 10 ) );
02230       }
02231 
02232       // ATE: Default to first frame....
02233       // Will get changed ( probably ) by AdjustToNextAnimationFrame()
02234       ConvertAniCodeToAniFrame( pSoldier, (INT16)( 0 ) );
02235 
02236       // Set delay speed
02237       SetSoldierAniSpeed( pSoldier );
02238 
02239       // Reset counters
02240       RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->UpdateCounter, pSoldier->sAniDelay );
02241       
02242       // Adjust to new animation frame ( the first one )
02243       AdjustToNextAnimationFrame( pSoldier );
02244 
02245       // Setup offset information for UI above guy
02246       SetSoldierLocatorOffsets( pSoldier );
02247 
02248       // If our own guy...
02249       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
02250       {
02251             // Are we stationary?
02252             if ( gAnimControl[ usNewState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY )
02253             {
02254                   // Position light....
02255                   // SetCheckSoldierLightFlag( pSoldier );
02256             }
02257             else
02258             {
02259                   // Hide light.....
02260                   // DeleteSoldierLight( pSoldier );
02261             }
02262       }
02263 
02264       // If we are certain animations, reload palette
02265       if ( usNewState == VEHICLE_DIE || usNewState == CHARIOTS_OF_FIRE || usNewState == BODYEXPLODING )
02266       {
02267             CreateSoldierPalettes( pSoldier );        
02268       }
02269 
02270       // ATE: if the old animation was a movement, and new is not, play sound...
02271       // OK, play final footstep sound...
02272       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
02273       {
02274             if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY ) && 
02275                          ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usOldAniState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) )
02276             {
02277                   PlaySoldierFootstepSound( pSoldier );
02278             }
02279       }
02280 
02281       // Free up from stance change
02282       FreeUpNPCFromStanceChange( pSoldier );
02283 
02284       return( TRUE );
02285 }
02286 
02287 
02288 void InternalRemoveSoldierFromGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fForce )
02289 {
02290       INT8 bDir;
02291       INT32 iGridNo;
02292 
02293       if((pSoldier->sGridNo!=NO_MAP_POS) )
02294       {
02295     if ( pSoldier->bInSector || fForce )
02296     {
02297               // Remove from world ( old pos )
02298               RemoveMerc( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier, FALSE );
02299               HandleAnimationProfile( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState, TRUE );
02300 
02301               // Remove records of this guy being adjacent
02302               for (bDir = 0; bDir < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; bDir++)
02303               {
02304                     iGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo + DirIncrementer[ bDir ];
02305                     if( iGridNo >= 0 && iGridNo < WORLD_MAX )
02306                     {
02307                           gpWorldLevelData[ iGridNo ].ubAdjacentSoldierCnt--;
02308                     }
02309               }
02310 
02311               HandlePlacingRoofMarker( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE , FALSE );
02312 
02313               // Remove reseved movement value
02314               UnMarkMovementReserved( pSoldier );
02315 
02316               HandleCrowShadowRemoveGridNo( pSoldier );
02317 
02318               // Reset gridno...
02319               pSoldier->sGridNo = NO_MAP_POS;
02320     }
02321       }
02322 }
02323 
02324 void RemoveSoldierFromGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
02325 {
02326   InternalRemoveSoldierFromGridNo( pSoldier, FALSE );
02327 }
02328 
02329 
02330 void EVENT_InternalSetSoldierPosition( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FLOAT dNewXPos, FLOAT dNewYPos ,BOOLEAN fUpdateDest, BOOLEAN fUpdateFinalDest, BOOLEAN fForceRemove )
02331 {
02332       INT16 sNewGridNo;
02333 
02334       // Not if we're dead!
02335       if ( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
02336       {
02337             return;
02338       }
02339 
02340       // Set new map index
02341       sNewGridNo = GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS(dNewYPos, dNewXPos );
02342 
02343       if ( fUpdateDest )
02344       {
02345             pSoldier->sDestination = sNewGridNo;
02346       }
02347 
02348       if ( fUpdateFinalDest )
02349       {
02350             pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sNewGridNo;
02351       }
02352 
02353       // Copy old values
02354       pSoldier->dOldXPos = pSoldier->dXPos;
02355       pSoldier->dOldYPos = pSoldier->dYPos;
02356 
02357       // Set New pos
02358       pSoldier->dXPos = dNewXPos;
02359       pSoldier->dYPos = dNewYPos;
02360 
02361       pSoldier->sX = (INT16)dNewXPos;
02362       pSoldier->sY = (INT16)dNewYPos;
02363 
02364       HandleCrowShadowNewPosition( pSoldier );
02365 
02366       SetSoldierGridNo( pSoldier, sNewGridNo, fForceRemove );
02367 
02368       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) ) )
02369       {
02370             if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MERC_ALWAYS_LIGHT_UP ] )
02371             {
02372                   SetCheckSoldierLightFlag( pSoldier );
02373             }
02374       }
02375 
02376       // ATE: Mirror calls if we are a vehicle ( for all our passengers )
02377       UpdateAllVehiclePassengersGridNo( pSoldier );
02378 
02379 }
02380 
02381 void EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FLOAT dNewXPos, FLOAT dNewYPos )
02382 {
02383       EVENT_InternalSetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, dNewXPos, dNewYPos ,TRUE, TRUE, FALSE );
02384 }
02385 
02386 void EVENT_SetSoldierPositionForceDelete( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FLOAT dNewXPos, FLOAT dNewYPos )
02387 {
02388       EVENT_InternalSetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, dNewXPos, dNewYPos ,TRUE, TRUE, TRUE );
02389 }
02390 
02391 void EVENT_SetSoldierPositionAndMaybeFinalDest( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FLOAT dNewXPos, FLOAT dNewYPos, BOOLEAN fUpdateFinalDest )
02392 {
02393       EVENT_InternalSetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, dNewXPos, dNewYPos ,TRUE, fUpdateFinalDest, FALSE );
02394 }
02395 
02396 void EVENT_SetSoldierPositionAndMaybeFinalDestAndMaybeNotDestination( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FLOAT dNewXPos, FLOAT dNewYPos, BOOLEAN fUpdateDest,  BOOLEAN fUpdateFinalDest )
02397 {
02398       EVENT_InternalSetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, dNewXPos, dNewYPos ,fUpdateDest, fUpdateFinalDest, FALSE );
02399 }
02400 
02401 
02402 void InternalSetSoldierHeight( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FLOAT dNewHeight, BOOLEAN fUpdateLevel )
02403 {
02404 
02405       INT8  bOldLevel = pSoldier->bLevel;
02406 
02407       pSoldier->dHeightAdjustment = dNewHeight;
02408       pSoldier->sHeightAdjustment = (INT16)pSoldier->dHeightAdjustment;
02409 
02410       if ( !fUpdateLevel )
02411       {
02412             return;
02413       }
02414 
02415       if ( pSoldier->sHeightAdjustment > 0 )
02416       {
02417             pSoldier->bLevel = SECOND_LEVEL;
02418 
02419             ApplyTranslucencyToWalls((INT16)(pSoldier->dXPos/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(pSoldier->dYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE));
02420             //LightHideTrees((INT16)(pSoldier->dXPos/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(pSoldier->dYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE));
02421             //ConcealAllWalls();
02422 
02423             //pSoldier->pLevelNode->ubShadeLevel=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pRoofHead->ubShadeLevel;
02424             //pSoldier->pLevelNode->ubSumLights=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pRoofHead->ubSumLights;
02425             //pSoldier->pLevelNode->ubMaxLights=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pRoofHead->ubMaxLights;
02426             //pSoldier->pLevelNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pRoofHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel;
02427       }
02428       else
02429       {
02430             pSoldier->bLevel = FIRST_LEVEL;
02431 
02432             //pSoldier->pLevelNode->ubShadeLevel=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pLandHead->ubShadeLevel;
02433             //pSoldier->pLevelNode->ubSumLights=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pLandHead->ubSumLights;
02434             //pSoldier->pLevelNode->ubMaxLights=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pLandHead->ubMaxLights;
02435             //pSoldier->pLevelNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pLandHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel;
02436 
02437 
02438       }
02439 
02440       if ( bOldLevel == 0 && pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
02441       {
02442 
02443       }
02444       else
02445       {
02446             // Show room at new level
02447             //HideRoom( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier );
02448       }
02449 }
02450 
02451 
02452 
02453 void SetSoldierHeight( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FLOAT dNewHeight )
02454 {
02455       InternalSetSoldierHeight( pSoldier, dNewHeight, TRUE );
02456 }
02457 
02458 
02459 void SetSoldierGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sNewGridNo, BOOLEAN fForceRemove )
02460 {
02461       BOOLEAN     fInWaterValue;
02462       INT8        bDir;
02463       INT32       cnt;
02464       SOLDIERTYPE * pEnemy;
02465 
02466       //INT16     sX, sY, sWorldX, sZLevel;
02467 
02468       // Not if we're dead!
02469       if ( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
02470       {
02471             return;
02472       }
02473 
02474       if ( sNewGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo || pSoldier->pLevelNode == NULL )
02475       {
02476             // Check if we are moving AND this is our next dest gridno....
02477             if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ( ANIM_MOVING  | ANIM_SPECIALMOVE ) )
02478             {
02479                   if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
02480                   {
02481                         if ( sNewGridNo != pSoldier->sDestination )
02482                         {
02483                               // THIS MUST be our new one......MAKE IT SO
02484                               sNewGridNo = pSoldier->sDestination;
02485                         }
02486 
02487                         // Now check this baby....
02488                         if ( sNewGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo )
02489                         {
02490                               return;
02491                         }
02492                   }
02493             }
02494 
02495             pSoldier->sOldGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo;
02496 
02497     if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER )
02498     {
02499       SetPositionSndGridNo( pSoldier->iPositionSndID, sNewGridNo );
02500     }
02501 
02502             if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) ) )
02503             {
02504                   InternalRemoveSoldierFromGridNo( pSoldier, fForceRemove );
02505             }
02506 
02507             // CHECK IF OUR NEW GIRDNO IS VALID,IF NOT DONOT SET!
02508             if ( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sNewGridNo ) )
02509             {
02510                   pSoldier->sGridNo = sNewGridNo;
02511                   return;
02512             }
02513 
02514             // Alrighty, update UI for this guy, if he's the selected guy...
02515             if ( gusSelectedSoldier == pSoldier->ubID )
02516             {
02517                   if ( guiCurrentEvent == C_WAIT_FOR_CONFIRM )
02518                   {
02519                         // Update path!
02520                         gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
02521                   }
02522             }
02523 
02524 
02525             // Reset some flags for optimizations..
02526             pSoldier->sWalkToAttackGridNo = NOWHERE;
02527 
02528             // ATE: Make sure!
02529             // RemoveMerc( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier, FALSE );
02530 
02531             pSoldier->sGridNo = sNewGridNo;
02532 
02533             // OK, check for special code to close door...
02534             if ( pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode == 2 )
02535             {
02536                   pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode = 0;
02537 
02538                   HandleDoorChangeFromGridNo( pSoldier, pSoldier->sEndDoorOpenCodeData, FALSE );
02539             }
02540 
02541             // OK, Update buddy's strategic insertion code....
02542             pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
02543             pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = sNewGridNo;
02544 
02545             
02546             // Remove this gridno as a reserved place!
02547             if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) ) )
02548             {
02549                   UnMarkMovementReserved( pSoldier );
02550             }
02551 
02552             if ( pSoldier->sInitialGridNo == 0 )
02553             {
02554                   pSoldier->sInitialGridNo = sNewGridNo;
02555                   pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[0] = sNewGridNo;
02556             }
02557 
02558             // Add records of this guy being adjacent
02559             for (bDir = 0; bDir < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; bDir++)
02560             {
02561                   gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo + DirIncrementer[ bDir ] ].ubAdjacentSoldierCnt++;
02562             }
02563 
02564             if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) ) )
02565             {
02566                   DropSmell( pSoldier );
02567             }
02568 
02569             // HANDLE ANY SPECIAL RENDERING SITUATIONS
02570             pSoldier->sZLevelOverride = -1;
02571             // If we are over a fence ( hopping ), make us higher!
02572 
02573             if ( IsJumpableFencePresentAtGridno( sNewGridNo ) )
02574             {
02575                    //sX = MapX( sNewGridNo );
02576                    //sY = MapY( sNewGridNo );
02577                    //GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( sX, sY, &sWorldX, &sZLevel);
02578                    //pSoldier->sZLevelOverride = (sZLevel*Z_SUBLAYERS)+ROOF_Z_LEVEL;
02579                    pSoldier->sZLevelOverride = TOPMOST_Z_LEVEL;
02580             }
02581 
02582 
02583             // Add/ remove tree if we are near it
02584             // CheckForFullStructures( pSoldier );
02585 
02586             // Add merc at new pos
02587             if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) ) )
02588             {
02589                   AddMercToHead( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier, TRUE );
02590 
02591                   // If we are in the middle of climbing the roof!
02592                   if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CLIMBUPROOF )
02593                   {
02594                         if(pSoldier->iLight!=(-1))
02595                               LightSpriteRoofStatus(pSoldier->iLight, TRUE );
02596                   }
02597                   else if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CLIMBDOWNROOF )
02598                   {
02599                         if(pSoldier->iLight!=(-1))
02600                               LightSpriteRoofStatus(pSoldier->iLight, FALSE );
02601                   }
02602 
02603                   //JA2Gold:
02604                   //if the player wants the merc to cast the fake light AND it is night
02605                   if( pSoldier->bTeam != OUR_TEAM || gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MERC_CASTS_LIGHT ] && NightTime() )
02606                   {
02607                         if ( pSoldier->bLevel > 0 && gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pRoofHead != NULL )
02608                         {
02609                               gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubShadeLevel=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pRoofHead->ubShadeLevel;
02610                               gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubSumLights=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pRoofHead->ubSumLights;
02611                               gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubMaxLights=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pRoofHead->ubMaxLights;
02612                               gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pRoofHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel;
02613                         }
02614                         else
02615                         {
02616                               gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubShadeLevel=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pLandHead->ubShadeLevel;
02617                               gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubSumLights=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pLandHead->ubSumLights;
02618                               gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubMaxLights=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pLandHead->ubMaxLights;
02619                               gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel=gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pLandHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel;
02620                         }
02621                   }
02622 
02623                   ///HandlePlacingRoofMarker( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
02624 
02625                   HandleAnimationProfile( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState, FALSE );
02626 
02627                   HandleCrowShadowNewGridNo( pSoldier );
02628             }
02629 
02630             pSoldier->bOldOverTerrainType = pSoldier->bOverTerrainType;
02631             pSoldier->bOverTerrainType = GetTerrainType( pSoldier->sGridNo );
02632 
02633             // OK, check that our animation is up to date!
02634             // Check our water value
02635 
02636             if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) ) )
02637             {
02638                   fInWaterValue = MercInWater( pSoldier );
02639 
02640       // ATE: If ever in water MAKE SURE WE WALK AFTERWOODS!
02641       if ( fInWaterValue )
02642       {
02643         pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = WALKING;
02644       }
02645 
02646                   if ( fInWaterValue != pSoldier->fPrevInWater )
02647                   {
02648                         //Update Animation data
02649                         SetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
02650                         
02651                         // Update flag
02652                         pSoldier->fPrevInWater = fInWaterValue;
02653 
02654                         // Update sound...
02655                         if ( fInWaterValue )
02656                         {
02657                               PlaySoldierJA2Sample( pSoldier->ubID, ENTER_WATER_1, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ), TRUE );                 
02658                         }
02659                         else
02660                         {
02661                               // ATE: Check if we are going from water to land - if so, resume
02662                               // with regular movement mode...
02663                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, 0 , FALSE );
02664                         }
02665                   
02666                   }
02667                   
02668 
02669                   // OK, If we were not in deep water but we are now, handle deep animations!
02670                   if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER && pSoldier->bOldOverTerrainType != DEEP_WATER )
02671                   {
02672                         // Based on our current animation, change!
02673                         switch( pSoldier->usAnimState )
02674                         {
02675                               case WALKING:
02676                               case RUNNING:
02677 
02678                               // IN deep water, swim!
02679 
02680                               // Make transition from low to deep
02681                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, LOW_TO_DEEP_WATER, 0 , FALSE );
02682                               pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = DEEP_WATER_SWIM;
02683 
02684                               PlayJA2Sample( ENTER_DEEP_WATER_1, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );                 
02685 
02686                         }
02687                   }
02688 
02689                   // Damage water if in deep water....
02690                   if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == MED_WATER || pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
02691                   {
02692                         WaterDamage( pSoldier );
02693                   }
02694 
02695                   // OK, If we were in deep water but we are NOT now, handle mid animations!
02696                   if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType != DEEP_WATER && pSoldier->bOldOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
02697                   {
02698                         // Make transition from low to deep
02699                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, DEEP_TO_LOW_WATER, 0 , FALSE );
02700                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = pSoldier->usUIMovementMode;
02701                   }
02702             }
02703 
02704     // are we now standing in tear gas without a decently working gas mask?
02705             if ( GetSmokeEffectOnTile( sNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel ) > 1 ) //lal: removed normal smoke 
02706             {
02707                   BOOLEAN fSetGassed = TRUE;
02708 
02709                   // If we have a functioning gas mask...
02710       if ( FindGasMask ( pSoldier ) != NO_SLOT && pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].bStatus[ 0 ] >= GASMASK_MIN_STATUS )
02711                   {
02712                         fSetGassed = FALSE;
02713                   }
02714    //   if ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].usItem == GASMASK && pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].bStatus[ 0 ] >= GASMASK_MIN_STATUS )
02715                   //{
02716                   //    fSetGassed = FALSE;
02717                   //}
02718    //   if ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem == GASMASK && pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].bStatus[ 0 ] >= GASMASK_MIN_STATUS )
02719                   //{
02720                   //    fSetGassed = FALSE;
02721                   //}
02722 
02723                   if ( fSetGassed )
02724                   {
02725                         pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_GASSED;
02726                   }
02727             }
02728 
02729     if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bStealthMode )
02730     {
02731                   // Merc got to a new tile by "sneaking". Did we theoretically sneak
02732                   // past an enemy?
02733 
02734       if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 )        // opponents in sight
02735                   {
02736                         // check each possible enemy
02737                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS; cnt++ )
02738                         {
02739                               pEnemy = MercPtrs[ cnt ];
02740                               // if this guy is here and alive enough to be looking for us
02741                               if ( pEnemy->bActive && pEnemy->bInSector && ( pEnemy->bLife >= OKLIFE ) )
02742                               {
02743                                     // no points for sneaking by the neutrals & friendlies!!!
02744                             if ( !pEnemy->bNeutral && ( pSoldier->bSide != pEnemy->bSide ) && (pEnemy->ubBodyType != COW && pEnemy->ubBodyType != CROW) )
02745                                     {
02746                                           // if we SEE this particular oppponent, and he DOESN'T see us... and he COULD see us...
02747                                           if ( (pSoldier->bOppList[ cnt ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY) &&
02748                                                  pEnemy->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] != SEEN_CURRENTLY && 
02749                                                  PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pEnemy->sGridNo ) < DistanceVisible( pEnemy, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier ) )
02750                                           {
02751                                                       // AGILITY (5):  Soldier snuck 1 square past unaware enemy
02752                                                       StatChange( pSoldier, AGILAMT, 5, FALSE );
02753                                                       // Keep looping, we'll give'em 1 point for EACH such enemy!
02754                                           }
02755                                     }
02756                               }
02757                         }
02758                   }
02759             }
02760 
02761             // Adjust speed based on terrain, etc
02762             SetSoldierAniSpeed( pSoldier );
02763 
02764       }
02765       else
02766       {
02767             int i = 0;
02768       }
02769 }
02770 
02771 
02772 void EVENT_FireSoldierWeapon( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sTargetGridNo )
02773 {
02774       INT16 sTargetXPos, sTargetYPos;
02775       BOOLEAN           fDoFireRightAway = FALSE;
02776 
02777              DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EVENT_FireSoldierWeapon"));
02778 
02779       // CANNOT BE SAME GRIDNO!
02780       if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sTargetGridNo )
02781       {
02782             return;
02783       }
02784 
02785   if ( pSoldier->ubID == 33 )
02786   {
02787     int i = 0;
02788   }
02789 
02790       //switch ( pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType )
02791       //{
02792       //    case AMMO_SLEEP_DART:
02793       //          pSoldier->fMuzzleFlash = FALSE;
02794       //          break;
02795       //    default:
02796       //          pSoldier->fMuzzleFlash = TRUE;
02797       //          break;
02798       //}
02799 
02800       if ( IsFlashSuppressor (&pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ], pSoldier ) )
02801             pSoldier->fMuzzleFlash = FALSE;
02802       else  
02803             pSoldier->fMuzzleFlash = TRUE;
02804 
02805       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EVENT_FireSoldierWeapon: Muzzle flash = %d",pSoldier->fMuzzleFlash));
02806 
02807       // Increment the number of people busy doing stuff because of an attack
02808       //if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
02809       //{
02810             gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
02811             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting attack, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
02812       //}
02813 
02814       // Set soldier's target gridno
02815       // This assignment was redundent because it's already set in 
02816       // the actual event call
02817       pSoldier->sTargetGridNo = sTargetGridNo;
02818       //pSoldier->sLastTarget = sTargetGridNo;
02819       pSoldier->ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
02820 
02821 //    if (Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].usItemClass & IC_GUN)
02822       {
02823             if (pSoldier->bDoBurst)
02824             {
02825                   // Set the TOTAL number of bullets to be fired
02826                   // Can't shoot more bullets than we have in our magazine!
02827                   if(pSoldier->bDoAutofire)
02828                         pSoldier->bBulletsLeft = __min( pSoldier->bDoAutofire, pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunShotsLeft );
02829                   else
02830                   {
02831                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"EVENT_FireSoldierWeapon: do burst");
02832                         if ( pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST )
02833                               pSoldier->bBulletsLeft = __min( Weapon[GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(&pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand])].ubShotsPerBurst, pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunShotsLeft );
02834                         else
02835                               pSoldier->bBulletsLeft = __min( GetShotsPerBurst(&pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ]), pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunShotsLeft );
02836                   }
02837             }
02838             else if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
02839             {
02840                   // two-pistol attack - two bullets!
02841                   pSoldier->bBulletsLeft = 2;
02842             }
02843             else
02844             {
02845                   pSoldier->bBulletsLeft = 1;
02846             }
02847 
02848             if ( AmmoTypes[pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].numberOfBullets > 1 )
02849             {
02850                   pSoldier->bBulletsLeft *= AmmoTypes[pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].numberOfBullets;
02851             }
02852       }
02853       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting attack, bullets left %d", pSoldier->bBulletsLeft) );
02854       
02855       // Convert our grid-not into an XY
02856       ConvertGridNoToXY( sTargetGridNo, &sTargetXPos, &sTargetYPos );
02857 
02858 
02859       // Change to fire animation
02860       // Ready weapon
02861       SoldierReadyWeapon( pSoldier, sTargetXPos, sTargetYPos, FALSE );
02862       
02863       // IF WE ARE AN NPC, SLIDE VIEW TO SHOW WHO IS SHOOTING
02864       {
02865             //if ( pSoldier->fDoSpread )
02866             //{
02867                   // If we are spreading burst, goto right away!
02868                   //EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, SelectFireAnimation( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight ), 0, FALSE );
02869 
02870             //}
02871 
02872             // else
02873             {
02874                   if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER )
02875                   {
02876                         // Force our direction!
02877                         EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->bDesiredDirection );
02878                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, SelectFireAnimation( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight ), 0, FALSE );
02879                   }
02880                   else
02881                   {
02882                         // IF WE ARE IN REAl-TIME, FIRE IMMEDIATELY!
02883                         if ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
02884                         {
02885                               //fDoFireRightAway = TRUE;
02886                         }
02887 
02888                         // Check if our weapon has no intermediate anim...
02889                         if (Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].rocketlauncher || Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].grenadelauncher || Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].mortar )
02890       ///*              switch( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem )
02891       //                {
02892                               //case RPG7:
02893                               //case ROCKET_LAUNCHER:
02894                               //case MORTAR:
02895                               //case GLAUNCHER:*/
02896 
02897                                     fDoFireRightAway = TRUE;
02898                         //          break;
02899                         //}
02900 
02901                         if ( fDoFireRightAway )
02902                         {
02903           // Set to true so we don't get toasted twice for APs..
02904                   pSoldier->fDontUnsetLastTargetFromTurn = TRUE;
02905 
02906           // Make sure we don't try and do fancy prone turning.....
02907           pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = FALSE;
02908 
02909                               // Force our direction!
02910                               EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->bDesiredDirection );
02911 
02912                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, SelectFireAnimation( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight ), 0, FALSE );
02913                         }
02914                         else 
02915                         {
02916                               // Set flag indicating we are about to shoot once destination direction is hit
02917                               pSoldier->fTurningToShoot = TRUE;
02918 
02919                               if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum  && pSoldier->bVisible != -1)
02920                               {
02921                                     LocateSoldier( pSoldier->ubID, DONTSETLOCATOR );
02922                               }
02923                         }
02924                   }
02925             }
02926       }
02927 }
02928 
02929 //gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight
02930 //                            ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, SHOOT_RIFLE_STAND, 0 , FALSE );
02931 
02932 UINT16 SelectFireAnimation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubHeight )
02933 {
02934       INT16 sDist;
02935       UINT16 usItem;
02936       FLOAT       dTargetX;
02937       FLOAT       dTargetY;
02938       FLOAT       dTargetZ;
02939       BOOLEAN     fDoLowShot = FALSE;
02940        DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("SelectFireAnimation"));
02941 
02942 
02943       //Do different things if we are a monster
02944       if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER)
02945       {
02946             switch( pSoldier->ubBodyType )
02947             {
02948                   case ADULTFEMALEMONSTER:
02949                   case AM_MONSTER:
02950                   case YAF_MONSTER:
02951                   case YAM_MONSTER:
02952 
02953                         return( MONSTER_SPIT_ATTACK );
02954                         break;
02955 
02956                   case LARVAE_MONSTER:
02957 
02958                         break;
02959 
02960                   case INFANT_MONSTER:
02961 
02962                         return( INFANT_ATTACK );
02963                         break;
02964 
02965                   case QUEENMONSTER:
02966 
02967                     return( QUEEN_SPIT );
02968                     break;
02969 
02970             }
02971             return( TRUE );
02972       }
02973 
02974       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == ROBOTNOWEAPON )
02975       {
02976             if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst > 0 )
02977             {
02978                   return( ROBOT_BURST_SHOOT );
02979             }
02980             else
02981             {
02982                   return( ROBOT_SHOOT );
02983             }
02984       }
02985 
02986       // Check for rocket laucncher....
02987       if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].rocketlauncher )
02988       {
02989             return( SHOOT_ROCKET );
02990       }
02991 
02992       // Check for mortar....
02993       if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].mortar )
02994       {
02995             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"SelectFireAnimation: shoot_mortar");
02996             return( SHOOT_MORTAR );
02997       }
02998 
02999       // Check for tank cannon
03000       if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].cannon )
03001       {
03002             return( TANK_SHOOT );
03003       }
03004 
03005       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == TANK_NW || pSoldier->ubBodyType == TANK_NE )
03006       {
03007             return( TANK_BURST );
03008       }
03009 
03010       // Determine which animation to do...depending on stance and gun in hand...
03011       switch ( ubHeight )
03012       {
03013             case ANIM_STAND:
03014 
03015                   usItem = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
03016 
03017                   // CHECK 2ND HAND!
03018                   if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03019                   {
03020                         // Increment the number of people busy doing stuff because of an attack
03021                         //gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
03022                         //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting attack with 2 guns, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
03023 
03024                         return( SHOOT_DUAL_STAND );
03025                   }
03026                   else
03027                   {
03028                         // OK, while standing check distance away from target, and shoot low if we should!
03029                         sDist = PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->sTargetGridNo );
03030 
03031                         //ATE: OK, SEE WERE WE ARE TARGETING....
03032                         GetTargetWorldPositions( pSoldier, pSoldier->sTargetGridNo, &dTargetX, &dTargetY, &dTargetZ );
03033 
03034                         //CalculateSoldierZPos( pSoldier, FIRING_POS, &dFirerZ );
03035 
03036                         if ( sDist <= 2 && dTargetZ <= 100 )
03037                         {
03038                               fDoLowShot = TRUE;
03039                         }
03040 
03041                         // ATE: Made distence away long for psitols such that they never use this....
03042                         //if ( !(Item[ usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED) )
03043                         //{
03044                         //    fDoLowShot = FALSE;
03045                         //}
03046 
03047         // Don't do any low shots if in water
03048         if ( MercInWater( pSoldier ) )
03049         {
03050           fDoLowShot = FALSE;
03051         }
03052         
03053 
03054                         if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst > 0 )
03055                         {
03056                               if ( fDoLowShot )
03057                               {
03058                                     return( FIRE_BURST_LOW_STAND );
03059                               }
03060                               else
03061                               {
03062                                     return( STANDING_BURST );
03063                               }
03064                         }
03065                         else
03066                         {
03067                               if ( fDoLowShot )
03068                               {
03069                                     return( FIRE_LOW_STAND );
03070                               }
03071                               else
03072                               {
03073                                     return( SHOOT_RIFLE_STAND );
03074                               }
03075                         }
03076                   }
03077                   break;
03078 
03079             case ANIM_PRONE:
03080 
03081                   if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst > 0 )
03082                   {
03083 //                      pSoldier->fBurstCompleted = FALSE;
03084                         return( PRONE_BURST );
03085                   }
03086                   else
03087                   {
03088                         if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03089                         {
03090                               return( SHOOT_DUAL_PRONE );
03091                         }
03092                         else
03093                         {
03094                               return( SHOOT_RIFLE_PRONE );
03095                         }
03096                   }
03097                   break;
03098 
03099             case ANIM_CROUCH:
03100 
03101                   if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03102                   {
03103                         // Increment the number of people busy doing stuff because of an attack
03104                         //gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
03105                         //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting attack with 2 guns, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
03106 
03107                         return( SHOOT_DUAL_CROUCH );
03108                   }
03109                   else
03110                   {
03111                         if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst > 0 )
03112                         {
03113       //                      pSoldier->fBurstCompleted = FALSE;
03114                               return( CROUCHED_BURST );
03115                         }
03116                         else
03117                         {
03118                               return( SHOOT_RIFLE_CROUCH );
03119                         }
03120                   }
03121                   break;
03122 
03123             default:
03124                   AssertMsg( FALSE, String( "SelectFireAnimation: ERROR - Invalid height %d", ubHeight ) );
03125                   break;
03126       }
03127 
03128 
03129       // If here, an internal error has occured!
03130       Assert( FALSE );
03131       return ( 0 );
03132 }
03133 
03134 
03135 UINT16 GetMoveStateBasedOnStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubStanceHeight )
03136 {
03137       // Determine which animation to do...depending on stance and gun in hand...
03138       switch ( ubStanceHeight )
03139       {
03140             case ANIM_STAND:
03141                   if ( pSoldier->fUIMovementFast && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
03142                   {
03143                         return( RUNNING );
03144                   }
03145                   else
03146                   {
03147                         return( WALKING );
03148                   }
03149                   break;
03150 
03151             case ANIM_PRONE:
03152                   if ( pSoldier->fUIMovementFast )
03153                   {
03154                         return( CRAWLING );
03155                   }
03156                   else
03157                   {
03158                         return( CRAWLING );
03159                   }
03160                   break;
03161 
03162             case ANIM_CROUCH:
03163                   if ( pSoldier->fUIMovementFast )
03164                   {
03165                         return( SWATTING );
03166                   }
03167                   else
03168                   {
03169                         return( SWATTING );                       
03170                   }
03171                   break;
03172 
03173 
03174             default:
03175                   AssertMsg( FALSE, String( "GetMoveStateBasedOnStance: ERROR - Invalid height %d", ubStanceHeight ) );
03176                   break;
03177       }
03178 
03179 
03180       // If here, an internal error has occured!
03181       Assert( FALSE );
03182       return ( 0 );
03183 }
03184 
03185 
03186 void SelectFallAnimation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03187 {
03188       // Determine which animation to do...depending on stance and gun in hand...
03189       switch ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
03190       {
03191             case ANIM_STAND:
03192                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FLYBACK_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03193                   break;
03194 
03195             case ANIM_PRONE:
03196                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FLYBACK_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03197                   break;
03198       }
03199 
03200 }
03201 
03202 BOOLEAN SoldierReadyWeapon( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03203 {
03204       return( InternalSoldierReadyWeapon( pSoldier, (INT8)pSoldier->bDirection, FALSE ) );
03205 }
03206 
03207 BOOLEAN SoldierReadyWeapon( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sTargetXPos, INT16 sTargetYPos, BOOLEAN fEndReady )
03208 {
03209       INT16                                           sFacingDir;
03210 
03211       sFacingDir = GetDirectionFromXY( sTargetXPos , sTargetYPos, pSoldier );
03212 
03213       return( InternalSoldierReadyWeapon( pSoldier, (INT8)sFacingDir, fEndReady ) );
03214 }
03215 
03216 
03217 BOOLEAN InternalSoldierReadyWeapon( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 sFacingDir, BOOLEAN fEndReady )
03218 {
03219       UINT16 usAnimState;
03220       BOOLEAN     fReturnVal = FALSE;
03221 
03222       // Handle monsters differently
03223       if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER)
03224       {
03225             if ( !fEndReady )
03226             {
03227                   EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, sFacingDir );
03228             }
03229             return( FALSE );
03230       }
03231 
03232       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("InternalSoldierReadyWeapon: PickingAnimation"));
03233       usAnimState = PickSoldierReadyAnimation( pSoldier, fEndReady );
03234 
03235       if ( usAnimState != INVALID_ANIMATION )
03236       {
03237             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usAnimState, 0 , FALSE );
03238             fReturnVal = TRUE;
03239       }
03240 
03241       if ( !fEndReady )
03242       {
03243             // Ready direction for new facing direction
03244             if ( usAnimState == INVALID_ANIMATION )
03245             {
03246                   usAnimState = pSoldier->usAnimState;
03247             }
03248 
03249             EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, sFacingDir, FALSE, usAnimState );
03250 
03251             // Check if facing dir is different from ours and change direction if so!
03252             //if ( sFacingDir != pSoldier->bDirection )
03253             //{
03254             //    DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_CHANGE_FACING, 0 );
03255             //}//
03256 
03257       }
03258 
03259       return( fReturnVal );
03260 }
03261 
03262 UINT16 PickSoldierReadyAnimation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fEndReady )
03263 {
03264        DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("PickSoldierReadyAnimation"));
03265 
03266       // Invalid animation if nothing in our hands
03267       if ( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem == NOTHING )
03268       {
03269             return( INVALID_ANIMATION );
03270       }
03271 
03272       if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
03273       {
03274             return( INVALID_ANIMATION );
03275       }
03276 
03277       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == ROBOTNOWEAPON )
03278       {
03279             return( INVALID_ANIMATION );
03280       }
03281 
03282       // Check if we have a gun.....
03283       if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass != IC_GUN && !Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].grenadelauncher )
03284       {
03285             return( INVALID_ANIMATION );
03286       }
03287 
03288       if ( Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].rocketlauncher )
03289       {
03290             return( INVALID_ANIMATION );
03291       }
03292 
03293       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == TANK_NW || pSoldier->ubBodyType == TANK_NE )
03294       {
03295             return( INVALID_ANIMATION );
03296       }
03297 
03298       if ( fEndReady )
03299       {
03300             // IF our gun is already drawn, do not change animation, just direction
03301             if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ( ANIM_FIREREADY | ANIM_FIRE )) 
03302             {
03303 
03304                   switch ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
03305                   {
03306                         case ANIM_STAND:
03307 
03308                               // CHECK 2ND HAND!
03309                               if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03310                               {
03311                                     return( END_DUAL_STAND );
03312                               }
03313                               else
03314                               {
03315                                     return( END_RIFLE_STAND );
03316                               }
03317                               break;
03318 
03319                         case ANIM_PRONE:
03320 
03321                               if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03322                               {
03323                                     return( END_DUAL_PRONE );
03324                               }
03325                               else
03326                               {
03327                                     return( END_RIFLE_PRONE );
03328                               }
03329                               break;
03330 
03331                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
03332 
03333                               // CHECK 2ND HAND!
03334                               if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03335                               {
03336                                     return( END_DUAL_CROUCH );
03337                               }
03338                               else
03339                               {
03340                                     return( END_RIFLE_CROUCH );
03341                               }
03342                               break;
03343 
03344                   }
03345 
03346             }
03347       }
03348       else
03349       {
03350 
03351             // IF our gun is already drawn, do not change animation, just direction
03352             if ( !(gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ( ANIM_FIREREADY | ANIM_FIRE ) ) )                    
03353             {
03354 
03355                   {
03356                         switch ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
03357                         {
03358                               case ANIM_STAND:
03359 
03360                                     // CHECK 2ND HAND!
03361                                     if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03362                                     {
03363                                           return( READY_DUAL_STAND );
03364                                     }
03365                                     else
03366                                     {
03367                                           return( READY_RIFLE_STAND );
03368                                     }
03369                                     break;
03370 
03371                               case ANIM_PRONE:
03372                                     // Go into crouch, turn, then go into prone again
03373                                     //ChangeSoldierStance( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
03374                                     //pSoldier->ubDesiredHeight = ANIM_PRONE;
03375                                     //ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, PRONE_UP );
03376                                     if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03377                                     {
03378                                           return( READY_DUAL_PRONE );
03379                                     }
03380                                     else
03381                                     {
03382                                           return( READY_RIFLE_PRONE );
03383                                     }
03384                                     break;
03385 
03386                               case ANIM_CROUCH:
03387 
03388                                     // CHECK 2ND HAND!
03389                                     if ( IsValidSecondHandShot( pSoldier ) )
03390                                     {
03391                                           return( READY_DUAL_CROUCH );
03392                                     }
03393                                     else
03394                                     {
03395                                           return( READY_RIFLE_CROUCH );
03396                                     }
03397                                     break;
03398 
03399                         }
03400                   }
03401 
03402             }
03403       }
03404 
03405       return( INVALID_ANIMATION );
03406 }
03407 
03408 extern SOLDIERTYPE * FreeUpAttackerGivenTarget( UINT8 ubID, UINT8 ubTargetID );
03409 extern SOLDIERTYPE * ReduceAttackBusyGivenTarget( UINT8 ubID, UINT8 ubTargetID );
03410 
03411 
03412 // ATE: THIS FUNCTION IS USED FOR ALL SOLDIER TAKE DAMAGE FUNCTIONS!
03413 void EVENT_SoldierGotHit( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usWeaponIndex, INT16 sDamage, INT16 sBreathLoss, UINT16 bDirection, UINT16 sRange, UINT8 ubAttackerID, UINT8 ubSpecial, UINT8 ubHitLocation, INT16 sSubsequent, INT16 sLocationGrid )
03414 {
03415       UINT8       ubCombinedLoss, ubVolume, ubReason;
03416       SOLDIERTYPE * pNewSoldier;
03417 
03418       ubReason = 0;
03419 
03420       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3 , "EVENT_SoldierGotHit");
03421 
03422       // ATE: If we have gotten hit, but are still in our attack animation, reduce count!
03423       switch ( pSoldier->usAnimState )
03424       {
03425             case SHOOT_ROCKET:
03426             case SHOOT_MORTAR:
03427             case THROW_ITEM:
03428             case LOB_ITEM:
03429                   
03430                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - ATTACK ANIMATION %s ENDED BY HIT ANIMATION, Now %d", gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].zAnimStr, gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount ) );
03431                   ReduceAttackBusyCount( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
03432                   break;
03433       }
03434 
03435       // DO STUFF COMMON FOR ALL TYPES
03436       if (  ubAttackerID != NOBODY)
03437       {
03438             MercPtrs[ubAttackerID]->bLastAttackHit = TRUE;
03439       }
03440 
03441       // Set attacker's ID
03442       pSoldier->ubAttackerID = ubAttackerID;
03443 
03444       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
03445       {
03446         // Increment  being attacked count
03447         pSoldier->bBeingAttackedCount++;
03448   }
03449 
03450       // if defender is a vehicle, there will be no hit animation played!
03451       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
03452       {
03453             // Increment the number of people busy doing stuff because of an attack (busy doing hit anim!)
03454             gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
03455             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Person got hit, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
03456       }
03457 
03458       // ATE; Save hit location info...( for later anim determination stuff )
03459       pSoldier->ubHitLocation = ubHitLocation;
03460 
03461       // handle morale for heavy damage attacks
03462       if ( sDamage > 25 )
03463       {
03464             if ( pSoldier->ubAttackerID != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubAttackerID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03465             {
03466                   HandleMoraleEvent( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubAttackerID ], MORALE_DID_LOTS_OF_DAMAGE, MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubAttackerID ]->sSectorX, MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubAttackerID ]->sSectorY, MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubAttackerID ]->bSectorZ );
03467             }
03468             if (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
03469             {
03470                   HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_TOOK_LOTS_OF_DAMAGE, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
03471             }
03472       }
03473 
03474       // SWITCH IN TYPE OF WEAPON
03475   if ( ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_TOSSED_OBJECT_SPECIAL )
03476   {
03477             ubReason = TAKE_DAMAGE_OBJECT;
03478   }
03479       else if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & IC_TENTACLES )
03480       {
03481             ubReason = TAKE_DAMAGE_TENTACLES;
03482       }
03483       // marke take out gunfire if ammotype is explosive
03484       
03485                 // callahan update start
03486                 // setting new func to intercept testhit
03487       else if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & ( IC_GUN | IC_THROWING_KNIFE ) && ubAttackerID == NOBODY)
03488       {
03489             sBreathLoss += BP_GET_HIT;
03490             ubReason = TAKE_DAMAGE_GUNFIRE;
03491       }
03492       // callahan update end
03493                
03494       else if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & ( IC_GUN | IC_THROWING_KNIFE ) && AmmoTypes[MercPtrs[ubAttackerID]->inv[MercPtrs[ubAttackerID]->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].explosionSize <= 1)
03495       {     
03496             if ( ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_SLEEP_DART_SPECIAL )
03497             {
03498                   UINT32      uiChance;
03499 
03500                   // put the drug in!
03501                   pSoldier->bSleepDrugCounter = 10;
03502 
03503                   uiChance = SleepDartSuccumbChance( pSoldier );
03504 
03505                   if ( PreRandom( 100 ) < uiChance )
03506                   {
03507                         // succumb to the drug!
03508                         sBreathLoss = (INT16)( pSoldier->bBreathMax * 100 );
03509                   }
03510 
03511             }
03512             else if ( ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_BLINDED_BY_SPIT_SPECIAL )
03513             {
03514                   // blinded!!
03515                   if ( (pSoldier->bBlindedCounter == 0)  )
03516                   {
03517                         // say quote
03518                         if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
03519                         {
03520                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_BLINDED );
03521                         }
03522                         DecayIndividualOpplist( pSoldier ); 
03523                   }
03524                   // will always increase counter by at least 1
03525                   pSoldier->bBlindedCounter += (sDamage / 8) + 1;
03526 
03527       // Dirty panel
03528       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
03529             }
03530             sBreathLoss += BP_GET_HIT;
03531             ubReason = TAKE_DAMAGE_GUNFIRE;
03532       }
03533       else if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & IC_BLADE )
03534       {           
03535             sBreathLoss = BP_GET_HIT;
03536             ubReason = TAKE_DAMAGE_BLADE;
03537       }
03538       else if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & IC_PUNCH )
03539       {     
03540             // damage from hand-to-hand is 1/4 normal, 3/4 breath.. the sDamage value
03541             // is actually how much breath we'll take away
03542             sBreathLoss = sDamage * 100;
03543             sDamage = sDamage / PUNCH_REAL_DAMAGE_PORTION;
03544             if ( AreInMeanwhile() && gCurrentMeanwhileDef.ubMeanwhileID == INTERROGATION )
03545             {
03546                   sBreathLoss = 0;
03547                   sDamage /= 2;
03548             }
03549             ubReason = TAKE_DAMAGE_HANDTOHAND;
03550       }
03551         // marke added one 'or' for explosive ammo. variation of: AmmoTypes[pSoldier->inv[pSoldier->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].explosionSize > 1
03552       //  extracting attackers ammo type
03553       else if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & IC_EXPLOSV || AmmoTypes[MercPtrs[ubAttackerID]->inv[MercPtrs[ubAttackerID]->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].explosionSize > 1)
03554       {     
03555             INT8 bDeafValue;
03556 
03557             bDeafValue = Explosive[ Item[ usWeaponIndex ].ubClassIndex ].ubVolume / 10;
03558             if ( bDeafValue == 0 )
03559                   bDeafValue = 1;
03560 
03561             // Lesh: flashbang does damage
03562             switch ( ubSpecial )
03563             {
03564             case FIRE_WEAPON_BLINDED_AND_DEAFENED:
03565                   pSoldier->bDeafenedCounter = bDeafValue;
03566                 //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Soldier is blinded and deafened" );
03567 
03568                   // if soldier in building OR underground
03569                   if ( InBuilding(sLocationGrid) || (gbWorldSectorZ) )
03570                   {
03571                         // deal max special damage
03572                         pSoldier->bBlindedCounter = (INT8)Explosive[ Item[ usWeaponIndex ].ubClassIndex ].ubDuration;
03573                         // say quote
03574                         if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
03575                         {
03576                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_BLINDED );
03577                         }
03578                   }
03579             else if ( NightTime() ) // if soldier outside at night
03580                   {
03581                         // halve effect
03582                         pSoldier->bBlindedCounter = (INT8)Explosive[ Item[ usWeaponIndex ].ubClassIndex ].ubDuration / 2;
03583                         if ( pSoldier->bBlindedCounter == 0 )
03584                               pSoldier->bBlindedCounter = 1;
03585                         pSoldier->bDeafenedCounter /= 2;
03586                         // say quote
03587                         if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
03588                         {
03589                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_BLINDED );
03590                         }
03591                   }
03592                   DecayIndividualOpplist( pSoldier ); 
03593                   break;
03594 
03595             case FIRE_WEAPON_BLINDED:
03596                   break;
03597 
03598             case FIRE_WEAPON_DEAFENED:
03599                   //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Soldier is deafened" );
03600                   pSoldier->bDeafenedCounter = bDeafValue;
03601                   break;
03602             };
03603 
03604             if ( usWeaponIndex == STRUCTURE_EXPLOSION )
03605             {
03606                   ubReason = TAKE_DAMAGE_STRUCTURE_EXPLOSION;
03607             }
03608             else
03609             {
03610                   ubReason = TAKE_DAMAGE_EXPLOSION;
03611             }
03612       }
03613       else
03614       {
03615             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Soldier Control: Weapon class not handled in SoldierGotHit( ) %d", usWeaponIndex ) );
03616       }
03617 
03618 
03619       // CJC: moved to after SoldierTakeDamage so that any quotes from the defender
03620       // will not be said if they are knocked out or killed
03621       if ( ubReason != TAKE_DAMAGE_TENTACLES && ubReason != TAKE_DAMAGE_OBJECT )
03622       {
03623             // OK, OK: THis is hairy, however, it's ness. because the normal freeup call uses the
03624             // attckers intended target, and here we want to use thier actual target....
03625 
03626             // ATE: If it's from GUNFIRE damage, keep in mind bullets...
03627             if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & IC_GUN )
03628             {
03629                   pNewSoldier = FreeUpAttackerGivenTarget( pSoldier->ubAttackerID, pSoldier->ubID );
03630             }
03631             else
03632             {
03633                   pNewSoldier = ReduceAttackBusyGivenTarget( pSoldier->ubAttackerID, pSoldier->ubID );
03634             }
03635 
03636             if (pNewSoldier != NULL)
03637             {
03638                   pSoldier = pNewSoldier;
03639             }
03640             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Tried to free up attacker, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
03641       }
03642 
03643 
03644       // OK, If we are a vehicle.... damage vehicle...( people inside... )
03645       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
03646       {
03647             SoldierTakeDamage( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH, sDamage, sBreathLoss, ubReason, pSoldier->ubAttackerID, NOWHERE, FALSE, TRUE );
03648             return;
03649       }
03650 
03651       // DEDUCT LIFE
03652       ubCombinedLoss = SoldierTakeDamage( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH, sDamage, sBreathLoss, ubReason, pSoldier->ubAttackerID, NOWHERE, FALSE, TRUE );
03653 
03654       // ATE: OK, Let's check our ASSIGNMENT state,
03655       // If anything other than on a squad or guard, make them guard....
03656       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03657       {
03658             if ( pSoldier->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY && pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW )
03659             {
03660                   if( pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
03661                   {
03662                         pSoldier->fMercAsleep = FALSE;
03663                         pSoldier -> fForcedToStayAwake = FALSE;
03664 
03665                         // refresh map screen
03666                         fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
03667                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
03668                   }
03669 
03670                   AddCharacterToAnySquad( pSoldier );
03671             }
03672       }
03673 
03674 
03675       // SCREAM!!!!
03676       ubVolume = CalcScreamVolume( pSoldier, ubCombinedLoss );
03677 
03678       // IF WE ARE AT A HIT_STOP ANIMATION
03679       // DO APPROPRIATE HITWHILE DOWN ANIMATION
03680       if ( !( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_HITSTOP ) || pSoldier->usAnimState != JFK_HITDEATH_STOP ) 
03681       {
03682             MakeNoise( pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->bOverTerrainType, ubVolume, NOISE_SCREAM);
03683       }
03684 
03685       // IAN ADDED THIS SAT JUNE 14th : HAVE TO SHOW VICTIM!
03686       if (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && pSoldier->bVisible != -1 && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03687             LocateSoldier(pSoldier->ubID,DONTSETLOCATOR);
03688 
03689 
03690       if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & IC_BLADE )
03691   {
03692         PlayJA2Sample( (UINT32)( KNIFE_IMPACT ), RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );               
03693   }
03694   else
03695   {
03696         PlayJA2Sample( (UINT32)( BULLET_IMPACT_1 + Random(3) ), RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );                  
03697   }
03698 
03699       // PLAY RANDOM GETTING HIT SOUND
03700       // ONLY IF WE ARE CONSCIOUS!
03701       if ( pSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
03702       {
03703             if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
03704             {
03705                   // Exploding crow...
03706                   PlayJA2Sample( CROW_EXPLODE_1, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );              
03707             }
03708             else
03709             {
03710       // ATE: This is to disallow large amounts of smaples being played which is load!
03711       if ( pSoldier->fGettingHit && pSoldier->usAniCode != STANDING_BURST_HIT )
03712       {
03713 
03714       }
03715       else
03716       {
03717                     DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_HIT1 + Random( 2 ) ) );
03718       }
03719             }
03720       }
03721 
03722       // CHECK FOR DOING HIT WHILE DOWN
03723       if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_HITSTOP ) ) 
03724       {
03725             switch( pSoldier->usAnimState )
03726             {
03727                   case FLYBACKHIT_STOP:
03728                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, FALLBACK_DEATHTWICH, 0, FALSE );
03729                         break;
03730 
03731                   case STAND_FALLFORWARD_STOP:
03732                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_DEATHTWITCHNB, 0, FALSE );
03733                         break;
03734 
03735                   case JFK_HITDEATH_STOP:
03736                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, JFK_HITDEATH_TWITCHB, 0, FALSE );
03737                         break;
03738 
03739                   case FALLBACKHIT_STOP:
03740                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, FALLBACK_HIT_DEATHTWITCHNB, 0, FALSE );
03741                         break;
03742 
03743                   case PRONE_LAYFROMHIT_STOP:
03744                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, PRONE_HIT_DEATHTWITCHNB, 0, FALSE );
03745                         break;
03746 
03747                   case PRONE_HITDEATH_STOP:
03748                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, PRONE_HIT_DEATHTWITCHB, 0 , FALSE );
03749                         break;
03750 
03751                   case FALLFORWARD_HITDEATH_STOP:
03752                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_DEATHTWITCHB, 0 , FALSE );
03753                         break;
03754 
03755                   case FALLBACK_HITDEATH_STOP:
03756                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, FALLBACK_HIT_DEATHTWITCHB, 0 , FALSE );
03757                         break;
03758 
03759                   case FALLOFF_DEATH_STOP:
03760                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, FALLOFF_TWITCHB, 0 , FALSE );
03761                         break;
03762 
03763                   case FALLOFF_STOP:
03764                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, FALLOFF_TWITCHNB, 0 , FALSE );
03765                         break;
03766 
03767                   case FALLOFF_FORWARD_DEATH_STOP:
03768                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, FALLOFF_FORWARD_TWITCHB, 0 , FALSE );
03769                         break;
03770 
03771                   case FALLOFF_FORWARD_STOP:
03772                         ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, FALLOFF_FORWARD_TWITCHNB, 0 , FALSE );
03773                         break;
03774                         
03775                   default:
03776                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "Soldier Control: Death state %d has no death hit", pSoldier->usAnimState ) );
03777 
03778             }
03779             return;
03780       }
03781 
03782       // Set goback to aim after hit flag!
03783       // Only if we were aiming!
03784       if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_FIREREADY ) 
03785       {
03786             pSoldier->fGoBackToAimAfterHit = TRUE;
03787       }
03788 
03789       // IF COWERING, PLAY SPECIFIC GENERIC HIT STAND...
03790       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_COWERING ) 
03791       {
03792             if ( pSoldier->bLife == 0 || IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( pSoldier ) )
03793             {
03794                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_STAND, 0 , FALSE );
03795             }
03796             else
03797             {
03798                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CIV_COWER_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03799             }
03800             return;
03801       }
03802 
03803       // Change based on body type
03804       switch( pSoldier->ubBodyType )
03805       {
03806             case COW:
03807                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, COW_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03808                   return;
03809                   break;
03810 
03811             case BLOODCAT:
03812                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, BLOODCAT_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03813                   return;
03814                   break;
03815 
03816             case ADULTFEMALEMONSTER:
03817             case AM_MONSTER:
03818             case YAF_MONSTER:
03819             case YAM_MONSTER:
03820 
03821                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, ADULTMONSTER_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03822                   return;
03823                   break;
03824 
03825             case LARVAE_MONSTER:
03826                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, LARVAE_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03827                   return;
03828                   break;
03829 
03830             case QUEENMONSTER:
03831                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, QUEEN_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03832                   return;
03833                   break;
03834 
03835             case CRIPPLECIV:
03836 
03837                   {
03838                         // OK, do some code here to allow the fact that poor buddy can be thrown back if it's a big enough hit...
03839                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CRIPPLE_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03840 
03841                         //pSoldier->bLife = 0;
03842                         //EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CRIPPLE_DIE_FLYBACK, 0 , FALSE );
03843 
03844 
03845                   }
03846                   return;
03847                   break;
03848 
03849             case ROBOTNOWEAPON:
03850                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, ROBOTNW_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03851                   return;
03852                   break;
03853 
03854 
03855             case INFANT_MONSTER:
03856                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, INFANT_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03857                   return;
03858 
03859             case CROW:
03860 
03861                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CROW_DIE, 0 , FALSE );
03862                   return;
03863 
03864             //case FATCIV:
03865             case MANCIV:
03866             case MINICIV:
03867             case DRESSCIV:
03868             case HATKIDCIV:
03869             case KIDCIV:
03870                   
03871                   // OK, if life is 0 and not set as dead ( this is a death hit... )
03872                   if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) && pSoldier->bLife == 0 )
03873                   {
03874                         // Randomize death!
03875                         if ( Random( 2 ) )
03876                         {
03877                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CIV_DIE2, 0 , FALSE );
03878                               return;
03879                         }
03880                   }
03881 
03882                   // IF here, go generic hit ALWAYS.....
03883                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_STAND, 0 , FALSE );
03884                   return;
03885                   break;
03886       }
03887 
03888       // If here, we are a merc, check if we are in water
03889       if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == LOW_WATER )
03890       {
03891                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, WATER_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03892                   return;           
03893       }
03894       if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
03895       {
03896                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, DEEP_WATER_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03897                   return;           
03898       }
03899 
03900 
03901       // SWITCH IN TYPE OF WEAPON
