03902       if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & ( IC_GUN | IC_THROWING_KNIFE ) )
03903       {     
03904             SoldierGotHitGunFire( pSoldier, usWeaponIndex, sDamage, bDirection, sRange, ubAttackerID, ubSpecial, ubHitLocation ); 
03905       }
03906       if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & IC_BLADE )
03907       {     
03908             SoldierGotHitBlade( pSoldier, usWeaponIndex, sDamage, bDirection, sRange, ubAttackerID, ubSpecial, ubHitLocation ); 
03909       }
03910         // marke setting ammo explosions included here with 3rd 'or' including ubReason
03911       if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & IC_EXPLOSV || Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & IC_TENTACLES || ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_EXPLOSION )
03912       {     
03913             SoldierGotHitExplosion( pSoldier, usWeaponIndex, sDamage, bDirection, sRange, ubAttackerID, ubSpecial, ubHitLocation ); 
03914       }
03915       if ( Item[ usWeaponIndex ].usItemClass & IC_PUNCH )
03916       {     
03917             SoldierGotHitPunch( pSoldier, usWeaponIndex, sDamage, bDirection, sRange, ubAttackerID, ubSpecial, ubHitLocation ); 
03918       }
03919 
03920 }
03921 
03922 UINT8 CalcScreamVolume( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT8 ubCombinedLoss )
03923 {
03924       // NB explosions are so loud they should drown out screams
03925       UINT8 ubVolume;
03926 
03927       if (ubCombinedLoss < 1)
03928       {
03929             ubVolume = 1;
03930       }
03931       else
03932       {
03933             ubVolume = ubCombinedLoss;
03934       }
03935 
03936       // Victim yells out in pain, making noise.  Yelps are louder from greater
03937       // wounds, but softer for more experienced soldiers.
03938 
03939       if (ubVolume > (10 - EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) ))
03940       {
03941             ubVolume = 10 - EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier );
03942       }
03943 
03944 /*
03945             // the "Speck factor"...  He's a whiner, and extra-sensitive to pain!
03946             if (ptr->trait == NERVOUS)
03947                   ubVolume += 2;
03948 */
03949 
03950       if (ubVolume < 0)
03951       {
03952        ubVolume = 0;
03953       }
03954 
03955       return( ubVolume );
03956 }
03957 
03958 
03959 void DoGenericHit( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubSpecial, INT16 bDirection )
03960 {
03961   // Based on stance, select generic hit animation
03962       switch ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
03963       {
03964             case ANIM_STAND:
03965                   // For now, check if we are affected by a burst
03966                   // For now, if the weapon was a gun, special 1 == burst
03967                   // ATE: Only do this for mercs!
03968                   if ( ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_BURST_SPECIAL && pSoldier->ubBodyType <= REGFEMALE )
03969                   {
03970                         //SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, bDirection );
03971                         EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, (INT8)bDirection );
03972                         EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->bDirection );
03973 
03974                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STANDING_BURST_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03975                   }
03976                   else
03977                   {
03978                         // Check in hand for rifle
03979                         if ( SoldierCarriesTwoHandedWeapon( pSoldier ) )
03980                         {
03981                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, RIFLE_STAND_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
03982                         }
03983                         else
03984                         {
03985                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_STAND, 0 , FALSE );
03986                         }
03987                   }
03988                   break;
03989 
03990             case ANIM_PRONE:
03991 
03992                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_PRONE, 0 , FALSE );
03993                   break;
03994 
03995             case ANIM_CROUCH:
03996                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_CROUCH, 0 , FALSE );
03997                   break;
03998 
03999       }
04000 }
04001 
04002 
04003 void SoldierGotHitGunFire( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usWeaponIndex, INT16 sDamage, UINT16 bDirection, UINT16 sRange, UINT8 ubAttackerID, UINT8 ubSpecial, UINT8 ubHitLocation )
04004 {
04005       UINT16      usNewGridNo;
04006       BOOLEAN     fBlownAway = FALSE;
04007       BOOLEAN     fHeadHit = FALSE;
04008       BOOLEAN     fFallenOver = FALSE;
04009       
04010       // MAYBE CHANGE TO SPECIAL ANIMATION BASED ON VALUE SET BY DAMAGE CALCULATION CODE
04011       // ALL THESE ONLY WORK ON STANDING PEOPLE
04012       if (!(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER) && gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND)
04013       {
04014             if (gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND )
04015             {
04016                   if (ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_HEAD_EXPLODE_SPECIAL)
04017                   {
04018                         if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE ] )
04019                         {
04020                               if (SpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, Menptr[ubAttackerID].sGridNo ) <= MAX_DISTANCE_FOR_MESSY_DEATH || (SpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, Menptr[ubAttackerID].sGridNo ) <= MAX_BARRETT_DISTANCE_FOR_MESSY_DEATH && usWeaponIndex == BARRETT ))
04021                               {
04022                                     usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, (INT8)( DirectionInc( pSoldier->bDirection ) ) );
04023 
04024                                     // CHECK OK DESTINATION!
04025                                     if ( OKFallDirection( pSoldier, usNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->bDirection, JFK_HITDEATH ) )
04026                                     {
04027                                           usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)usNewGridNo, (INT8)( DirectionInc( pSoldier->bDirection ) ) );
04028 
04029                                           if ( OKFallDirection( pSoldier, usNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->bDirection, pSoldier->usAnimState ) )
04030                                           {
04031                                                 fHeadHit = TRUE;
04032                                           }
04033                                     }
04034                               }
04035                         }
04036                   }
04037                   else if (ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_CHEST_EXPLODE_SPECIAL)
04038                   {
04039                         if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE ] )
04040                         {
04041                               if (SpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, Menptr[ubAttackerID].sGridNo ) <= MAX_DISTANCE_FOR_MESSY_DEATH || (SpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, Menptr[ubAttackerID].sGridNo ) <= MAX_BARRETT_DISTANCE_FOR_MESSY_DEATH && usWeaponIndex == BARRETT ))
04042                               {
04043 
04044                                     // possibly play torso explosion anim!
04045                                     if (pSoldier->bDirection == bDirection)
04046                                     {
04047                                           usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( gOppositeDirection[ pSoldier->bDirection ] ) );
04048 
04049                                           if ( OKFallDirection( pSoldier, usNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, gOppositeDirection[ bDirection ], FLYBACK_HIT ) )
04050                                           {
04051                                                 usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)usNewGridNo, DirectionInc( gOppositeDirection[ bDirection ] ) );
04052 
04053                                                 if ( OKFallDirection( pSoldier, usNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, gOppositeDirection[ bDirection ], pSoldier->usAnimState ) )
04054                                                 {
04055                                                       fBlownAway = TRUE;
04056                                                 }
04057                                           }
04058                                     }
04059                               }
04060                         }
04061                   }
04062                   else if (ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_LEG_FALLDOWN_SPECIAL)
04063                   {
04064                         // possibly play fall over anim!
04065                         // this one is NOT restricted by distance
04066                         if (IsValidStance( pSoldier, ANIM_PRONE ) )
04067                         {
04068                               // Can't be in water, or not standing
04069                               if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND && !MercInWater( pSoldier ) )
04070                               {
04071                                     fFallenOver = TRUE;
04072                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, gzLateLocalizedString[ 20 ], pSoldier->name );
04073                               }
04074                         }
04075                   }
04076             }
04077       }
04078 
04079       // IF HERE AND GUY IS DEAD, RETURN!
04080       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD )
04081       {
04082             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Releasesoldierattacker,Dead soldier hit" ) );
04083             ReleaseSoldiersAttacker( pSoldier );
04084             return;
04085       }
04086 
04087       if ( fFallenOver )
04088       {
04089             SoldierCollapse( pSoldier );
04090             return;
04091       }
04092 
04093       if ( fBlownAway )
04094       {     
04095             // Only for mercs...
04096             if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType < 4 )
04097             {
04098                   ChangeToFlybackAnimation( pSoldier, (INT8)bDirection );
04099                   return;
04100             }
04101       }
04102 
04103       if ( fHeadHit )
04104       {           
04105             // Only for mercs ( or KIDS! )
04106             if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType < 4 || pSoldier->ubBodyType == HATKIDCIV || pSoldier->ubBodyType == KIDCIV )
04107             {
04108                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, JFK_HITDEATH, 0 , FALSE );                
04109                   return;
04110             }
04111       }
04112 
04113   DoGenericHit( pSoldier, ubSpecial, bDirection );
04114 
04115 }
04116 
04117 void SoldierGotHitExplosion( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usWeaponIndex, INT16 sDamage, UINT16 bDirection, UINT16 sRange, UINT8 ubAttackerID, UINT8 ubSpecial, UINT8 ubHitLocation )
04118 {
04119       INT16 sNewGridNo;
04120       
04121       // IF HERE AND GUY IS DEAD, RETURN!
04122       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD )
04123       {
04124             return;
04125       }
04126 
04127       //check for services
04128       ReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier );
04129       GivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier );
04130 
04131 
04132       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE ] )
04133       {
04134             if ( Explosive[ Item[ usWeaponIndex ].ubClassIndex ].ubRadius >= 3 && pSoldier->bLife == 0 && gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_PRONE )
04135             {
04136                   if ( sRange >= 2 && sRange <= 4 )
04137                   {
04138                         DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_HIT1 + Random( 2 ) ) );
04139 
04140                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CHARIOTS_OF_FIRE, 0 , FALSE );
04141                         return;     
04142                   }
04143                   else if ( sRange <= 1 )
04144                   {
04145                         DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_HIT1 + Random( 2 ) ) );
04146 
04147                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, BODYEXPLODING, 0 , FALSE );
04148                         return;
04149                   }
04150             }
04151       }
04152 
04153   // If we can't fal back or such, so generic hit...
04154       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType >= 4 )
04155       {
04156     DoGenericHit( pSoldier, 0, bDirection );
04157     return;
04158   }
04159 
04160       // Lesh: possible soldier behavior when affected by flashbang
04161       // Soldier can:
04162       //   1. stand as if there was no explosion at all
04163       //   2. crouch. represent that soldier didn't expect such blow and instinctively
04164       //      made defensive movement to protect his body
04165       //   3. fall forward. again, he didn't expect that something will explode behind
04166       //      him and deafens him
04167       //   4. fall backward. unexpected blast, fear, clumsy moves and soldier flies backward.
04168 
04169       // Based on stance, select generic hit animation
04170       switch ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
04171       {
04172             case ANIM_STAND:
04173                   if ( ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_DEAFENED )
04174                   {
04175                         switch( Random(10) )
04176                         {
04177                         case 0:
04178                         case 1:
04179                         case 2:
04180                         case 3:
04181                         case 4:
04182                         case 5:
04183                               // 6 of 10 - crouch
04184                               ChangeSoldierStance( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
04185                               break;
04186                         case 6:
04187                         case 7:
04188                         case 8:
04189                               // 3 of 10 - fall forward
04190                     BeginTyingToFall( pSoldier );
04191                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FALLFORWARD_FROMHIT_STAND, 0, FALSE );
04192                               break;
04193                         case 9:
04194                               // 1 of 10 - still standing
04195                               DoGenericHit( pSoldier, 0, bDirection );
04196                               break;
04197                         };
04198                         break;
04199                   }
04200                   else if ( ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_BLINDED_AND_DEAFENED )
04201                   {
04202                         switch( Random(10) )
04203                         {
04204                         case 0:
04205                         case 1:
04206                         case 2:
04207                         case 3:
04208                         case 4:
04209                               // 5 of 10 - crouch
04210                               ChangeSoldierStance( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
04211                               break;
04212                         case 5:
04213                         case 6:
04214                         case 7:
04215                         case 8:
04216                               // 4 of 10 - fall backward (if possible) either forward
04217                               // Check behind us!
04218                               sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( gOppositeDirection[ bDirection ] ) );
04219                               if ( OKFallDirection( pSoldier, sNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, gOppositeDirection[ bDirection ], FLYBACK_HIT ) )
04220                               {
04221                                     EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, (INT8)bDirection );
04222                                     EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->bDirection );
04223                                     ChangeToFallbackAnimation( pSoldier, (INT8)bDirection );
04224                               }
04225                               else
04226                               {
04227                                     BeginTyingToFall( pSoldier );
04228                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FALLFORWARD_FROMHIT_STAND, 0, FALSE );
04229                               }
04230                               break;
04231                         case 9:
04232                               // 1 of 10 - still standing
04233                               DoGenericHit( pSoldier, 0, bDirection );
04234                               break;
04235                         };
04236                         break;
04237                   }
04238                   else if ( ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_BLINDED )
04239                   {
04240                   }
04241 
04242             case ANIM_CROUCH:
04243 
04244                   if ( ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_BLINDED ||
04245                          ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_BLINDED_AND_DEAFENED ||
04246                          ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_DEAFENED )
04247                   {
04248                         DoGenericHit( pSoldier, 0, bDirection );
04249                         break;
04250                   }
04251 
04252                   EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, (INT8)bDirection );
04253                   EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->bDirection );
04254 
04255                   // Check behind us!
04256                   sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( gOppositeDirection[ bDirection ] ) );
04257 
04258                   if ( OKFallDirection( pSoldier, sNewGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, gOppositeDirection[ bDirection ], FLYBACK_HIT ) )
04259                   {
04260                         ChangeToFallbackAnimation( pSoldier, (INT8)bDirection );
04261                   }
04262                   else
04263                   {
04264                         if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND )
04265                         {
04266           BeginTyingToFall( pSoldier );
04267                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FALLFORWARD_FROMHIT_STAND, 0, FALSE );
04268                         }
04269                         else
04270                         {
04271                               SoldierCollapse( pSoldier );
04272                         }
04273                   }
04274                   break;
04275 
04276             case ANIM_PRONE:
04277 
04278                   SoldierCollapse( pSoldier );
04279                   break;
04280       }
04281 
04282 }
04283 
04284 
04285 void SoldierGotHitBlade( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usWeaponIndex, INT16 sDamage, UINT16 bDirection, UINT16 sRange, UINT8 ubAttackerID, UINT8 ubSpecial, UINT8 ubHitLocation )
04286 {
04287       
04288       // IF HERE AND GUY IS DEAD, RETURN!
04289       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD )
04290       {
04291             return;
04292       }
04293 
04294 
04295       // Based on stance, select generic hit animation
04296       switch ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
04297       {
04298             case ANIM_STAND:
04299 
04300                   // Check in hand for rifle
04301                   if ( SoldierCarriesTwoHandedWeapon( pSoldier ) )
04302                   {
04303                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, RIFLE_STAND_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
04304                   }
04305                   else
04306                   {
04307                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_STAND, 0 , FALSE );
04308                   }
04309                   break;
04310 
04311             case ANIM_CROUCH:
04312                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_CROUCH, 0 , FALSE );
04313                   break;
04314 
04315             case ANIM_PRONE:
04316                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_PRONE, 0 , FALSE );
04317                   break;
04318       }
04319 
04320 }
04321 
04322 
04323 void SoldierGotHitPunch( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usWeaponIndex, INT16 sDamage, UINT16 bDirection, UINT16 sRange, UINT8 ubAttackerID, UINT8 ubSpecial, UINT8 ubHitLocation )
04324 {
04325       
04326       // IF HERE AND GUY IS DEAD, RETURN!
04327       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD )
04328       {
04329             return;
04330       }
04331 
04332       // Based on stance, select generic hit animation
04333       switch ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
04334       {
04335             case ANIM_STAND:
04336                   // Check in hand for rifle
04337                   if ( SoldierCarriesTwoHandedWeapon( pSoldier ) )
04338                   {
04339                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, RIFLE_STAND_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
04340                   }
04341                   else
04342                   {
04343                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_STAND, 0 , FALSE );
04344                   }
04345                   break;
04346 
04347             case ANIM_CROUCH:
04348                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_CROUCH, 0 , FALSE );
04349                   break;
04350 
04351             case ANIM_PRONE:
04352                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GENERIC_HIT_PRONE, 0 , FALSE );
04353                   break;
04354 
04355       }
04356 
04357 }
04358 
04359 
04360 BOOLEAN EVENT_InternalGetNewSoldierPath( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 sDestGridNo, UINT16 usMovementAnim, BOOLEAN fFromUI, BOOLEAN fForceRestartAnim )
04361 {
04362       INT32 iDest;
04363       INT16 sNewGridNo;
04364       BOOLEAN fContinue;
04365       UINT32      uiDist;
04366       UINT16      usAnimState;
04367       UINT16      usMoveAnimState = usMovementAnim;
04368       INT16                                     sMercGridNo;
04369       UINT16                                    usPathingData[ MAX_PATH_LIST_SIZE ];
04370       UINT8                                     ubPathingMaxDirection;
04371       BOOLEAN                                   fAdvancePath = TRUE;
04372       UINT8                                     fFlags = 0;
04373 
04374       // Ifd this code, make true if a player
04375       if ( fFromUI == 3 )
04376       {
04377             if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
04378             {
04379                   fFromUI = 1;
04380             }
04381             else
04382             {
04383                   fFromUI = 0;
04384             }
04385       }
04386 
04387       // ATE: if a civ, and from UI, and were cowering, remove from cowering
04388       if ( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) && fFromUI )
04389       {
04390             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_COWERING )
04391             {
04392                   SetSoldierCowerState( pSoldier, FALSE );
04393       usMoveAnimState = WALKING;
04394             }
04395       }
04396 
04397 
04398       pSoldier->bGoodContPath             = FALSE;
04399 
04400       if ( pSoldier->fDelayedMovement )
04401       {
04402             if ( pSoldier->ubDelayedMovementFlags & DELAYED_MOVEMENT_FLAG_PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE )
04403             {
04404                   fFlags = PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE;
04405             }
04406             else
04407             {
04408                   fFlags = PATH_IGNORE_PERSON_AT_DEST;
04409             }
04410             pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = FALSE;
04411       }
04412 
04413       if ( gfGetNewPathThroughPeople )
04414       {
04415             fFlags = PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE;
04416       }
04417 
04418       // ATE: Some stuff here for realtime, going through interface....
04419       if ( ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) && fFromUI == 1 ) || fFromUI == 2 )
04420       {
04421             if ( pSoldier->bCollapsed )
04422             {
04423                   return( FALSE );
04424             }
04425 
04426             sMercGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04427             pSoldier->sGridNo = pSoldier->sDestination;
04428 
04429             // Check if path is good before copying it into guy's path...
04430             if ( FindBestPath( pSoldier, sDestGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NO_COPYROUTE, fFlags ) == 0 )
04431             {
04432                   // Set to old....
04433                   pSoldier->sGridNo = sMercGridNo;
04434 
04435                   return( FALSE );
04436             }
04437 
04438             uiDist =  FindBestPath( pSoldier, sDestGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, COPYROUTE, fFlags );
04439 
04440             pSoldier->sGridNo = sMercGridNo;
04441             pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sDestGridNo;
04442 
04443             if ( uiDist > 0 )
04444             {     
04445                   // Add one to path data size....
04446                   if ( fAdvancePath )
04447                   {
04448                         memcpy( usPathingData, pSoldier->usPathingData, sizeof( usPathingData ) );
04449                         ubPathingMaxDirection = (UINT8)usPathingData[ MAX_PATH_LIST_SIZE -1 ];
04450                         memcpy( &(pSoldier->usPathingData[1]), usPathingData, sizeof( usPathingData ) - sizeof( UINT16 ) );
04451 
04452                         // If we have reach the max, go back one sFinalDest....
04453                         if ( pSoldier->usPathDataSize == MAX_PATH_LIST_SIZE )
04454                         {
04455                               //pSoldier->sFinalDestination = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sFinalDestination, DirectionInc( gOppositeDirection[ ubPathingMaxDirection ] ) );
04456                         }
04457                         else
04458                         {
04459                               pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
04460                         }
04461                   }
04462 
04463                   usMoveAnimState = pSoldier->usUIMovementMode;
04464 
04465                   if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
04466                   {
04467                         usMoveAnimState = DEEP_WATER_SWIM;
04468                   }
04469 
04470                   // Change animation only.... set value to NOT call any goto new gridno stuff.....
04471                   if ( usMoveAnimState != pSoldier->usAnimState )
04472                   {
04473                         //
04474                         pSoldier->usDontUpdateNewGridNoOnMoveAnimChange = TRUE;
04475 
04476                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usMoveAnimState, 0, FALSE );  
04477                   }
04478 
04479                   return( TRUE );
04480             }
04481 
04482             return( FALSE );
04483       }
04484 
04485       // we can use the soldier's level here because we don't have pathing across levels right now...
04486       if (pSoldier->bPathStored)
04487       {
04488             fContinue = TRUE;
04489       }
04490       else
04491       {
04492             iDest = FindBestPath( pSoldier, sDestGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, usMovementAnim, COPYROUTE, fFlags );
04493             fContinue = (iDest != 0);
04494       }
04495 
04496       // Only if we can get a path here
04497       if ( fContinue )
04498       {
04499             // Debug messages
04500             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Soldier %d: Get new path", pSoldier->ubID ) );
04501 
04502             // Set final destination
04503             pSoldier->sFinalDestination = sDestGridNo;
04504             pSoldier->fPastXDest = 0;
04505             pSoldier->fPastYDest = 0;
04506 
04507 
04508             // CHECK IF FIRST TILE IS FREE
04509             sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( (UINT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ] ) );
04510 
04511             // If true, we're OK, if not, WAIT for a guy to pass!
04512             // If we are in deep water, we can only swim!
04513             if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
04514             {
04515                   usMoveAnimState = DEEP_WATER_SWIM;
04516             }
04517 
04518             // If we were aiming, end aim!
04519             usAnimState = PickSoldierReadyAnimation( pSoldier, TRUE );
04520 
04521             // Add a pending animation first!
04522             // Only if we were standing!
04523             if ( usAnimState != INVALID_ANIMATION && gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND )
04524             {
04525                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usAnimState, 0, FALSE );      
04526                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = usMoveAnimState;
04527             }
04528             else
04529             {
04530                   // Call local copy for change soldier state!
04531                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usMoveAnimState, 0, fForceRestartAnim );  
04532 
04533             }
04534 
04535             // Change desired direction
04536         // ATE: Here we have a situation where in RT, we may have
04537             // gotten a new path, but we are alreayd moving.. so
04538             // at leasty change new dest. This will be redundent if the ANI is a totaly new one
04539 
04540             return( TRUE );
04541       }
04542 
04543       return( FALSE );
04544 }
04545 
04546 void EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 sDestGridNo, UINT16 usMovementAnim )
04547 {
04548       // ATE: Default restart of animation to TRUE
04549       EVENT_InternalGetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, sDestGridNo, usMovementAnim, FALSE, TRUE );
04550 }
04551 
04552 // Change our state based on stance, to stop!
04553 void StopSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04554 {
04555       ReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier );                       
04556       GivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier );                    
04557 
04558       if ( !( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY ) )
04559       {
04560             //SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
04561             EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
04562       }
04563 
04564       // Set desination
04565       pSoldier->sFinalDestination = pSoldier->sGridNo;
04566 
04567 }
04568 
04569 void SoldierGotoStationaryStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04570 {
04571       // ATE: This is to turn off fast movement, that us used to change movement mode
04572       // for ui display on stance changes....
04573       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
04574       {
04575             //pSoldier->fUIMovementFast = FALSE;
04576       }
04577 
04578       // The queen, if she sees anybody, goes to ready, not normal breath....
04579       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER )
04580       {
04581             if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 || pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
04582             {
04583                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, QUEEN_READY, 0 , TRUE );
04584                   return;
04585             }
04586       }
04587 
04588       // Check if we are in deep water!
04589       if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
04590       {
04591             // IN deep water, tred!
04592             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, DEEP_WATER_TRED, 0 , FALSE );
04593       }
04594       else if ( pSoldier->ubServicePartner != NOBODY && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bBreath > 0  )
04595       {
04596             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GIVING_AID, 0 , FALSE );
04597       }
04598       else
04599       {
04600             // Change state back to stationary state for given height
04601             switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
04602             {
04603                   case ANIM_STAND:
04604 
04605                         // If we are cowering....goto cower state
04606                         if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_COWERING ) 
04607                         {
04608                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, START_COWER, 0 , FALSE );
04609                         }
04610                         else
04611                         {
04612                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STANDING, 0 , FALSE );
04613                         }
04614                         break;
04615 
04616                   case ANIM_CROUCH:
04617 
04618                         // If we are cowering....goto cower state
04619                         if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_COWERING ) 
04620                         {
04621                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, COWERING, 0 , FALSE );
04622                         }
04623                         else
04624                         {
04625                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CROUCHING, 0 , FALSE );
04626                         }
04627                         break;
04628 
04629                   case ANIM_PRONE:
04630                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, PRONE, 0 , FALSE );
04631                         break;
04632             }
04633 
04634       }
04635 
04636 }
04637 
04638 
04639 void ChangeSoldierStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubDesiredStance )
04640 {
04641       UINT16 usNewState;
04642 
04643       // Check if they are the same!
04644       if ( ubDesiredStance == gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
04645       {
04646             // Free up from stance change
04647             FreeUpNPCFromStanceChange( pSoldier );
04648             return;
04649       }
04650 
04651       // Set UI Busy
04652       SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
04653 
04654       // ATE: If we are an NPC, cower....
04655       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType >= FATCIV && pSoldier->ubBodyType <= KIDCIV )
04656       {
04657             if ( ubDesiredStance == ANIM_STAND )
04658             {
04659                   SetSoldierCowerState( pSoldier, FALSE );
04660             }
04661             else
04662             {
04663                   SetSoldierCowerState( pSoldier, TRUE );
04664             }
04665       }
04666       else
04667       {
04668             usNewState = GetNewSoldierStateFromNewStance( pSoldier, ubDesiredStance );
04669 
04670             // Set desired stance
04671             pSoldier->ubDesiredHeight = ubDesiredStance;
04672 
04673             // Now change to appropriate animation
04674             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usNewState, 0 , FALSE );
04675       }
04676 }
04677 
04678 void EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDestination( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usNewDirection, BOOLEAN fFromMove, UINT16 usAnimState )
04679 {
04680       UINT16      usNewGridNo;
04681       INT16       sXPos, sYPos;
04682 
04683       // Get dest gridno, convert to center coords
04684       usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( usNewDirection ) );
04685 
04686       ConvertMapPosToWorldTileCenter( usNewGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
04687 
04688       // Save new dest gridno, x, y
04689       pSoldier->sDestination = usNewGridNo;
04690       pSoldier->sDestXPos = sXPos;
04691       pSoldier->sDestYPos = sYPos;
04692 
04693       pSoldier->bMovementDirection = (INT8)usNewDirection;
04694 
04695 
04696       // OK, ATE: If we are side_stepping, calculate a NEW desired direction....
04697       if ( pSoldier->bReverse && usAnimState == SIDE_STEP )
04698       {
04699             UINT8 ubPerpDirection;
04700 
04701             // Get a new desired direction, 
04702             ubPerpDirection = gPurpendicularDirection[ pSoldier->bDirection ][ usNewDirection ];
04703 
04704             // CHange actual and desired direction....
04705             EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubPerpDirection );
04706             pSoldier->bDesiredDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
04707       }
04708       else
04709       {
04710             if ( !( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_SPECIALMOVE ) )
04711             {
04712                   EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, usNewDirection, fFromMove, usAnimState );
04713             }
04714       }
04715 }
04716 
04717 void EVENT_SetSoldierDestination( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16   usNewDirection )
04718 {
04719       EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDestination( pSoldier, usNewDirection, FALSE, pSoldier->usAnimState );
04720 }
04721 
04722 
04723 // function to determine which direction a creature can turn in
04724 INT8 MultiTiledTurnDirection( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, INT8 bStartDirection, INT8 bDesiredDirection )
04725 {
04726       INT8                                                        bTurningIncrement;
04727       INT8                                                        bCurrentDirection;
04728       INT8                                                        bLoop;
04729       UINT16                                                      usStructureID, usAnimSurface;
04730       STRUCTURE_FILE_REF *          pStructureFileRef;
04731       BOOLEAN                                                     fOk = FALSE;
04732 
04733       // start by trying to turn in quickest direction
04734       bTurningIncrement = (INT8) QuickestDirection( bStartDirection, bDesiredDirection );
04735 
04736       usAnimSurface = DetermineSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
04737 
04738       pStructureFileRef = GetAnimationStructureRef( pSoldier->ubID, usAnimSurface, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
04739       if ( !pStructureFileRef )
04740       {
04741             // without structure data, well, assume quickest direction
04742             return( bTurningIncrement );
04743       }
04744 
04745       // ATE: Only if we have a levelnode...
04746       if ( pSoldier->pLevelNode != NULL && pSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData != NULL )
04747       {
04748             usStructureID = pSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData->usStructureID;
04749       }
04750       else
04751       {
04752             usStructureID = INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID;
04753       }
04754 
04755       bLoop = 0;
04756       bCurrentDirection = bStartDirection;
04757 
04758       while( bLoop < 2 )
04759       {
04760             while( bCurrentDirection != bDesiredDirection )
04761             {
04762                   bCurrentDirection += bTurningIncrement;
04763 
04764                   // did we wrap directions?
04765                   if ( bCurrentDirection < 0 )
04766                   {
04767                         bCurrentDirection = (MAXDIR - 1);
04768                   }
04769                   else if ( bCurrentDirection >= MAXDIR )
04770                   {
04771                         bCurrentDirection = 0;
04772                   }
04773 
04774                   // check to see if we can add creature in that direction
04775                   fOk = OkayToAddStructureToWorld( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, &(pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[ gOneCDirection[ bCurrentDirection   ] ]), usStructureID );
04776                   if (!fOk)
04777                   {
04778                         break;
04779                   }
04780             }
04781 
04782             if ( (bCurrentDirection == bDesiredDirection) && fOk )
04783             {
04784                   // success!!
04785                   return( bTurningIncrement );
04786             }
04787 
04788             bLoop++;
04789             if ( bLoop < 2 )
04790             {
04791                   // change direction of loop etc
04792                   bCurrentDirection = bStartDirection;
04793                   bTurningIncrement *= -1;
04794             }
04795       }
04796       // nothing found... doesn't matter much what we return
04797       return( bTurningIncrement );
04798 }
04799 
04800 
04801 
04802 void EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDesiredDirection( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16  usNewDirection, BOOLEAN fInitalMove, UINT16 usAnimState )
04803 {
04804       //if ( usAnimState == WALK_BACKWARDS )
04805       if ( pSoldier->bReverse && usAnimState != SIDE_STEP )
04806       {
04807             // OK, check if we are going to go in the exact opposite than our facing....
04808             usNewDirection = gOppositeDirection[ usNewDirection ];
04809       }
04810 
04811 
04812       pSoldier->bDesiredDirection = (INT8)usNewDirection;
04813 
04814       // If we are prone, goto crouched first!
04815       // ONly if we are stationary, and only if directions are differnet!
04816 
04817       // ATE: If we are fNoAPsToFinnishMove, stop what we were doing and
04818       // reset flag.....
04819       if ( pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove && ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) )
04820       {
04821             // ATE; Commented this out: NEVER, EVER, start a new anim from this function, as an eternal loop will result....
04822             //SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
04823             // Reset flag!
04824             AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, FALSE );
04825       }
04826 
04827       if ( pSoldier->bDesiredDirection != pSoldier->bDirection )
04828       {
04829             if ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].uiFlags & ( ANIM_BREATH | ANIM_OK_CHARGE_AP_FOR_TURN | ANIM_FIREREADY ) && !fInitalMove && !pSoldier->fDontChargeTurningAPs )
04830             {
04831                   // Deduct points for initial turn!
04832                   switch( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
04833                   {
04834                         // Now change to appropriate animation
04835                         case ANIM_STAND:
04836                               DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_LOOK_STANDING, 0 );
04837                               break;
04838 
04839                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
04840                               DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_LOOK_CROUCHED, 0 );
04841                               break;
04842 
04843                         case ANIM_PRONE:
04844                               DeductPoints( pSoldier, AP_LOOK_PRONE, 0 );
04845                               break;
04846                   }
04847 
04848             }
04849 
04850             pSoldier->fDontChargeTurningAPs = FALSE;
04851 
04852             if ( fInitalMove )
04853             {
04854                   if ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].ubHeight == ANIM_PRONE  )
04855                   {
04856                         if ( pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition != TURNING_FROM_PRONE_ENDING_UP_FROM_MOVE )
04857                         {
04858                               pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = TURNING_FROM_PRONE_START_UP_FROM_MOVE;
04859                         }
04860                   }
04861             }
04862 
04863             if ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY || pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove || fInitalMove )
04864             {
04865                   if ( gAnimControl[ usAnimState ].ubHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
04866                   {
04867                         // Set this beasty of a flag to allow us to go back down to prone if we choose!
04868                         // ATE: Alrighty, set flag to go back down only if we are not moving anywhere
04869                         //if ( pSoldier->sDestination == pSoldier->sGridNo )  
04870                         if ( !fInitalMove )
04871                         {
04872                               pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = TURNING_FROM_PRONE_ON;
04873 
04874                               // Set a pending animation to change stance first...
04875                               SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
04876 
04877                         }
04878                   }
04879             }
04880       }
04881 
04882       // Set desired direction for the extended directions...
04883       pSoldier->ubHiResDesiredDirection = ubExtDirection[ pSoldier->bDesiredDirection ];
04884 
04885       if ( pSoldier->bDesiredDirection != pSoldier->bDirection )
04886       {
04887             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) || CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) )
04888             {
04889                   pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_PAUSEANIMOVE;
04890             }
04891       }
04892 
04893 
04894       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
04895       {
04896             pSoldier->bTurningIncrement = (INT8) ExtQuickestDirection( pSoldier->ubHiResDirection, pSoldier->ubHiResDesiredDirection );
04897       }
04898       else
04899       {
04900             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTITILE )
04901             {
04902                   pSoldier->bTurningIncrement = (INT8) MultiTiledTurnDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->bDirection, pSoldier->bDesiredDirection );
04903             }
04904             else
04905             {
04906                   pSoldier->bTurningIncrement = (INT8) QuickestDirection( pSoldier->bDirection, pSoldier->bDesiredDirection );
04907             }
04908       }
04909 
04910 }
04911 
04912 
04913 void EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16    usNewDirection )
04914 {
04915       EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, usNewDirection, FALSE, pSoldier->usAnimState );
04916 }
04917 
04918 
04919 void EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16     usNewDirection )
04920 {
04921        // Remove old location data
04922        HandleAnimationProfile( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState, TRUE );
04923 
04924        pSoldier->bDirection = (INT8)usNewDirection;
04925 
04926        // Updated extended direction.....
04927        pSoldier->ubHiResDirection = ubExtDirection[ pSoldier->bDirection ];
04928       
04929        // Add new stuff
04930        HandleAnimationProfile( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState, FALSE );
04931 
04932        // If we are turning, we have chaanged our aim!
04933        if ( !pSoldier->fDontUnsetLastTargetFromTurn )
04934        {
04935                   pSoldier->sLastTarget = NOWHERE;
04936        }
04937 
04938        AdjustForFastTurnAnimation( pSoldier );
04939 
04940        // Update structure info!
04941 //     if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTITILE )
04942        {
04943                   UpdateMercStructureInfo( pSoldier );
04944        }
04945 
04946        // Handle Profile data for hit locations
04947        HandleAnimationProfile( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState, TRUE );
04948 
04949        HandleCrowShadowNewDirection( pSoldier );
04950        
04951        // Change values!
04952        SetSoldierLocatorOffsets( pSoldier );
04953 
04954 }
04955  
04956  
04957 void EVENT_BeginMercTurn( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fFromRealTime, INT32 iRealTimeCounter )
04958 {
04959       // NB realtimecounter is not used, always passed in as 0 now!
04960 
04961       INT32 iBlood;
04962 
04963       if (pSoldier->bUnderFire)
04964       {
04965             // UnderFire now starts at 2 for "under fire this turn",
04966             // down to 1 for "under fire last turn", to 0.
04967             pSoldier->bUnderFire--;
04968       }
04969 
04970       // ATE: Add decay effect sfor drugs...
04971       if ( fFromRealTime  ) //&& iRealTimeCounter % 300 )
04972       {
04973             HandleEndTurnDrugAdjustments( pSoldier );
04974       }
04975       else
04976       {
04977             HandleEndTurnDrugAdjustments( pSoldier );
04978       }
04979 
04980       // ATE: Don't bleed if in AUTO BANDAGE!
04981       if ( !gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode )
04982       {
04983             // Blood is not for the weak of heart, or mechanical
04984             if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_VEHICLE | SOLDIER_ROBOT ) ) )
04985             {
04986                   if ( pSoldier->bBleeding || pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE ) // is he bleeding or dying?
04987                   {
04988                         iBlood = CheckBleeding( pSoldier ); // check if he might lose another life point
04989 
04990                         // ATE: Only if in sector!
04991                         if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
04992                         {
04993                               if ( iBlood != NOBLOOD )
04994                               {
04995                                     DropBlood( pSoldier, (INT8)iBlood, pSoldier->bVisible );
04996                               }
04997                         }
04998                   }
04999             }
05000       }
05001 
05002   // survived bleeding, but is he out of breath?
05003   if ( pSoldier->bLife && !pSoldier->bBreath && MercInWater( pSoldier ) )
05004       {
05005             // Drowning...
05006       }
05007 
05008   // if he is still alive (didn't bleed to death)
05009   if ( pSoldier->bLife )
05010   {
05011             // reduce the effects of any residual shock from past injuries by half
05012             pSoldier->bShock /= 2;
05013 
05014             // if this person has heard a noise that hasn't been investigated
05015             if (pSoldier->sNoiseGridno != NOWHERE)
05016             {
05017                   if (pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume)  // and the noise volume is still positive
05018                   {
05019                         pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume--;    // the volume of the noise "decays" by 1 point
05020 
05021                         if (!pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume) // if the volume has reached zero
05022                         {
05023                               pSoldier->sNoiseGridno = NOWHERE;         // forget about the noise!
05024                         }
05025                   }
05026             }
05027 
05028      // save unused action points up to a maximum
05029              /*
05030      if ((savedPts = pSoldier->bActionPts) > MAX_AP_CARRIED)
05031        savedPts = MAX_AP_CARRIED;
05032                   */
05033             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_GASSED )
05034             {
05035                    // then must get a gas mask or leave the gassed area to get over it
05036 //                 if ( ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].usItem == GASMASK || pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem == GASMASK ) || !( GetSmokeEffectOnTile( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel ) ) )
05037                    if ( FindGasMask( pSoldier ) != NO_SLOT || !( GetSmokeEffectOnTile( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel ) ) )
05038                    {
05039                          // Turn off gassed flag....
05040                          pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_GASSED );
05041                   }
05042             }
05043 
05044             if ( pSoldier->bBlindedCounter > 0 )
05045             {
05046                   pSoldier->bBlindedCounter--;
05047                   if (pSoldier->bBlindedCounter == 0)
05048                   {
05049                         // we can SEE!!!!!
05050                         HandleSight( pSoldier, SIGHT_LOOK );
05051         // Dirty panel
05052         fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
05053                   }
05054             }
05055 
05056 
05057             if ( pSoldier->bDeafenedCounter > 0 )
05058             {
05059                   pSoldier->bDeafenedCounter--;
05060             }
05061 
05062             // ATE: To get around a problem...
05063             // If an AI guy, and we have 0 life, and are still at higher hieght,
05064             // Kill them.....
05065 
05066 
05067             pSoldier->sWeightCarriedAtTurnStart = (INT16) CalculateCarriedWeight( pSoldier );
05068 
05069             UnusedAPsToBreath( pSoldier );
05070             
05071             // Set flag back to normal, after reaching a certain statge
05072             if ( pSoldier->bBreath > 80 )
05073             {
05074                   pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags &= ( ~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_LOW_BREATH );
05075             }
05076             if ( pSoldier->bBreath > 50 )
05077             {
05078                   pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags &= ( ~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_DROWNING );
05079             }
05080 
05081 
05082             if ( pSoldier->ubTurnsUntilCanSayHeardNoise > 0)
05083             {
05084                   pSoldier->ubTurnsUntilCanSayHeardNoise--;
05085             }
05086 
05087             if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
05088             {
05089                   CheckForBreathCollapse( pSoldier );
05090             }
05091 
05092             CalcNewActionPoints( pSoldier );
05093 
05094             pSoldier->bTilesMoved                                 = 0;
05095 
05096             if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
05097             {
05098                   BeginSoldierGetup( pSoldier );
05099 
05100                   // CJC Nov 30: handle RT opplist decaying in another function which operates less often
05101                   if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
05102                   {
05103                         VerifyAndDecayOpplist( pSoldier );
05104 
05105                         // turn off xray
05106                         if ( pSoldier->uiXRayActivatedTime )
05107                         {
05108                               TurnOffXRayEffects( pSoldier );
05109                         }
05110                   }
05111 
05112                   if ( (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum) && (pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE) )
05113                   {
05114                         switch( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].bPersonalityTrait )
05115                         {
05116                               case FEAR_OF_INSECTS:
05117                                     if ( MercSeesCreature( pSoldier ) )
05118                                     {
05119                                           HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_INSECT_PHOBIC_SEES_CREATURE, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
05120                                           if ( !(pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_PERSONALITY) )
05121                                           {
05122                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_PERSONALITY_TRAIT );
05123                                                 pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_PERSONALITY;
05124                                           }
05125                                     }
05126                                     break;
05127                               case CLAUSTROPHOBIC:
05128                                     if ( gbWorldSectorZ > 0 && Random( 6 - gbWorldSectorZ ) == 0 )
05129                                     {
05130                                           // underground!
05131                                           HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_CLAUSTROPHOBE_UNDERGROUND, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
05132                                           if ( !(pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_PERSONALITY) )
05133                                           {
05134                                                 TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_PERSONALITY_TRAIT );
05135                                                 pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_PERSONALITY;
05136                                           }
05137 
05138                                     }
05139                                     break;
05140                               case NERVOUS:
05141                                     if ( DistanceToClosestFriend( pSoldier ) > NERVOUS_RADIUS )
05142                                     {
05143                                           // augh!! 
05144                                           if ( pSoldier->bMorale < 50 )
05145                                           {
05146                                                 HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_NERVOUS_ALONE, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
05147                                                 if ( !(pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_PERSONALITY) )
05148                                                 {
05149                                                       TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_PERSONALITY_TRAIT );
05150                                                       pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_PERSONALITY;
05151                                                 }
05152                                           }
05153                                     }
05154                                     else
05155                                     {
05156                                           if ( pSoldier->bMorale > 45 )
05157                                           {
05158                                                 // turn flag off, so that we say it every two turns
05159                                                 pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags &= ~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_PERSONALITY;
05160                                           }
05161                                     }
05162                                     break;
05163                         }
05164                   }
05165             }
05166 
05167             // Reset quote flags for under heavy fire and close call!
05168             pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags &= ( ~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_BEING_PUMMELED );
05169             pSoldier->usQuoteSaidExtFlags &= ( ~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_EXT_CLOSE_CALL );
05170             pSoldier->bNumHitsThisTurn = 0;
05171             pSoldier->ubSuppressionPoints = 0;
05172             pSoldier->fCloseCall = FALSE;
05173 
05174             pSoldier->ubMovementNoiseHeard = 0;
05175 
05176             // If soldier has new APs, reset flags!
05177             if ( pSoldier->bActionPoints > 0 )
05178             {
05179                   pSoldier->fUIFirstTimeNOAP = FALSE;
05180                   pSoldier->bMoved = FALSE;
05181                   pSoldier->bPassedLastInterrupt = FALSE;
05182             }
05183       }
05184 }
05185 
05186 // UTILITY FUNCTIONS CALLED BY OVERHEAD.H
05187 UINT8       gDirectionFrom8to2[ ] = { 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 1, 1, 0 };
05188 
05189 
05190 BOOLEAN ConvertAniCodeToAniFrame( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usAniFrame )
05191 {
05192       UINT16      usAnimSurface;
05193       UINT8       ubTempDir;
05194       // Given ani code, adjust for facing direction
05195 
05196       // get anim surface and determine # of frames
05197       usAnimSurface = GetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
05198 
05199       CHECKF( usAnimSurface != INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE );
05200 
05201       // COnvert world direction into sprite direction
05202       ubTempDir = gOneCDirection[ pSoldier->bDirection ];
05203 
05204       //If we are only one frame, ignore what the script is telling us!
05205       if ( gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].ubFlags & ANIM_DATA_FLAG_NOFRAMES )
05206       {
05207             usAniFrame = 0;
05208       }
05209 
05210       if ( gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].uiNumDirections == 32 )
05211       {
05212             ubTempDir = gExtOneCDirection[ pSoldier->ubHiResDirection ];
05213       }
05214       // Check # of directions /surface, adjust if ness.
05215       else if ( gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].uiNumDirections == 4 )
05216       {
05217             ubTempDir = ubTempDir / 2;
05218       }
05219       // Check # of directions /surface, adjust if ness.
05220       else if ( gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].uiNumDirections == 1 )
05221       {
05222             ubTempDir = 0;
05223       }
05224       // Check # of directions /surface, adjust if ness.
05225       else if ( gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].uiNumDirections == 3 )
05226       {
05227             if ( pSoldier->bDirection == NORTHWEST )
05228             {
05229                   ubTempDir = 1;
05230             }
05231             if ( pSoldier->bDirection == WEST )
05232             {
05233                   ubTempDir = 0;
05234             }
05235             if ( pSoldier->bDirection == EAST )
05236             {
05237                   ubTempDir = 2;
05238             }
05239       }
05240       else if ( gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].uiNumDirections == 2 )
05241       {
05242             ubTempDir = gDirectionFrom8to2[ pSoldier->bDirection ];
05243       }
05244 
05245       pSoldier->usAniFrame = usAniFrame + (UINT16) ( ( gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].uiNumFramesPerDir * ubTempDir ) ); 
05246 
05247   if ( gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject == NULL )
05248   {
05249             pSoldier->usAniFrame = 0;
05250     return( TRUE );
05251   }
05252 
05253       if ( pSoldier->usAniFrame >= gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject->usNumberOfObjects )
05254       {
05255             // Debug msg here....
05256 //          ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Soldier Animation: Wrong Number of frames per number of objects: %d vs %d, %S",  gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].uiNumFramesPerDir, gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject->usNumberOfObjects, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].zAnimStr );  
05257 
05258             pSoldier->usAniFrame = 0;
05259       }
05260 
05261       return( TRUE );
05262 }
05263 
05264 
05265 void TurnSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier)
05266 {
05267  INT16            sDirection;
05268  BOOLEAN    fDoDirectionChange = TRUE;
05269  INT32            cnt;
05270 
05271  // If we are a vehicle... DON'T TURN!
05272  if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
05273  {
05274    if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType != TANK_NW && pSoldier->ubBodyType != TANK_NE )
05275    {
05276       return;
05277    }
05278  }
05279  else // Lesh: patch for "Bug: Enemy turns around in turn based mode!"
05280  {
05281        // in case of errors in turning tasks
05282        if ( pSoldier->bDesiredDirection > 7 || pSoldier->bDesiredDirection < 0)
05283        {
05284              DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("TurnSoldier() Warinig: Invalid desired direction for non-vehicle unit") );
05285              pSoldier->bDesiredDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
05286        }
05287  }
05288  // Lesh: patch ended
05289 
05290  // We handle sight now....
05291  if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_LOOK_NEXT_TURNSOLDIER )
05292  {
05293             if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY && pSoldier->usAnimState != CLIMBUPROOF && pSoldier->usAnimState != CLIMBDOWNROOF ) )
05294             {
05295               // HANDLE SIGHT!
05296                   HandleSight( pSoldier,SIGHT_LOOK | SIGHT_RADIO );
05297             }
05298             // Turn off!
05299             pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_LOOK_NEXT_TURNSOLDIER );
05300 
05301             HandleSystemNewAISituation( pSoldier, FALSE );
05302  }
05303 
05304 
05305  if ( pSoldier->fTurningToShoot )
05306  {
05307             if ( pSoldier->bDirection == pSoldier->bDesiredDirection )
05308             {
05309                   if ( ( (gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_FIREREADY ) && !pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition ) || pSoldier->ubBodyType == ROBOTNOWEAPON || pSoldier->ubBodyType == TANK_NW || pSoldier->ubBodyType == TANK_NE  )
05310                   {
05311                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("TurnSoldier: EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim") );
05312                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, SelectFireAnimation( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight ), 0, FALSE );
05313                         pSoldier->fTurningToShoot = FALSE;
05314 
05315                         // Save last target gridno!
05316                         //pSoldier->sLastTarget = pSoldier->sTargetGridNo;
05317 
05318                   }
05319                   // Else check if we are trying to shoot and once was prone, but am now crouched because we needed to turn...
05320                   else if ( pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition )
05321                   {
05322                         if ( IsValidStance( pSoldier, ANIM_PRONE ) )
05323                         {
05324                               SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, ANIM_PRONE );
05325                               pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = SelectFireAnimation( pSoldier, ANIM_PRONE );         
05326                         }
05327                         else
05328                         {
05329                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, SelectFireAnimation( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH ), 0, FALSE );
05330                         }
05331                         pSoldier->fTurningToShoot = FALSE;
05332                         pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = TURNING_FROM_PRONE_OFF;
05333                   }
05334             }
05335  }
05336 
05337  if ( pSoldier->fTurningToFall )
05338  {
05339             if ( pSoldier->bDirection == pSoldier->bDesiredDirection )
05340             {
05341                   SelectFallAnimation( pSoldier );
05342                   pSoldier->fTurningToFall = FALSE;
05343             }
05344  }
05345 
05346  if ( pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone && ( pSoldier->ubPendingStanceChange != NO_PENDING_STANCE ) )
05347  {
05348             if ( pSoldier->bDirection == pSoldier->bDesiredDirection )
05349             {
05350                   SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, pSoldier->ubPendingStanceChange );
05351                   pSoldier->ubPendingStanceChange = NO_PENDING_STANCE;
05352                   pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone = FALSE;
05353             }
05354  }
05355 
05356        if ( pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone && ( pSoldier->usPendingAnimation != NO_PENDING_ANIMATION ) )
05357  {
05358             if ( pSoldier->bDirection == pSoldier->bDesiredDirection )
05359             {
05360                   UINT16 usPendingAnimation;
05361 
05362                   usPendingAnimation = pSoldier->usPendingAnimation;
05363                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
05364 
05365                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usPendingAnimation, 0 , FALSE );
05366                   pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone = FALSE;
05367             }
05368  }
05369  
05370  // Don't do anything if we are at dest direction!
05371  if ( pSoldier->bDirection == pSoldier->bDesiredDirection )
05372  {
05373    if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == TANK_NW || pSoldier->ubBodyType == TANK_NE )
05374    {
05375      if ( pSoldier->iTuringSoundID != NO_SAMPLE )
05376      {
05377        SoundStop( pSoldier->iTuringSoundID );
05378        pSoldier->iTuringSoundID = NO_SAMPLE;
05379 
05380                    PlaySoldierJA2Sample( pSoldier->ubID, TURRET_STOP, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ), TRUE );                 
05381      }
05382    }
05383 
05384             // Turn off!
05385             pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_LOOK_NEXT_TURNSOLDIER );
05386             pSoldier->fDontUnsetLastTargetFromTurn = FALSE;
05387 
05388             // Unset ui busy if from ui
05389             if ( pSoldier->bTurningFromUI && ( pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition != 3 ) && ( pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition != 1 ) )
05390             {
05391                   UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );            
05392                   pSoldier->bTurningFromUI = FALSE;
05393             }
05394 
05395             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) || CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) )
05396             {
05397                   pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_PAUSEANIMOVE);
05398             }
05399 
05400             FreeUpNPCFromTurning( pSoldier, LOOK);
05401 
05402             // Undo our flag for prone turning...
05403             // Else check if we are trying to shoot and once was prone, but am now crouched because we needed to turn...
05404             if ( pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition == TURNING_FROM_PRONE_ON )
05405             {
05406                   // ATE: Don't do this if we have something in our hands we are going to throw!
05407                   if ( IsValidStance( pSoldier, ANIM_PRONE ) && pSoldier->pTempObject == NULL )
05408                   {
05409                         SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, ANIM_PRONE );
05410                   }
05411                   pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = TURNING_FROM_PRONE_OFF;
05412             }
05413 
05414             // If a special code, make guy crawl after stance change!
05415             if ( pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition == TURNING_FROM_PRONE_ENDING_UP_FROM_MOVE && pSoldier->usAnimState != PRONE_UP && pSoldier->usAnimState != PRONE_DOWN )
05416             {
05417                   if ( IsValidStance( pSoldier, ANIM_PRONE ) )
05418                   {
05419                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CRAWLING, 0, FALSE );                     
05420                   }
05421             }
05422 
05423             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_TURNINGFROMHIT )
05424             {
05425                   if ( pSoldier->fGettingHit == 1 )
05426                   {
05427                         if ( pSoldier->usPendingAnimation != FALLFORWARD_ROOF && pSoldier->usPendingAnimation != FALLOFF && pSoldier->usAnimState != FALLFORWARD_ROOF && pSoldier->usAnimState != FALLOFF )
05428                         {
05429                               // Go back to original direction
05430                               EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, (INT8)pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 );
05431 
05432                               //SETUP GETTING HIT FLAG TO 2
05433                               pSoldier->fGettingHit = 2;
05434                         }
05435                         else
05436                         {
05437                               pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_TURNINGFROMHIT );
05438                         }
05439                   }
05440                   else if ( pSoldier->fGettingHit == 2 )
05441                   {
05442                         // Turn off
05443                         pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_TURNINGFROMHIT );
05444 
05445                         // Release attacker
05446                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Releasesoldierattacker, turning from hit animation ended") );
05447                         ReleaseSoldiersAttacker( pSoldier );
05448 
05449                         //FREEUP GETTING HIT FLAG
05450                         pSoldier->fGettingHit = FALSE;
05451                   }
05452             }
05453 
05454             return;
05455  }
05456 
05457       // IF WE ARE HERE, WE ARE IN THE PROCESS OF TURNING
05458 
05459       // DOUBLE CHECK TO UNSET fNOAPs...
05460       if ( pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove )
05461       {
05462             AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, FALSE );
05463       }
05464 
05465       // Do something different for vehicles....
05466       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
05467       {
05468              fDoDirectionChange = FALSE;
05469 
05470              // Get new direction
05471              /*
05472              sDirection = pSoldier->ubHiResDirection + ExtQuickestDirection( pSoldier->ubHiResDirection, pSoldier->ubHiResDesiredDirection );
05473              */
05474              sDirection = pSoldier->ubHiResDirection + pSoldier->bTurningIncrement;
05475              if (sDirection > 31)
05476              {
05477                          sDirection = 0;
05478              }
05479              else
05480              {
05481                         if ( sDirection < 0 )
05482                         {
05483                                sDirection = 31;
05484                         }
05485              }
05486              pSoldier->ubHiResDirection = (UINT8)sDirection;
05487 
05488              // Are we at a multiple of a 'cardnal' direction?
05489              for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 8; cnt++ )
05490              {    
05491                    if ( sDirection == ubExtDirection[ cnt ] )
05492                    {
05493                               fDoDirectionChange = TRUE;
05494 
05495                               sDirection = (INT16)cnt;
05496 
05497                               break;
05498                    }
05499              }
05500 
05501      if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == TANK_NW || pSoldier->ubBodyType == TANK_NE )
05502      {
05503        if ( pSoldier->iTuringSoundID == NO_SAMPLE )
05504        {
05505                      pSoldier->iTuringSoundID = PlaySoldierJA2Sample( pSoldier->ubID, TURRET_MOVE, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 100, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ), TRUE );                
05506        }
05507      }
05508       }
05509       else
05510       {
05511              // Get new direction
05512              //sDirection = pSoldier->bDirection + QuickestDirection( pSoldier->bDirection, pSoldier->bDesiredDirection );
05513              sDirection = pSoldier->bDirection + pSoldier->bTurningIncrement;
05514              if (sDirection > 7)
05515              {
05516                          sDirection = 0;
05517              }
05518              else
05519              {
05520                         if ( sDirection < 0 )
05521                         {
05522                                sDirection = 7;
05523                         }
05524              }
05525       }
05526 
05527 
05528  // CHECK FOR A VALID TURN DIRECTION
05529  // This is needed for prone animations as well as any multi-tiled structs
05530  if ( fDoDirectionChange )
05531  {
05532        if ( OKToAddMercToWorld( pSoldier, (INT8)sDirection ) )
05533        {
05534              // Don't do this if we are walkoing off screen...
05535              if ( gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode == WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALKOFF_SCREEN || gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode == WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALK_TO_GRIDNO )
05536              {
05537 
05538              }
05539              else
05540              {
05541                    // ATE: We should only do this if we are STATIONARY!
05542                    if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY ) )
05543                    {
05544                          pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_LOOK_NEXT_TURNSOLDIER;
05545                    }
05546                    // otherwise, it's handled next tile...
05547              }
05548 
05549              EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, sDirection );
05550 
05551      if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType != LARVAE_MONSTER && !MercInWater( pSoldier ) && pSoldier->bOverTerrainType != DIRT_ROAD && pSoldier->bOverTerrainType != PAVED_ROAD )
05552      {
05553                PlaySoldierFootstepSound( pSoldier );
05554      }
05555        }
05556        else
05557        {    
05558              // Are we prone crawling?
05559              if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CRAWLING )
05560              {
05561                         // OK, we want to getup, turn and go prone again....
05562                         SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
05563                         pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = TURNING_FROM_PRONE_ENDING_UP_FROM_MOVE;
05564              }
05565              // If we are a creature, or multi-tiled, cancel AI action.....?
05566              else if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTITILE )
05567              {
05568                   pSoldier->bDesiredDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
05569              }
05570 
05571        }
05572  } 
05573 }
05574 
05575 
05576 UINT8 gRedGlowR[]=
05577 {
05578       0,                // Normal shades
05579       25,
05580       50,
05581       75,
05582       100,
05583       125,
05584       150,
05585       175,
05586       200,
05587       225,
05588 
05589       0,          // For gray palettes
05590       25,
05591       50,
05592       75,
05593       100,
05594       125,
05595       150,
05596       175,
05597       200,
05598       225,
05599 
05600 };
05601 
05602 
05603 #if 0
05604 UINT8 gOrangeGlowR[]=
05605 {
05606       0,                // Normal shades
05607       20,
05608       40,
05609       60,
05610       80,
05611       100,
05612       120,
05613       140,
05614       160,
05615       180,
05616 
05617       0,          // For gray palettes
05618       20,
05619       40,
05620       60,
05621       80,
05622       100,
05623       120,
05624       140,
05625       160,
05626       180,
05627 };
05628 #endif
05629 
05630 UINT8 gOrangeGlowR[]=
05631 {
05632       0,                // Normal shades
05633       25,
05634       50,
05635       75,
05636       100,
05637       125,
05638       150,
05639       175,
05640       200,
05641       225,
05642 
05643       0,          // For gray palettes
05644       25,
05645       50,
05646       75,
05647       100,
05648       125,
05649       150,
05650       175,
05651       200,
05652       225,
05653 
05654 };
05655 
05656 
05657 #if 0
05658 UINT8 gOrangeGlowG[]=
05659 {
05660       0,                // Normal shades
05661       5,
05662       10,
05663       25,
05664       30,
05665       35,
05666       40,
05667       45,
05668       50,
05669       55,
05670

05672       5,
05673       10,
05674       25,
05675       30,
05676       35,
05677       40,
05678       45,
05679       50,
05680       55,
05681 };
05682 #endif
05683 
05684 UINT8 gOrangeGlowG[]=
05685 {
05686       0,                // Normal shades
05687       20,
05688       40,
05689       60,
05690       80,
05691       100,
05692       120,
05693       140,
05694       160,
05695       180,
05696 
05697       0,          // For gray palettes
05698       20,
05699       40,
05700       60,
05701       80,
05702       100,
05703       120,
05704       140,
05705       160,
05706       180,
05707 
05708 };
05709 
05710 
05711 BOOLEAN CreateSoldierPalettes( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
05712 {
05713       UINT16 usAnimSurface, usPaletteAnimSurface;
05714       CHAR8 zColFilename[ 100 ];
05715       INT32 iWhich;
05716       INT32 cnt;
05717       INT8  bBodyTypePalette;
05718       SGPPaletteEntry                                       Temp8BPPPalette[ 256 ];
05719 
05720       //NT32 uiCount;
05721       //PPaletteEntry Pal[256];
05722 
05723       if ( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette != NULL )
05724       {
05725             MemFree( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette );
05726             pSoldier->p8BPPPalette = NULL;
05727       }
05728 
05729 
05730       // Allocate mem for new palette
05731       pSoldier->p8BPPPalette = (SGPPaletteEntry *) MemAlloc( sizeof( SGPPaletteEntry ) * 256 );
05732       memset( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, 0, sizeof( SGPPaletteEntry ) * 256 );
05733 
05734       CHECKF( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette != NULL );
05735 
05736       // --- TAKE FROM CURRENT ANIMATION HVOBJECT!
05737       usAnimSurface = GetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
05738 
05739       CHECKF( usAnimSurface != INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE );
05740 
05741       if ( ( bBodyTypePalette = GetBodyTypePaletteSubstitutionCode( pSoldier, pSoldier->ubBodyType, zColFilename ) ) == -1 )
05742       {
05743             // ATE: here we want to use the breath cycle for the palette.....
05744             usPaletteAnimSurface = LoadSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, STANDING );
05745 
05746             if ( usPaletteAnimSurface != INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE )
05747             {
05748                   // Use palette from HVOBJECT, then use substitution for pants, etc
05749                   memcpy( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usPaletteAnimSurface ].hVideoObject->pPaletteEntry, sizeof( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette ) * 256 );
05750 
05751                   // Substitute based on head, etc
05752                   SetPaletteReplacement( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, pSoldier->HeadPal );
05753                   SetPaletteReplacement( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, pSoldier->VestPal );
05754                   SetPaletteReplacement( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, pSoldier->PantsPal );
05755                   SetPaletteReplacement( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, pSoldier->SkinPal );
05756             }
05757       }
