05758       else if ( bBodyTypePalette == 0 )
05759       {
05760             // Use palette from hvobject
05761             memcpy( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject->pPaletteEntry, sizeof( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette ) * 256 );
05762       }
05763       else
05764       {
05765             // Use col file
05766             if ( CreateSGPPaletteFromCOLFile( Temp8BPPPalette, zColFilename ) )
05767             {
05768                   // Copy into palette
05769                   memcpy( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette,           Temp8BPPPalette, sizeof( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette ) * 256 );
05770             }
05771             else
05772             {
05773                   // Use palette from hvobject
05774                   memcpy( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject->pPaletteEntry, sizeof( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette ) * 256 );
05775             }
05776       }
05777 
05778 
05779       if ( pSoldier->p16BPPPalette != NULL )
05780       {
05781             MemFree( pSoldier->p16BPPPalette );
05782             pSoldier->p16BPPPalette = NULL;
05783       }
05784 
05785       // -- BUILD 16BPP Palette from this
05786       pSoldier->p16BPPPalette = Create16BPPPalette( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette );
05787 
05788       for ( iWhich = 0; iWhich < NUM_SOLDIER_SHADES; iWhich++ )
05789       {
05790             if ( pSoldier->pShades[ iWhich ] != NULL )
05791             {
05792                   MemFree( pSoldier->pShades[ iWhich ] );
05793                   pSoldier->pShades[ iWhich ] = NULL;
05794             }
05795       }
05796 
05797       for ( iWhich = 0; iWhich < NUM_SOLDIER_EFFECTSHADES; iWhich++ )
05798       {
05799             if ( pSoldier->pEffectShades[ iWhich ] != NULL )
05800             {
05801                   MemFree( pSoldier->pEffectShades[ iWhich ] );
05802                   pSoldier->pEffectShades[ iWhich ] = NULL;
05803             }
05804       }
05805 
05806       for ( iWhich = 0; iWhich < 20; iWhich++ )
05807       {
05808             if ( pSoldier->pGlowShades[ iWhich ] != NULL )
05809             {
05810                   MemFree( pSoldier->pGlowShades[ iWhich ] );
05811                   pSoldier->pGlowShades[ iWhich ] = NULL;
05812             }
05813       }
05814 
05815 
05816       CreateSoldierPaletteTables( pSoldier, HVOBJECT_GLOW_GREEN );
05817  
05818 
05819       // Build a grayscale palette for testing grayout of mercs
05820       //for(uiCount=0; uiCount < 256; uiCount++)
05821       //{
05822       //    Pal[uiCount].peRed=(UINT8)(uiCount%128)+128;
05823       //    Pal[uiCount].peGreen=(UINT8)(uiCount%128)+128;
05824       //    Pal[uiCount].peBlue=(UINT8)(uiCount%128)+128;
05825       //}
05826       pSoldier->pEffectShades[ 0 ] = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, 100, 100, 100, TRUE );
05827       pSoldier->pEffectShades[ 1 ] = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, 100, 150, 100, TRUE );
05828 
05829       // Build shades for glowing visible bad guy
05830 
05831       // First do visible guy
05832       pSoldier->pGlowShades[ 0 ] = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, 255, 255, 255, FALSE );
05833       for ( cnt = 1; cnt < 10; cnt++ )
05834       {
05835             pSoldier->pGlowShades[ cnt ] = CreateEnemyGlow16BPPPalette( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, gRedGlowR[cnt], 255, FALSE );
05836       }
05837 
05838       // Now for gray guy...
05839       pSoldier->pGlowShades[ 10 ] = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, 100, 100, 100, TRUE );
05840       for ( cnt = 11; cnt < 19; cnt++ )
05841       {
05842             pSoldier->pGlowShades[ cnt ] = CreateEnemyGreyGlow16BPPPalette( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, gRedGlowR[cnt], 0, FALSE );
05843       }
05844       pSoldier->pGlowShades[ 19 ] = CreateEnemyGreyGlow16BPPPalette( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, gRedGlowR[18], 0, FALSE );
05845 
05846 
05847       // ATE: OK, piggyback on the shades we are not using for 2 colored lighting....
05848       // ORANGE, VISIBLE GUY
05849       pSoldier->pShades[ 20 ] = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, 255, 255, 255, FALSE );
05850       for ( cnt = 21; cnt < 30; cnt++ )
05851       {
05852             pSoldier->pShades[ cnt ] = CreateEnemyGlow16BPPPalette( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, gOrangeGlowR[ ( cnt - 20 )], gOrangeGlowG[ ( cnt - 20 ) ], TRUE );
05853       }
05854 
05855       // ORANGE, GREY GUY
05856       pSoldier->pShades[ 30 ] = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, 100, 100, 100, TRUE );
05857       for ( cnt = 31; cnt < 39; cnt++ )
05858       {
05859             pSoldier->pShades[ cnt ] = CreateEnemyGreyGlow16BPPPalette( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, gOrangeGlowR[ ( cnt - 20 ) ], gOrangeGlowG[ ( cnt - 20 ) ], TRUE );
05860       }
05861       pSoldier->pShades[ 39 ] = CreateEnemyGreyGlow16BPPPalette( pSoldier->p8BPPPalette, gOrangeGlowR[18], gOrangeGlowG[18], TRUE );
05862 
05863       return( TRUE );
05864 }
05865 
05866 
05867 
05868 void AdjustAniSpeed( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
05869 {
05870       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SLOW_ANIMATION ) )
05871       {
05872             if ( gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed == -1 )
05873             {
05874                   pSoldier->sAniDelay = 10000;
05875             }
05876             else
05877             {
05878                   pSoldier->sAniDelay = pSoldier->sAniDelay * ( 1 * gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed / 2 );
05879             }
05880       }
05881 
05882 
05883       RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->UpdateCounter, pSoldier->sAniDelay );
05884 }
05885 
05886 
05887 void CalculateSoldierAniSpeed( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pStatsSoldier )
05888 {
05889       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateSoldierAniSpeed");
05890       UINT32 uiTerrainDelay;
05891       UINT32 uiSpeed = 0;
05892  
05893       INT8 bBreathDef, bLifeDef, bAgilDef;
05894       INT8 bAdditional = 0;
05895             
05896       // for those animations which have a speed of zero, we have to calculate it
05897       // here. Some animation, such as water-movement, have an ADDITIONAL speed
05898       switch( pSoldier->usAnimState )
05899       {
05900         // Lesh: bursting animation delay control begins
05901         // Add your animation ID to control it
05902         case STANDING_BURST:
05903         case FIRE_STAND_BURST_SPREAD:
05904         case FIRE_BURST_LOW_STAND:
05905         case TANK_BURST:
05906         case CROUCHED_BURST:
05907         case PRONE_BURST:
05908             pSoldier->sAniDelay = Weapon[Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].ubClassIndex].sAniDelay;
05909             AdjustAniSpeed( pSoldier );
05910         return;
05911         // Lesh: end
05912 
05913             case PRONE:
05914             case STANDING:
05915 
05916                   pSoldier->sAniDelay = ( pStatsSoldier->bBreath * 2 ) + (100 - pStatsSoldier->bLife );
05917 
05918                   // Limit it!
05919                   if ( pSoldier->sAniDelay < 40 )
05920                   {
05921                         pSoldier->sAniDelay = 40;
05922                   }
05923                   AdjustAniSpeed( pSoldier );
05924             return;
05925 
05926             case CROUCHING:
05927 
05928                   pSoldier->sAniDelay = ( pStatsSoldier->bBreath * 2 ) + ( (100 - pStatsSoldier->bLife ) );
05929 
05930                   // Limit it!
05931                   if ( pSoldier->sAniDelay < 40 )
05932                   {
05933                         pSoldier->sAniDelay = 40;
05934                   }
05935                   AdjustAniSpeed( pSoldier );
05936             return;
05937 
05938             case WALKING:
05939 
05940                   // Adjust based on body type
05941                   bAdditional = (UINT8)( gubAnimWalkSpeeds[ pStatsSoldier->ubBodyType ].sSpeed );
05942                         if ( bAdditional < 0 )
05943                               bAdditional = 0;
05944                   break;
05945 
05946             case RUNNING:
05947 
05948                   // Adjust based on body type
05949                   bAdditional = (UINT8)gubAnimRunSpeeds[ pStatsSoldier->ubBodyType ].sSpeed;
05950                         if ( bAdditional < 0 )
05951                               bAdditional = 0;
05952                   break;
05953 
05954             case SWATTING:
05955 
05956                   // Adjust based on body type
05957                   if ( pStatsSoldier->ubBodyType <= REGFEMALE )
05958                   {
05959                         bAdditional = (UINT8)gubAnimSwatSpeeds[ pStatsSoldier->ubBodyType ].sSpeed;
05960                               if ( bAdditional < 0 )
05961                                     bAdditional = 0;
05962                   }
05963                   break;
05964 
05965             case CRAWLING:
05966 
05967                   // Adjust based on body type
05968                   if ( pStatsSoldier->ubBodyType <= REGFEMALE )
05969                   {
05970                         bAdditional = (UINT8)gubAnimCrawlSpeeds[ pStatsSoldier->ubBodyType ].sSpeed;
05971                               if ( bAdditional < 0 )
05972                                     bAdditional = 0;
05973                   }
05974                   break;
05975 
05976     case READY_RIFLE_STAND:
05977 
05978       // Raise rifle based on aim vs non-aim.
05979       if ( pSoldier->bAimTime == 0 )
05980       {
05981         // Quick shot
05982                     pSoldier->sAniDelay = 70;
05983       }
05984       else
05985       {
05986                     pSoldier->sAniDelay = 150;
05987       }
05988                   AdjustAniSpeed( pSoldier );
05989             return;
05990       }
05991 
05992 
05993       // figure out movement speed (terrspeed)
05994       if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING )                              
05995       {
05996             uiSpeed = gsTerrainTypeSpeedModifiers[ pStatsSoldier->bOverTerrainType ];
05997 
05998             uiTerrainDelay = uiSpeed;
05999       }
06000       else
06001       {
06002             uiTerrainDelay = 40;                // standing still
06003       }
06004 
06005       bBreathDef = 50 - ( pStatsSoldier->bBreath / 2 );
06006 
06007       if ( bBreathDef > 30 )
06008             bBreathDef = 30;
06009 
06010       bAgilDef = 50 - ( EffectiveAgility( pStatsSoldier ) / 4 );
06011       bLifeDef = 50 - ( pStatsSoldier->bLife / 2 );
06012 
06013       uiTerrainDelay += ( bLifeDef + bBreathDef + bAgilDef + bAdditional );
06014 
06015       pSoldier->sAniDelay = (INT16)uiTerrainDelay;
06016 
06017   // If a moving animation and w/re on drugs, increase speed....
06018       if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING )                              
06019   {
06020     if ( GetDrugEffect( pSoldier, DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ) )
06021     {
06022       pSoldier->sAniDelay = pSoldier->sAniDelay / 2;
06023     }
06024   }
06025 
06026       // MODIFTY NOW BASED ON REAL-TIME, ETC
06027       // Adjust speed, make twice as fast if in turn-based!
06028       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
06029       {
06030             pSoldier->sAniDelay = pSoldier->sAniDelay / 2;
06031       }
06032 
06033       // MODIFY IF REALTIME COMBAT
06034       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
06035       {
06036             // ATE: If realtime, and stealth mode...
06037             if ( pStatsSoldier->bStealthMode )
06038             {
06039                   pSoldier->sAniDelay = (INT16)( pSoldier->sAniDelay * 2 );
06040             }
06041 
06042             //pSoldier->sAniDelay = pSoldier->sAniDelay * ( 1 * gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed / 2 );
06043       }
06044 
06045 }
06046 
06047 UINT8 GetSpeedUpFactor( )
06048 {
06049       switch(  gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam )
06050       {
06051       case OUR_TEAM:
06052             return gGameExternalOptions.gubPlayerTurnSpeedUpFactor;
06053       case ENEMY_TEAM:
06054             return gGameExternalOptions.gubEnemyTurnSpeedUpFactor;
06055       case CREATURE_TEAM:
06056             return gGameExternalOptions.gubCreatureTurnSpeedUpFactor;
06057       case MILITIA_TEAM:
06058             return gGameExternalOptions.gubMilitiaTurnSpeedUpFactor;
06059       case CIV_TEAM:
06060             return gGameExternalOptions.gubCivilianTurnSpeedUpFactor;
06061       }
06062       
06063       return 1;
06064 }
06065 
06066 void SetSoldierAniSpeed( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
06067 {
06068       SOLDIERTYPE *pStatsSoldier;
06069             
06070       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"SetSoldierAniSpeed");
06071 
06072       // ATE: If we are an enemy and are not visible......
06073       // Set speed to 0
06074       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) || gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode )
06075       {
06076             if ( ( ( pSoldier->bVisible == -1 && pSoldier->bVisible == pSoldier->bLastRenderVisibleValue ) || gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode ) && pSoldier->usAnimState != MONSTER_UP )
06077             {
06078                   if ( pSoldier->bDoBurst && !PTR_OURTEAM )
06079                   {
06080                         pSoldier->sAniDelay = 50;
06081                   }
06082                   else
06083                   {
06084                         pSoldier->sAniDelay = 0;
06085                   }
06086                   RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->UpdateCounter, pSoldier->sAniDelay );
06087                   return;
06088             }
06089       }
06090 
06091       // Default stats soldier to same as normal soldier.....
06092       pStatsSoldier = pSoldier;
06093 
06094       if ( pSoldier->fUseMoverrideMoveSpeed )
06095       {
06096             pStatsSoldier = MercPtrs[ pSoldier->bOverrideMoveSpeed ];
06097       }
06098 
06099       // Only calculate if set to zero
06100       if ( ( pSoldier->sAniDelay = gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].sSpeed ) == 0 )
06101       {
06102             CalculateSoldierAniSpeed( pSoldier, pStatsSoldier );
06103       }
06104 
06105       AdjustAniSpeed( pSoldier );
06106 
06107       if ( _KeyDown( SPACE ) )
06108       {
06109             //pSoldier->sAniDelay = 1000;
06110       }
06111 
06112       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
06113             if( GetSpeedUpFactor() )
06114                   pSoldier->sAniDelay /= GetSpeedUpFactor();      
06115             else 
06116                   pSoldier->sAniDelay = 0;
06117 }
06118 
06119 
06120 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
06121 //PALETTE REPLACEMENT FUNCTIONS
06122 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
06123 BOOLEAN LoadPaletteData( )
06124 {
06125       HWFILE            hFile;
06126       UINT32                  cnt, cnt2;
06127 
06128       hFile = FileOpen( PALETTEFILENAME, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
06129 
06130       // Read # of types
06131       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &guiNumPaletteSubRanges, sizeof( guiNumPaletteSubRanges ), (UINT32 *)NULL ) )
06132       {
06133             return( FALSE );
06134       }
06135 
06136       // Malloc!
06137       gpPaletteSubRanges = (PaletteSubRangeType *) MemAlloc( sizeof( PaletteSubRangeType ) * guiNumPaletteSubRanges );
06138       gubpNumReplacementsPerRange = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( sizeof( UINT8 ) * guiNumPaletteSubRanges );
06139 
06140       // Read # of types for each!
06141       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumPaletteSubRanges; cnt++ )
06142       {
06143             if ( !FileRead( hFile, &gubpNumReplacementsPerRange[ cnt ], sizeof( UINT8 ), (UINT32 *)NULL ) )
06144             {
06145                   return( FALSE );
06146             }
06147       }
06148 
06149       // Loop for each one, read in data
06150       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumPaletteSubRanges; cnt++ )
06151       {
06152             if ( !FileRead( hFile, &gpPaletteSubRanges[ cnt ].ubStart, sizeof( UINT8 ), (UINT32 *)NULL ) )
06153             {
06154                   return( FALSE );
06155             }
06156             if ( !FileRead( hFile, &gpPaletteSubRanges[ cnt ].ubEnd, sizeof( UINT8 ), (UINT32 *)NULL ) )
06157             {
06158                   return( FALSE );
06159             }
06160       }
06161 
06162 
06163       // Read # of palettes
06164       if ( !FileRead( hFile, &guiNumReplacements, sizeof( guiNumReplacements ), (UINT32 *)NULL ) )
06165       {
06166             return( FALSE );
06167       }
06168 
06169       // Malloc!
06170       gpPalRep = (PaletteReplacementType *) MemAlloc( sizeof( PaletteReplacementType ) * guiNumReplacements );
06171 
06172       // Read!
06173       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumReplacements; cnt++ )
06174       {
06175             // type
06176             if ( !FileRead( hFile, &gpPalRep[ cnt ].ubType, sizeof( gpPalRep[ cnt ].ubType ), (UINT32 *)NULL ) )
06177             {
06178                   return( FALSE );
06179             }
06180 
06181             if ( !FileRead( hFile, &gpPalRep[ cnt ].ID, sizeof( gpPalRep[ cnt ].ID ), (UINT32 *)NULL ) )
06182             {
06183                   return( FALSE );
06184             }
06185             
06186             // # entries
06187             if ( !FileRead( hFile, &gpPalRep[ cnt ].ubPaletteSize, sizeof( gpPalRep[ cnt ].ubPaletteSize ), (UINT32 *)NULL ) )
06188             {
06189                   return( FALSE );
06190             }
06191 
06192             // Malloc
06193             gpPalRep[ cnt ].r = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( gpPalRep[ cnt ].ubPaletteSize );
06194             CHECKF( gpPalRep[ cnt ].r != NULL );
06195             gpPalRep[ cnt ].g = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( gpPalRep[ cnt ].ubPaletteSize );
06196             CHECKF( gpPalRep[ cnt ].g != NULL );
06197             gpPalRep[ cnt ].b = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( gpPalRep[ cnt ].ubPaletteSize );
06198             CHECKF( gpPalRep[ cnt ].b != NULL );
06199 
06200             for( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < gpPalRep[ cnt ].ubPaletteSize; cnt2++ )
06201             {
06202                   if ( !FileRead( hFile, &gpPalRep[ cnt ].r[ cnt2 ], sizeof( UINT8 ), (UINT32 *)NULL ) )
06203                   {
06204                         return( FALSE );
06205                   }
06206                   if ( !FileRead( hFile, &gpPalRep[ cnt ].g[ cnt2 ], sizeof( UINT8 ), (UINT32 *)NULL ) )
06207                   {
06208                         return( FALSE );
06209                   }
06210                   if ( !FileRead( hFile, &gpPalRep[ cnt ].b[ cnt2 ], sizeof( UINT8 ), (UINT32 *)NULL ) )
06211                   {
06212                         return( FALSE );
06213                   }
06214             }
06215 
06216       }
06217 
06218       FileClose( hFile );
06219       
06220       return( TRUE );
06221 }
06222 
06223 BOOLEAN     SetPaletteReplacement( SGPPaletteEntry *p8BPPPalette, PaletteRepID aPalRep )
06224 {
06225       UINT32 cnt2;
06226       UINT8  ubType;
06227       UINT8  ubPalIndex;
06228 
06229       CHECKF( GetPaletteRepIndexFromID( aPalRep, &ubPalIndex ) );
06230 
06231       // Get range type
06232       ubType = gpPalRep[ ubPalIndex ].ubType;
06233 
06234       for ( cnt2 = gpPaletteSubRanges[ ubType ].ubStart; cnt2 <= gpPaletteSubRanges[ ubType ].ubEnd; cnt2++ )
06235       {
06236             p8BPPPalette[ cnt2 ].peRed =  gpPalRep[ ubPalIndex ].r[ cnt2 - gpPaletteSubRanges[ ubType ].ubStart ];
06237             p8BPPPalette[ cnt2 ].peGreen = gpPalRep[ ubPalIndex ].g[ cnt2 - gpPaletteSubRanges[ ubType ].ubStart ];
06238             p8BPPPalette[ cnt2 ].peBlue = gpPalRep[ ubPalIndex ].b[ cnt2 - gpPaletteSubRanges[ ubType ].ubStart ];
06239       }
06240 
06241       return( TRUE );
06242 }
06243 
06244 
06245 BOOLEAN DeletePaletteData( )
06246 {
06247       UINT32 cnt;
06248 
06249       // Free!
06250       if ( gpPaletteSubRanges != NULL )
06251       {
06252             MemFree( gpPaletteSubRanges );
06253             gpPaletteSubRanges = NULL;
06254       }
06255 
06256       if ( gubpNumReplacementsPerRange != NULL )
06257       {
06258             MemFree( gubpNumReplacementsPerRange );
06259             gubpNumReplacementsPerRange = NULL;
06260       }
06261 
06262 
06263       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumReplacements; cnt++ )
06264       {
06265             // Free
06266             if ( gpPalRep[ cnt ].r != NULL )
06267             {
06268                   MemFree( gpPalRep[ cnt ].r );
06269                   gpPalRep[ cnt ].r = NULL;
06270             }
06271             if ( gpPalRep[ cnt ].g != NULL )
06272             {
06273                   MemFree( gpPalRep[ cnt ].g );
06274                   gpPalRep[ cnt ].g = NULL;
06275             }
06276             if ( gpPalRep[ cnt ].b != NULL )
06277             {
06278                   MemFree( gpPalRep[ cnt ].b );
06279                   gpPalRep[ cnt ].b  = NULL;
06280             }
06281       }
06282 
06283       // Free
06284       if ( gpPalRep != NULL )
06285       {
06286             MemFree( gpPalRep );
06287             gpPalRep = NULL;
06288       }
06289       
06290       return( TRUE );
06291 }
06292 
06293 
06294 BOOLEAN GetPaletteRepIndexFromID( PaletteRepID aPalRep, UINT8 *pubPalIndex )
06295 {
06296       UINT32 cnt;
06297 
06298       // Check if type exists
06299       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumReplacements; cnt++ )
06300       {
06301             if ( COMPARE_PALETTEREP_ID( aPalRep, gpPalRep[ cnt ].ID ) )
06302             {
06303                   *pubPalIndex = ( UINT8 )cnt;
06304                   return( TRUE );
06305             }
06306       }
06307 
06308       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Invalid Palette Replacement ID given");
06309       return( FALSE );
06310 }
06311 
06312 UINT16 GetNewSoldierStateFromNewStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubDesiredStance )
06313 {
06314       UINT16 usNewState;
06315       INT8  bCurrentHeight;
06316 
06317       bCurrentHeight = ( ubDesiredStance - gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight );
06318 
06319       // Now change to appropriate animation
06320 
06321       switch( bCurrentHeight )
06322       {
06323             case ANIM_STAND - ANIM_CROUCH:
06324                   usNewState  = KNEEL_UP;
06325                   break;
06326             case ANIM_CROUCH - ANIM_STAND:
06327                   usNewState  = KNEEL_DOWN;
06328                   break;
06329 
06330             case ANIM_STAND - ANIM_PRONE:
06331                   usNewState  = PRONE_UP;
06332                   break;
06333             case ANIM_PRONE - ANIM_STAND:
06334                   usNewState  = KNEEL_DOWN;
06335                   break;
06336 
06337             case ANIM_CROUCH - ANIM_PRONE:
06338                   usNewState  = PRONE_UP;
06339                   break;
06340             case ANIM_PRONE - ANIM_CROUCH:
06341                   usNewState  = PRONE_DOWN;
06342                   break;
06343 
06344             default:
06345 
06346                   // Cannot get here unless ub desired stance is bogus
06347                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "GetNewSoldierStateFromNewStance bogus ubDesiredStance value %d", ubDesiredStance ) );
06348                   usNewState = pSoldier->usAnimState;
06349 
06350       }
06351       
06352       return( usNewState );
06353 }
06354 
06355 
06356 void MoveMercFacingDirection( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fReverse, FLOAT dMovementDist )
06357 {
06358       FLOAT                         dAngle = (FLOAT)0;
06359 
06360       // Determine which direction we are in 
06361       switch( pSoldier->bDirection )
06362       {
06363             case NORTH:
06364                   dAngle = (FLOAT)( -1 * PI );
06365                   break;
06366 
06367             case NORTHEAST:
06368                   dAngle = (FLOAT)( PI * .75 );
06369                   break;
06370 
06371             case EAST:
06372                   dAngle = (FLOAT)( PI / 2 );
06373                   break;
06374 
06375             case SOUTHEAST:
06376                   dAngle = (FLOAT)( PI / 4 );
06377                   break;
06378 
06379             case SOUTH:
06380                   dAngle = (FLOAT)0;
06381                   break;
06382 
06383             case SOUTHWEST:
06384                   //dAngle = (FLOAT)(  PI * -.25 );
06385                   dAngle = (FLOAT)-0.786;
06386                   break;
06387 
06388             case WEST:
06389                   dAngle = (FLOAT) ( PI *-.5 );
06390                   break;
06391 
06392             case NORTHWEST:
06393                   dAngle = (FLOAT) ( PI * -.75 );
06394                   break;
06395 
06396       }
06397 
06398       if ( fReverse )
06399       {
06400             dMovementDist = dMovementDist * -1;
06401       }
06402 
06403       MoveMerc( pSoldier, dMovementDist, dAngle, FALSE );
06404 
06405 }
06406 
06407 void BeginSoldierClimbUpRoof( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
06408 {
06409       INT8                                      bNewDirection;
06410       UINT8                                     ubWhoIsThere;
06411 
06412 
06413       if ( FindHeigherLevel( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection, &bNewDirection ) && ( pSoldier->bLevel == 0 ) )
06414       {
06415             if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, GetAPsToClimbRoof( pSoldier, FALSE ), 0, TRUE ) )
06416             {
06417                   //Kaiden: Helps if we look where we are going before we try to climb on top of someone
06418              ubWhoIsThere = WhoIsThere2( NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc(bNewDirection ) ), 1 );
06419              if ( ubWhoIsThere != NOBODY && ubWhoIsThere != pSoldier->ubID )
06420              {
06421                   return;
06422              }
06423          else
06424              {
06425 
06426                   if (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
06427                   {
06428                         // OK, SET INTERFACE FIRST
06429                         SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
06430                   }
06431 
06432                   pSoldier->sTempNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc(bNewDirection ) );
06433 
06434                   pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = bNewDirection;
06435                   //pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = CLIMBUPROOF;
06436                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CLIMBUPROOF, 0 , FALSE );
06437 
06438                   InternalReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier, FALSE );                    
06439                   InternalGivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier, FALSE );                       
06440 
06441             }           
06442 
06443             }           
06444       }
06445 
06446 }
06447 
06448 void BeginSoldierClimbFence( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
06449 {
06450       INT8                                      bDirection;
06451 
06452       if ( FindFenceJumpDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection, &bDirection ) )
06453       {
06454             pSoldier->sTempNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc(bDirection ) );
06455             pSoldier->fDontChargeTurningAPs = TRUE;
06456             EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, bDirection, FALSE, pSoldier->usAnimState );
06457             pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone = TRUE;
06458             // ATE: Reset flag to go back to prone...
06459             pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = TURNING_FROM_PRONE_OFF;
06460             pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = HOPFENCE;
06461       }
06462 
06463 }
06464 
06465 UINT32 SleepDartSuccumbChance( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06466 {
06467       UINT32            uiChance;
06468       INT8              bEffectiveStrength;
06469 
06470       // figure out base chance of succumbing, 
06471       bEffectiveStrength = EffectiveStrength( pSoldier );
06472 
06473       if (bEffectiveStrength > 90)
06474       {
06475             uiChance = 110 - bEffectiveStrength;
06476       }
06477       else if (bEffectiveStrength > 80)
06478       {
06479             uiChance = 120 - bEffectiveStrength;
06480       }
06481       else if (bEffectiveStrength > 70)
06482       {
06483             uiChance = 130 - bEffectiveStrength;
06484       }
06485       else
06486       {
06487             uiChance = 140 - bEffectiveStrength;
06488       }
06489 
06490       // add in a bonus based on how long it's been since shot... highest chance at the beginning
06491       uiChance += (10 - pSoldier->bSleepDrugCounter);
06492 
06493       return( uiChance );
06494 }
06495 
06496 void BeginSoldierGetup( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
06497 {
06498       // RETURN IF WE ARE BEING SERVICED
06499       if ( pSoldier->ubServiceCount > 0 )
06500       {
06501             return;
06502       }
06503 
06504       // ATE: Don't getup if we are in a meanwhile
06505       if ( AreInMeanwhile( ) )
06506       {
06507             return;
06508       }
06509 
06510       if ( pSoldier->bCollapsed )
06511       {
06512             if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bBreath >= OKBREATH && (pSoldier->bSleepDrugCounter == 0) )
06513             {
06514                   // get up you hoser!
06515 
06516                   pSoldier->bCollapsed = FALSE;
06517                   pSoldier->bTurnsCollapsed = 0;
06518 
06519                   if ( IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( pSoldier ) )
06520                   {
06521                         switch( pSoldier->usAnimState )
06522                         {
06523                               case FALLOFF_FORWARD_STOP:
06524                               case PRONE_LAYFROMHIT_STOP:
06525                               case STAND_FALLFORWARD_STOP:
06526                                     ChangeSoldierStance( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
06527                                     break;
06528 
06529                               case FALLBACKHIT_STOP:
06530                               case FALLOFF_STOP:
06531                               case FLYBACKHIT_STOP:
06532                               case FALLBACK_HIT_STAND:
06533                               case FALLOFF:
06534                               case FLYBACK_HIT:
06535 
06536                                     // ROLL OVER
06537                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, ROLLOVER, 0 , FALSE );
06538                                     break;
06539                               
06540                               default:
06541 
06542                                     ChangeSoldierStance( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
06543                                     break;
06544                         }
06545                   }
06546                   else
06547                   {
06548                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, END_COWER, 0 , FALSE );
06549                   }
06550             }
06551             else
06552             {
06553                   pSoldier->bTurnsCollapsed++;
06554                   if ( (gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING) && (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_BOXER) )
06555                   {
06556                         if (pSoldier->bTurnsCollapsed > 1)
06557                         {
06558                               // We have a winnah!  But it isn't this boxer!
06559                               EndBoxingMatch( pSoldier );
06560                         }
06561                   }
06562             }
06563       }
06564       else if ( pSoldier->bSleepDrugCounter > 0 )
06565       {
06566             UINT32 uiChance;
06567 
06568             uiChance = SleepDartSuccumbChance( pSoldier );
06569 
06570             if ( PreRandom( 100 ) < uiChance )
06571             {
06572                   // succumb to the drug!
06573                   DeductPoints( pSoldier, 0, (INT16)( pSoldier->bBreathMax * 100 ) );
06574                   SoldierCollapse( pSoldier );
06575             }
06576       }
06577 
06578       if ( pSoldier->bSleepDrugCounter > 0 )
06579       {
06580             pSoldier->bSleepDrugCounter--;
06581       }
06582 }
06583 
06584 
06585 void HandleTakeDamageDeath( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 bOldLife, UINT8 ubReason )
06586 {
06587       switch( ubReason )
06588       {
06589             case TAKE_DAMAGE_BLOODLOSS:
06590             case TAKE_DAMAGE_ELECTRICITY:
06591             case TAKE_DAMAGE_GAS:
06592  
06593                   if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
06594                   {
06595                         if ( pSoldier->bVisible != -1 )
06596                         {
06597           if ( ubReason != TAKE_DAMAGE_BLOODLOSS )
06598           {
06599                                 DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_DIE1 );
06600                     pSoldier->fDeadSoundPlayed = TRUE;
06601           }
06602                         }
06603 
06604         if ( ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_ELECTRICITY ) && pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
06605         {
06606            pSoldier->fInNonintAnim = FALSE;
06607         }
06608 
06609                         // Check for < OKLIFE
06610                         if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE && pSoldier->bLife != 0 && !pSoldier->bCollapsed)
06611                         {
06612                               SoldierCollapse( pSoldier );
06613                         }
06614 
06615         // THis is for the die animation that will be happening....
06616         if ( pSoldier->bLife == 0 )
06617         {
06618           pSoldier->fDoingExternalDeath = TRUE;
06619         }
06620 
06621                         // Check if he is dead....
06622                         CheckForAndHandleSoldierDyingNotFromHit( pSoldier );
06623 
06624                   }
06625 
06626                   //if( !( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
06627       {
06628             HandleSoldierTakeDamageFeedback( pSoldier );
06629       }
06630 
06631                   if(( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) || !pSoldier->bInSector )
06632                   {
06633                         if ( pSoldier->bLife == 0 && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
06634                         {
06635                               StrategicHandlePlayerTeamMercDeath( pSoldier );
06636 
06637           // ATE: Here, force always to use die sound...
06638           pSoldier->fDieSoundUsed = FALSE;
06639                               DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_DIE1 );
06640                   pSoldier->fDeadSoundPlayed = TRUE;
06641 
06642           // ATE: DO death sound
06643                               PlayJA2Sample( (UINT8)DOORCR_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
06644                               PlayJA2Sample( (UINT8)HEADCR_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
06645                         }
06646                   }
06647                   break;
06648       }
06649 
06650       if ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_ELECTRICITY )
06651       {
06652     if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
06653     {
06654       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Freeing up attacker from electricity damage") );
06655               ReleaseSoldiersAttacker( pSoldier );
06656     }
06657       }
06658 }
06659 
06660 
06661 UINT8 SoldierTakeDamage( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bHeight, INT16 sLifeDeduct, INT16 sBreathLoss, UINT8 ubReason, UINT8 ubAttacker, INT16 sSourceGrid, INT16 sSubsequent, BOOLEAN fShowDamage )
06662 {
06663       INT8        bOldLife;
06664       UINT8       ubCombinedLoss;
06665       INT8        bBandage;
06666       INT16       sAPCost;
06667       UINT8       ubBlood;
06668       UINT16            usItemFlags=0; // Kaiden: Needed for the reveal all items after combat code from UB.
06669   
06670   pSoldier->ubLastDamageReason = ubReason;
06671 
06672 
06673       // CJC Jan 21 99: add check to see if we are hurting an enemy in an enemy-controlled
06674       // sector; if so, this is a sign of player activity
06675       switch ( pSoldier->bTeam )
06676       {
06677             case ENEMY_TEAM:
06678                   // if we're in the wilderness this always counts
06679                   if ( StrategicMap[ CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ].fEnemyControlled || SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ].ubTraversability[ THROUGH_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] != TOWN )
06680                   {
06681                         // update current day of activity!
06682                         UpdateLastDayOfPlayerActivity( (UINT16) GetWorldDay() );
06683                   }
06684                   break;
06685             case CREATURE_TEAM:
06686                   // always a sign of activity?
06687                   UpdateLastDayOfPlayerActivity( (UINT16) GetWorldDay() );
06688                   break;
06689             case CIV_TEAM:
06690                   if ( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP && gubQuest[ QUEST_RESCUE_MARIA ] == QUESTINPROGRESS && gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == NOT_BOXING )
06691                   {
06692                         SOLDIERTYPE * pMaria = FindSoldierByProfileID( MARIA, FALSE );
06693                         if ( pMaria && pMaria->bActive && pMaria->bInSector )
06694                         {
06695                               SetFactTrue( FACT_MARIA_ESCAPE_NOTICED );
06696                         }
06697                   }
06698                   break;
06699             default:
06700                   break;
06701       }
06702 
06703       // Deduct life!, Show damage if we want!
06704       bOldLife = pSoldier->bLife;
06705 
06706       // OK, If we are a vehicle.... damage vehicle...( people inside... )
06707       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
06708       {
06709             if ( TANK( pSoldier ) )
06710             {
06711                   //sLifeDeduct = (sLifeDeduct * 2) / 3;
06712             }
06713             else 
06714             {
06715                   if ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_GUNFIRE )
06716                   {
06717                         sLifeDeduct /= 3;
06718                   }
06719                   else if ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_EXPLOSION && sLifeDeduct > 50 )
06720                   {
06721                         // boom!
06722                         sLifeDeduct *= 2;
06723                   }
06724             }
06725 
06726             VehicleTakeDamage( pSoldier->bVehicleID, ubReason, sLifeDeduct, pSoldier->sGridNo, ubAttacker );
06727             HandleTakeDamageDeath( pSoldier, bOldLife, ubReason );
06728             return( 0 );
06729       }
06730 
06731       // ATE: If we are elloit being attacked in a meanwhile...
06732       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_NPC_SHOOTING )
06733       {
06734             // Almost kill but not quite.....
06735             sLifeDeduct = ( pSoldier->bLife - 1 );
06736             // Turn off
06737             pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= ( ~SOLDIER_NPC_SHOOTING );
06738       }
06739 
06740       // CJC: make sure Elliot doesn't bleed to death!
06741       if ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_BLOODLOSS && AreInMeanwhile() )
06742       {
06743             return( 0 );
06744       }
06745 
06746 
06747       // Calculate bandage
06748       bBandage = pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife - pSoldier->bBleeding;
06749 
06750       if( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
06751       {
06752             fReDrawFace = TRUE;
06753       }
06754 
06755       if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) )
06756       {
06757             INT16 sReductionFactor = 0;
06758       
06759             if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
06760             {
06761                   sReductionFactor = 2;
06762             }
06763             else if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER)
06764             {
06765                   switch( pSoldier->ubBodyType )
06766                   {
06767                         case LARVAE_MONSTER:
06768                         case INFANT_MONSTER:
06769                               sReductionFactor = 1;
06770                               break;
06771                         case YAF_MONSTER:
06772                         case YAM_MONSTER:
06773                               sReductionFactor = 4;
06774                               break;
06775                         case ADULTFEMALEMONSTER:
06776                         case AM_MONSTER:
06777                               sReductionFactor = 6;
06778                               break;
06779                         case QUEENMONSTER:
06780                               // increase with range!
06781                               if ( ubAttacker == NOBODY )
06782                               {
06783                                     sReductionFactor = 8;
06784                               }
06785                               else
06786                               {
06787                                     sReductionFactor = 4 + PythSpacesAway( MercPtrs[ ubAttacker ]->sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo ) / 2;
06788                               }
06789                               break;
06790                   }
06791             }
06792 
06793             if ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_EXPLOSION )
06794             {
06795                   sReductionFactor /= 4;
06796             }
06797             if ( sReductionFactor > 1 )
06798             {
06799                   sLifeDeduct = (sLifeDeduct + (sReductionFactor / 2 ) ) / sReductionFactor;
06800             }
06801             else if (   ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_EXPLOSION )
06802             {
06803                   // take at most 2/3rds
06804                   sLifeDeduct = (sLifeDeduct * 2) / 3;
06805             }
06806       
06807             // reduce breath loss to a smaller degree, except for the queen...
06808             if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER )
06809             {
06810                   // in fact, reduce breath loss by MORE!
06811                   sReductionFactor = __min( sReductionFactor, 8 );
06812                   sReductionFactor *= 2;
06813             }
06814             else
06815             {
06816                   sReductionFactor /= 2;
06817             }
06818             if ( sReductionFactor > 1 )
06819             {
06820                   sBreathLoss = (sBreathLoss + (sReductionFactor / 2 ) ) / sReductionFactor;
06821             }
06822       }
06823 
06824       if (sLifeDeduct > pSoldier->bLife)
06825       {
06826             pSoldier->bLife = 0;    
06827       }
06828       else
06829       {
06830             // Decrease Health
06831             pSoldier->bLife -= sLifeDeduct;
06832       }
06833 
06834       // ATE: Put some logic in here to allow enemies to die quicker.....
06835       // Are we an enemy?
06836       if ( pSoldier->bSide != gbPlayerNum && !pSoldier->bNeutral && pSoldier->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE )
06837       {
06838             // ATE: Give them a chance to fall down...
06839             if ( pSoldier->bLife > 0 && pSoldier->bLife < ( OKLIFE - 1 ) )
06840             {
06841                   // Are we taking damage from bleeding?
06842                   if ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_BLOODLOSS )
06843                   {
06844                         // Fifty-fifty chance to die now!
06845                         if ( Random( 2 ) == 0 || gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bMenInSector == 1 )
06846                         {
06847                               // Kill!
06848                               pSoldier->bLife = 0;
06849                         }
06850                   }
06851                   else
06852                   {
06853                         // OK, see how far we are..
06854                         if ( pSoldier->bLife < ( OKLIFE - 3 ) )
06855                         {
06856                               // Kill!
06857                               pSoldier->bLife = 0;
06858                         }
06859                   }
06860             }
06861       }
06862 
06863       if ( fShowDamage )
06864       {
06865             pSoldier->sDamage += sLifeDeduct;
06866       }
06867 
06868       // Truncate life
06869       if ( pSoldier->bLife < 0 )
06870       {
06871             pSoldier->bLife = 0;
06872       }
06873 
06874 
06875       // Calculate damage to our items if from an explosion!
06876       if ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_EXPLOSION || ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_STRUCTURE_EXPLOSION)
06877       {
06878             CheckEquipmentForDamage( pSoldier, sLifeDeduct );
06879       }
06880 
06881 
06882 
06883       // Calculate bleeding
06884       if ( ubReason != TAKE_DAMAGE_GAS && !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
06885       {
06886             if ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_HANDTOHAND  )
06887             {
06888                   if ( sLifeDeduct > 0 )
06889                   {
06890                         // HTH does 1 pt bleeding per hit
06891                         pSoldier->bBleeding = pSoldier->bBleeding + 1;
06892                   }
06893             }
06894             else
06895             {
06896                   pSoldier->bBleeding = pSoldier->bLifeMax - ( pSoldier->bLife + bBandage );
06897             }
06898 
06899       }
06900 
06901       // Deduct breath AND APs!
06902   sAPCost = (sLifeDeduct / AP_GET_WOUNDED_DIVISOR); // + fallCost;
06903 
06904   // ATE: if the robot, do not deduct
06905       if ( !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
06906       {
06907         DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, sBreathLoss , FALSE);
06908   }
06909 
06910       ubCombinedLoss = (UINT8) sLifeDeduct / 10 + sBreathLoss / 2000;
06911 
06912       // Add shock
06913       if ( !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
06914       {
06915             pSoldier->bShock += ubCombinedLoss;
06916       }
06917 
06918   // start the stopwatch - the blood is gushing!
06919       pSoldier->dNextBleed = CalcSoldierNextBleed( pSoldier );
06920 
06921       if ( pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bVisible != -1 )
06922       {
06923             // If we are already dead, don't show damage!
06924             if ( bOldLife != 0 && fShowDamage && sLifeDeduct != 0 && sLifeDeduct < 1000 )
06925             {
06926                   // Display damage
06927                   INT16 sOffsetX, sOffsetY;
06928 
06929                   // Set Damage display counter
06930                   pSoldier->fDisplayDamage = TRUE;
06931                   pSoldier->bDisplayDamageCount = 0;
06932 
06933       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER )
06934       {
06935                     pSoldier->sDamageX = 0;
06936                     pSoldier->sDamageY = 0;
06937       }
06938       else
06939       {
06940                     GetSoldierAnimOffsets( pSoldier, &sOffsetX, &sOffsetY );
06941                     pSoldier->sDamageX = sOffsetX;
06942                     pSoldier->sDamageY = sOffsetY;
06943       }
06944             }
06945       }
06946 
06947       // OK, if here, let's see if we should drop our weapon....
06948       if ( ubReason != TAKE_DAMAGE_BLOODLOSS && !(AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier )) )
06949       {
06950             INT16 sTestOne, sTestTwo, sChanceToDrop;
06951             INT8  bVisible = -1;
06952 
06953             sTestOne = EffectiveStrength( pSoldier );
06954             sTestTwo = ( 2 * ( __max( sLifeDeduct, ( sBreathLoss / 100 ) ) ) );
06955 
06956 
06957             if (pSoldier->ubAttackerID != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubAttackerID ]->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
06958             {
06959                   // bloodcat boost, let them make people drop items more
06960                   sTestTwo += 20;
06961             }
06962 
06963             // If damage > effective strength....
06964             sChanceToDrop = ( __max( 0, ( sTestTwo - sTestOne ) ) );
06965 
06966             // ATE: Increase odds of NOT dropping an UNDROPPABLE OBJECT
06967             if ( ( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].fFlags & OBJECT_UNDROPPABLE ) )
06968             {
06969                   sChanceToDrop -= 30;
06970             }
06971 
06972 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
06973             //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Chance To Drop Weapon: str: %d Dam: %d Chance: %d", sTestOne, sTestTwo, sChanceToDrop );
06974 #endif
06975 
06976             if ( Random( 100 ) < (UINT16) sChanceToDrop )
06977             {
06978                   // OK, drop item in main hand...
06979                   if ( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem != NOTHING )
06980                   {
06981                         if ( !( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].fFlags & OBJECT_UNDROPPABLE ) )
06982                         {
06983                               // ATE: if our guy, make visible....
06984                               if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
06985                               {
06986                                     bVisible = 1;
06987                               }
06988                               //if this soldier was an enemy
06989                               // Kaiden Added for UB reveal All items after combat feature!
06990                               else if( pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
06991                               {
06992                                           //add a flag to the item so when all enemies are killed, we can run through and reveal all the enemies items
06993                                           usItemFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_DROPPED_FROM_ENEMY;
06994                               }
06995                               AddItemToPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, &(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]), bVisible, pSoldier->bLevel, usItemFlags, -1 ); //Madd: added usItemFlags to function arguments
06996                               DeleteObj( &(pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]) );
06997                         }
06998                   }
06999             }
07000       }
07001 
07002        // Drop some blood!
07003    // decide blood amt, if any
07004    ubBlood = ( sLifeDeduct / BLOODDIVISOR);
07005    if ( ubBlood > MAXBLOODQUANTITY )
07006        {
07007       ubBlood = MAXBLOODQUANTITY;
07008        }
07009 
07010       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_VEHICLE | SOLDIER_ROBOT ) ) )
07011       {
07012              if ( ubBlood != 0 )
07013              {
07014                   if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
07015                   {
07016                         DropBlood( pSoldier, ubBlood, pSoldier->bVisible );
07017                   }
07018              }
07019       }
07020 
07021       //Set UI Flag for unconscious, if it's our own guy!
07022       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum  )
07023       {
07024             if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE && pSoldier->bLife > 0 && bOldLife >= OKLIFE )
07025             {
07026                   pSoldier->fUIFirstTimeUNCON = TRUE;
07027                   fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
07028             }
07029       }
07030 
07031       if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
07032       {
07033             CheckForBreathCollapse( pSoldier );
07034       }
07035 
07036   // EXPERIENCE CLASS GAIN (combLoss): Getting wounded in battle
07037 
07038       DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL1 );
07039 
07040 
07041       if ( ubAttacker != NOBODY )
07042       {
07043             // don't give exp for hitting friends!
07044             if ( (MercPtrs[ ubAttacker ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum) && (pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum) )
07045             {
07046                   if ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_EXPLOSION )
07047                   {
07048                         // EXPLOSIVES GAIN (combLoss):  Causing wounds in battle
07049                         StatChange( MercPtrs[ ubAttacker ], EXPLODEAMT, (UINT16)( 10 * ubCombinedLoss ), FROM_FAILURE );
07050                   }
07051                   /*
07052                   else if ( ubReason == TAKE_DAMAGE_GUNFIRE )
07053                   {
07054                         // MARKSMANSHIP GAIN (combLoss):  Causing wounds in battle
07055                         StatChange( MercPtrs[ ubAttacker ], MARKAMT, (UINT16)( 5 * ubCombinedLoss ), FALSE );
07056                   }
07057                   */
07058             }
07059       }
07060 
07061 
07062       if (PTR_OURTEAM)
07063       {
07064             // EXPERIENCE GAIN: Took some damage
07065         StatChange( pSoldier, EXPERAMT, ( UINT16 )( 5 * ubCombinedLoss ), FROM_FAILURE );
07066 
07067             // Check for quote
07068             if ( !(pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_BEING_PUMMELED ) )
07069             {
07070                   // Check attacker!
07071                   if ( ubAttacker != NOBODY && ubAttacker != pSoldier->ubID )
07072                   {
07073                         pSoldier->bNumHitsThisTurn++;
07074 
07075                         if ( (pSoldier->bNumHitsThisTurn >= 3) && ( pSoldier->bLife - pSoldier->bOldLife > 20 ) )
07076                         {
07077                               if ( Random(100) < (UINT16)((40 * ( pSoldier->bNumHitsThisTurn - 2))))
07078                               {
07079                                     DelayedTacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_TAKEN_A_BREATING );               
07080                                     pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_BEING_PUMMELED;
07081                                     pSoldier->bNumHitsThisTurn = 0;
07082                               }
07083                         }
07084                   }
07085             }
07086       }
07087 
07088       if ((ubAttacker != NOBODY) && (Menptr[ubAttacker].bTeam == OUR_TEAM) && (pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE) && (pSoldier->ubProfile >= FIRST_RPC && pSoldier->ubProfile < GASTON ))
07089       {
07090             gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_WOUNDEDBYPLAYER;
07091             if (pSoldier->ubProfile == 114)
07092             {
07093                   SetFactTrue( FACT_PACOS_KILLED );
07094             }
07095       }
07096 
07097       HandleTakeDamageDeath( pSoldier, bOldLife, ubReason );
07098 
07099       // Check if we are < unconscious, and shutup if so! also wipe sight
07100       if ( pSoldier->bLife < CONSCIOUSNESS )
07101       {
07102             ShutupaYoFace( pSoldier->iFaceIndex );
07103       }
07104       
07105       if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
07106       {
07107             DecayIndividualOpplist( pSoldier );
07108       }
07109 
07110 
07111       return( ubCombinedLoss );
07112 }
07113 
07114 
07115 extern BOOLEAN IsMercSayingDialogue( UINT8 ubProfileID );
07116 
07117 
07118 BOOLEAN InternalDoMercBattleSound( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubBattleSoundID, INT8 bSpecialCode )
07119 {
07120       SGPFILENAME       zFilename;
07121       SOUNDPARMS        spParms;
07122       UINT8                         ubSoundID;
07123       UINT32                        uiSoundID;
07124       UINT32                        iFaceIndex;
07125       BOOLEAN                       fDoSub = FALSE;
07126       INT32                         uiSubSoundID = 0;
07127       BOOLEAN                       fSpeechSound = FALSE;
07128 
07129       // DOUBLECHECK RANGE
07130       CHECKF ( ubBattleSoundID < NUM_MERC_BATTLE_SOUNDS );
07131 
07132   if ( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
07133   {
07134     // Pick a passenger from vehicle....
07135     pSoldier = PickRandomPassengerFromVehicle( pSoldier );
07136 
07137     if ( pSoldier == NULL )
07138     {
07139       return( FALSE );
07140     }
07141 
07142   }
07143 
07144       // If a death sound, and we have already done ours...
07145       if ( ubBattleSoundID == BATTLE_SOUND_DIE1 )
07146       {
07147             if ( pSoldier->fDieSoundUsed )
07148             {
07149                   return( TRUE );
07150             }
07151       }
07152 
07153       
07154       // Are we mute?
07155       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MUTE )
07156       {
07157             return( FALSE );
07158       }
07159 
07160 
07161 //    uiTimeSameBattleSndDone
07162 
07163       // If we are a creature, etc, pick a better sound...
07164       if ( ubBattleSoundID == BATTLE_SOUND_HIT1 || ubBattleSoundID == BATTLE_SOUND_HIT2 )
07165       {
07166             switch ( pSoldier->ubBodyType )
07167             {
07168                   case COW:
07169 
07170                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07171                         uiSubSoundID = COW_HIT_SND;
07172                         break;
07173 
07174                   case YAF_MONSTER:
07175                   case YAM_MONSTER:
07176                   case ADULTFEMALEMONSTER:
07177                   case AM_MONSTER:
07178 
07179                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07180 
07181                         if ( Random( 2 ) == 0 )
07182                         {
07183                               uiSubSoundID = ACR_DIE_PART1;
07184                         }
07185                         else
07186                         {
07187                               uiSubSoundID = ACR_LUNGE;
07188                         }
07189                         break;
07190 
07191                   case INFANT_MONSTER:
07192 
07193                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07194                         uiSubSoundID = BCR_SHRIEK;
07195                         break;
07196 
07197                   case QUEENMONSTER:
07198 
07199                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07200                         uiSubSoundID = LQ_SHRIEK;
07201                         break;
07202 
07203                   case LARVAE_MONSTER:
07204 
07205                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07206                         uiSubSoundID = BCR_SHRIEK;
07207                         break;
07208 
07209                   case BLOODCAT:
07210 
07211                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07212                         uiSubSoundID = BLOODCAT_HIT_1;
07213                         break;
07214 
07215                   case ROBOTNOWEAPON:
07216 
07217                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07218                         uiSubSoundID = (UINT32)( S_METAL_IMPACT1 + Random( 2 ) );
07219                         break;
07220             }
07221       }
07222 
07223       if ( ubBattleSoundID == BATTLE_SOUND_DIE1 )
07224       {
07225             switch ( pSoldier->ubBodyType )
07226             {
07227                   case COW:
07228 
07229                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07230                         uiSubSoundID = COW_DIE_SND;
07231                         break;
07232 
07233                   case YAF_MONSTER:
07234                   case YAM_MONSTER:
07235                   case ADULTFEMALEMONSTER:
07236                   case AM_MONSTER:
07237 
07238                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07239                         uiSubSoundID = CREATURE_FALL_PART_2;
07240                         break;
07241 
07242                   case INFANT_MONSTER:
07243 
07244                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07245                         uiSubSoundID = BCR_DYING;
07246                         break;
07247 
07248                   case LARVAE_MONSTER:
07249 
07250                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07251                         uiSubSoundID = LCR_RUPTURE;
07252                         break;
07253 
07254                   case QUEENMONSTER:
07255 
07256                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07257                         uiSubSoundID = LQ_DYING;
07258                         break;
07259 
07260                   case BLOODCAT:
07261 
07262                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07263                         uiSubSoundID = BLOODCAT_DIE_1;
07264                         break;
07265 
07266                   case ROBOTNOWEAPON:
07267 
07268                         fDoSub = TRUE;
07269                         uiSubSoundID = (UINT32)( EXPLOSION_1 );
07270                   PlayJA2Sample( ROBOT_DEATH, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                 
07271                         break;
07272 
07273             }
07274       }
07275 
07276       // OK. any other sound, not hits, robot makes a beep
07277       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == ROBOTNOWEAPON && !fDoSub )
07278       {
07279             fDoSub = TRUE;
07280     if ( ubBattleSoundID == BATTLE_SOUND_ATTN1 )
07281     {
07282               uiSubSoundID = ROBOT_GREETING;
07283     }
07284     else
07285     {
07286               uiSubSoundID = ROBOT_BEEP;
07287     }
07288       }
07289 
07290       if ( fDoSub )
07291       {
07292             if( guiCurrentScreen != GAME_SCREEN )
07293             {
07294                   PlayJA2Sample( uiSubSoundID, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                
07295             }
07296             else
07297             {
07298                   PlayJA2Sample( uiSubSoundID, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( (UINT8)CalculateSpeechVolume( HIGHVOLUME ), pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );              
07299             }
07300             return( TRUE );
07301       }
07302 
07303       // Check if this is the same one we just played...
07304       if ( pSoldier->bOldBattleSnd == ubBattleSoundID && gBattleSndsData[ ubBattleSoundID ].fDontAllowTwoInRow )
07305       {
07306             // Are we below the min delay?
07307             if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - pSoldier->uiTimeSameBattleSndDone ) < MIN_SUBSEQUENT_SNDS_DELAY )
07308             {
07309                   return( TRUE );
07310             }
07311       }
07312 
07313       // If a battle snd is STILL playing....
07314       if ( SoundIsPlaying( pSoldier->uiBattleSoundID ) )
07315       {
07316             // We can do a few things here....
07317             // Is this a crutial one...?
07318             if ( gBattleSndsData[ ubBattleSoundID ].fStopDialogue == 1 )
07319             {
07320                   // Stop playing origonal
07321                   SoundStop( pSoldier->uiBattleSoundID );
07322             }
07323             else
07324             {
07325                   // Skip this one...
07326                   return( TRUE );
07327             }
07328       }
07329 
07330       // If we are talking now....
07331       if ( IsMercSayingDialogue( pSoldier->ubProfile ) )
07332       {
07333             // We can do a couple of things now...
07334             if ( gBattleSndsData[ ubBattleSoundID ].fStopDialogue == 1 )
07335             {
07336                   // Stop dialigue...
07337                   DialogueAdvanceSpeech( );
07338             }
07339             else if ( gBattleSndsData[ ubBattleSoundID ].fStopDialogue == 2 )
07340             {
07341                   // Skip battle snd...
07342                   return( TRUE );
07343             }
07344       }
07345 
07346 
07347       // Save this one we're doing...
07348       pSoldier->bOldBattleSnd                                = ubBattleSoundID;
07349       pSoldier->uiTimeSameBattleSndDone    = GetJA2Clock( );
07350       
07351       
07352       // Adjust based on morale...
07353       if ( ubBattleSoundID == BATTLE_SOUND_OK1 && pSoldier->bMorale < LOW_MORALE_BATTLE_SND_THREASHOLD )
07354       {
07355             ubBattleSoundID = BATTLE_SOUND_LOWMARALE_OK1;
07356       }
07357       if ( ubBattleSoundID == BATTLE_SOUND_ATTN1 && pSoldier->bMorale < LOW_MORALE_BATTLE_SND_THREASHOLD )
07358       {
07359             ubBattleSoundID = BATTLE_SOUND_LOWMARALE_ATTN1;
07360       }
07361 
07362       ubSoundID = ubBattleSoundID;
07363 
07364       //if the sound to be played is a confirmation, check to see if we are to play it
07365       if( ubSoundID == BATTLE_SOUND_OK1 )
07366       {
07367             if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MUTE_CONFIRMATIONS ] )
07368                   return( TRUE );
07369             //else a speech sound is to be played
07370             else
07371                   fSpeechSound = TRUE;
07372       }
07373 
07374       // Randomize between sounds, if appropriate
07375       if ( gBattleSndsData[ ubSoundID ].ubRandomVal != 0 )
07376       {
07377             ubSoundID = ubSoundID + (UINT8)Random( gBattleSndsData[ ubSoundID ].ubRandomVal );
07378 
07379       }
07380 
07381 
07382       // OK, build file and play!
07383       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
07384       {
07385             sprintf( zFilename, "BATTLESNDS\\%03d_%s.wav", pSoldier->ubProfile, gBattleSndsData[ ubSoundID ].zName );
07386             
07387             if ( !FileExists( zFilename ) )
07388             {
07389                   // OK, temp build file...
07390                   if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == REGFEMALE )
07391                   {
07392                         sprintf( zFilename, "BATTLESNDS\\f_%s.wav", gBattleSndsData[ ubSoundID ].zName );
07393                   }
07394                   else
07395                   {
07396                         sprintf( zFilename, "BATTLESNDS\\m_%s.wav", gBattleSndsData[ ubSoundID ].zName );
07397                   }
07398             }
07399       }
07400       else
07401       {
07402             // Check if we can play this!
07403             if ( !gBattleSndsData[ ubSoundID ].fBadGuy )
07404             {
07405                   return( FALSE );
07406             }
07407 
07408             if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == HATKIDCIV || pSoldier->ubBodyType == KIDCIV )
07409             {
07410                   if ( ubSoundID == BATTLE_SOUND_DIE1 )
07411                   {
07412                         sprintf( zFilename, "BATTLESNDS\\kid%d_dying.wav", pSoldier->ubBattleSoundID );
07413                   }
07414                   else
07415                   {
07416                         sprintf( zFilename, "BATTLESNDS\\kid%d_%s.wav", pSoldier->ubBattleSoundID, gBattleSndsData[ ubSoundID ].zName );
07417                   }
07418             }
07419             else
07420             {
07421                   if ( ubSoundID == BATTLE_SOUND_DIE1 )
07422                   {
07423                         sprintf( zFilename, "BATTLESNDS\\bad%d_die.wav", pSoldier->ubBattleSoundID );
07424                   }
07425                   else
07426                   {
07427                         sprintf( zFilename, "BATTLESNDS\\bad%d_%s.wav", pSoldier->ubBattleSoundID, gBattleSndsData[ ubSoundID ].zName );
07428                   }
07429             }
07430       }
07431 
07432       // Play sound!
07433       memset(&spParms, 0xff, sizeof(SOUNDPARMS));
07434 
07435       spParms.uiSpeed = RATE_11025;
07436       //spParms.uiVolume = CalculateSpeechVolume( pSoldier->bVocalVolume );
07437 
07438       spParms.uiVolume = (INT8)CalculateSpeechVolume( HIGHVOLUME );
07439 
07440       // ATE: Reduce volume for OK sounds...
07441       // ( Only for all-moves or multi-selection cases... )
07442       if ( bSpecialCode == BATTLE_SND_LOWER_VOLUME )
07443       {
07444             spParms.uiVolume = (INT8)CalculateSpeechVolume( MIDVOLUME );
07445       }
07446 
07447       // If we are an enemy.....reduce due to volume
07448       if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
07449       {
07450             spParms.uiVolume = SoundVolume( (UINT8)spParms.uiVolume, pSoldier->sGridNo );
07451       }
07452 
07453       spParms.uiLoop = 1;
07454       spParms.uiPan = SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo );
07455       spParms.uiPriority=GROUP_PLAYER;
07456 
07457       if ( ( uiSoundID = SoundPlay( zFilename, &spParms ) ) == SOUND_ERROR )
07458       {
07459             return( FALSE );
07460       }
07461       else
07462       {
07463             pSoldier->uiBattleSoundID = uiSoundID;
07464 
07465             if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
07466             {
07467                   // Get soldier's face ID
07468                   iFaceIndex = pSoldier->iFaceIndex;
07469 
07470                   // Check face index
07471                   if ( iFaceIndex != -1 )
07472                   {
07473                         ExternSetFaceTalking( iFaceIndex, uiSoundID );
07474                   }
07475             }
07476 
07477             return( TRUE );
07478       }
07479 }
07480 
07481 BOOLEAN DoMercBattleSound( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubBattleSoundID )
07482 {
07483       // We WANT to play some RIGHT AWAY.....
07484       if ( gBattleSndsData[ ubBattleSoundID ].fStopDialogue == 1 || ( pSoldier->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE ) || InOverheadMap( ) )
07485       {
07486             return( InternalDoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, ubBattleSoundID, 0 ) );
07487       }
07488 
07489       // So here, only if we were currently saying dialogue.....
07490       if ( !IsMercSayingDialogue( pSoldier->ubProfile ) )
07491       {
07492             return( InternalDoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, ubBattleSoundID, 0 ) );
07493       }
07494 
07495       // OK, queue it up otherwise!
07496       TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_DO_BATTLE_SND, ubBattleSoundID,0 );
07497 
07498       return( TRUE );
07499 }
07500 
07501 
07502 BOOLEAN PreloadSoldierBattleSounds( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fRemove )
07503 {
07504       UINT32 cnt;
07505 
07506       CHECKF( pSoldier->bActive != FALSE );
07507 
07508       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_MERC_BATTLE_SOUNDS; cnt++ )
07509       {
07510             // OK, build file and play!
07511             if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
07512             {
07513                   if ( gBattleSndsData[ cnt ].fPreload )
07514                   {
07515                         if ( fRemove )
07516                         {
07517                               SoundUnlockSample( gBattleSndsData[ cnt ].zName );
07518                         }
07519                         else
07520                         {
07521                               SoundLockSample( gBattleSndsData[ cnt ].zName );
07522                         }
07523                   }
07524             }
07525             else
07526             {
07527                   if ( gBattleSndsData[ cnt ].fPreload && gBattleSndsData[ cnt ].fBadGuy )
07528                   {
07529                         if ( fRemove )
07530                         {
07531                               SoundUnlockSample( gBattleSndsData[ cnt ].zName );
07532                         }
07533                         else
07534                         {
07535                               SoundLockSample( gBattleSndsData[ cnt ].zName );
07536                         }
07537                   }
07538             }
07539       }
07540 
07541       return( TRUE );
07542 }
07543 
07544 
07545 
07546 BOOLEAN CheckSoldierHitRoof( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
07547 {
07548       // Check if we are near a lower level
07549       INT8                                      bNewDirection;
07550       BOOLEAN                                   fReturnVal = FALSE;
07551       INT16                                     sNewGridNo;
07552       // Default to true
07553       BOOLEAN                                   fDoForwards = TRUE;
07554 
07555       if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
07556       {
07557             return( FALSE );
07558       }
07559 
07560       if ( FindLowerLevel( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection, &bNewDirection ) && ( pSoldier->bLevel > 0 ) )
07561       {
07562             // ONly if standing!
07563             if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight == ANIM_STAND )
07564             {
07565                   // We are near a lower level.
07566                   // Use opposite direction
07567                   bNewDirection = gOppositeDirection[ bNewDirection ];
07568 
07569                   // Alrighty, let's not blindly change here, look at whether the dest gridno is good!
07570                   sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( gOppositeDirection[ bNewDirection ] ) );
07571                   if ( !NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sNewGridNo, TRUE, 0 ) )
07572                   {
07573                         return( FALSE );
07574                   }
07575                   sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)sNewGridNo, DirectionInc( gOppositeDirection[ bNewDirection ] ) );
07576                   if ( !NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sNewGridNo, TRUE, 0 ) )
07577                   {
07578                         return( FALSE );
07579                   }
07580             
07581                   // Are wee near enough to fall forwards....
07582                   if ( pSoldier->bDirection == gOneCDirection[ bNewDirection ] ||
07583                                pSoldier->bDirection == gTwoCDirection[ bNewDirection ] ||
07584                                pSoldier->bDirection == bNewDirection ||
07585                                pSoldier->bDirection == gOneCCDirection[ bNewDirection ] ||
07586                                pSoldier->bDirection == gTwoCCDirection[ bNewDirection ] )
07587                   {
07588                         // Do backwards...
07589                         fDoForwards = FALSE;
07590                   }
07591 
07592                   // If we are facing the opposite direction, fall backwards
07593                   // ATE: Make this more usefull...
07594                   if ( fDoForwards )
07595                   {
07596                         pSoldier->sTempNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, (INT16)( -1 * DirectionInc(bNewDirection ) ) );
07597                         pSoldier->sTempNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sTempNewGridNo, (INT16)( -1 * DirectionInc( bNewDirection ) ) );
07598                         EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, gOppositeDirection[ bNewDirection ] );
07599                         pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone = TRUE;
07600                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = FALLFORWARD_ROOF;
07601                         //EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FALLFORWARD_ROOF, 0 , FALSE );
07602 
07603                         // Deduct hitpoints/breath for falling!
07604                         SoldierTakeDamage( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH, 100, 5000, TAKE_DAMAGE_FALLROOF, NOBODY, NOWHERE, 0, TRUE );
07605 
07606                         fReturnVal = TRUE;
07607 
07608                   }
07609                   else
07610                   {
07611 
07612                         pSoldier->sTempNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, (INT16)( -1 * DirectionInc( bNewDirection ) ) );
07613                         pSoldier->sTempNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sTempNewGridNo, (INT16)( -1 * DirectionInc( bNewDirection ) ) );
07614                         EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, bNewDirection );
07615                         pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone = TRUE;
07616                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = FALLOFF;
07617 
07618                         // Deduct hitpoints/breath for falling!
07619                         SoldierTakeDamage( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH, 100, 5000, TAKE_DAMAGE_FALLROOF, NOBODY, NOWHERE, 0, TRUE );
07620 
07621                         fReturnVal = TRUE;
07622                   }
07623             }
07624       }
07625 
07626       return( fReturnVal );
07627 }
07628 
07629 void BeginSoldierClimbDownRoof( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
07630 {
07631       INT8                                      bNewDirection;
07632       UINT8 ubWhoIsThere;
07633 
07634 
07635       if ( FindLowerLevel( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection, &bNewDirection ) && ( pSoldier->bLevel > 0 ) )
07636       {
07637             if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, GetAPsToClimbRoof( pSoldier, TRUE ), 0, TRUE ) )
07638             {
07639                   //Kaiden: Helps if we look where we are going before we try to climb on top of someone
07640              ubWhoIsThere = WhoIsThere2( NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc(bNewDirection ) ), 0 );
07641              if ( ubWhoIsThere != NOBODY && ubWhoIsThere != pSoldier->ubID )
07642              {
07643                   return;
07644              }
07645              else
07646              {
07647 
07648                   if (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
07649                   {
07650                         // OK, SET INTERFACE FIRST
07651                         SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
07652                   }
07653 
07654 
07655 
07656 
07657                   pSoldier->sTempNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc(bNewDirection ) );
07658 
07659                   bNewDirection = gTwoCDirection[ bNewDirection ];
07660 
07661                   pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = bNewDirection;
07662                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CLIMBDOWNROOF, 0 , FALSE );
07663 
07664                   InternalReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier, FALSE );                    
07665                   InternalGivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier, FALSE );                       
07666 
07667             }
07668       }
07669       }
07670 
07671 }
07672 /*
07673 void BeginSoldierClimbDownRoof( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
07674 {
07675       INT8                                      bNewDirection;
07676       UINT8 ubWhoIsThere;
07677 
07678 
07679       if ( FindLowerLevel( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection, &bNewDirection ) && ( pSoldier->bLevel > 0 ) )
07680       {
07681             if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, GetAPsToClimbRoof( pSoldier, TRUE ), 0, TRUE ) )
07682             {
07683                   if (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
07684                   {
07685                         // OK, SET INTERFACE FIRST
07686                         SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
07687                   }
07688 
07689 
07690 
07691 
07692                         pSoldier->sTempNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, (UINT16)DirectionInc(bNewDirection ) );
07693 
07694                         bNewDirection = gTwoCDirection[ bNewDirection ];
07695 
07696                         pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = bNewDirection;
07697                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CLIMBDOWNROOF, 0 , FALSE );
07698 
07699                         InternalReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier, FALSE );                    
07700                         InternalGivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier, FALSE );                       
07701 
07702             }
07703       }
07704 
07705 }
07706 */
07707 
07708 
07709 
07710 void MoveMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FLOAT dMovementChange, FLOAT dAngle, BOOLEAN fCheckRange )
07711 {
07712       INT16                         dDegAngle;
07713       FLOAT                         dDeltaPos;
07714       FLOAT                         dXPos , dYPos;
07715       BOOLEAN                       fStop = FALSE;
07716 
07717 
07718       dDegAngle = (INT16)( dAngle * 180 / PI );             
07719       //sprintf( gDebugStr, "Move Angle: %d", (int)dDegAngle );
07720 
07721       // Find delta Movement for X pos
07722       dDeltaPos = (FLOAT) (dMovementChange * sin( dAngle ));
07723 
07724       // Find new position
07725       dXPos = pSoldier->dXPos + dDeltaPos;
07726 
07727       if ( fCheckRange )
07728       {
07729             fStop = FALSE;
07730 
07731             switch( pSoldier->bMovementDirection )
07732             {
07733                   case NORTHEAST:
07734                   case EAST:
07735                   case SOUTHEAST:
07736 
07737                         if ( dXPos >= pSoldier->sDestXPos )
07738                         {
07739                               fStop = TRUE;
07740                         }
07741                         break;
07742 
07743                   case NORTHWEST:
07744                   case WEST:
07745                   case SOUTHWEST:
07746 
07747                         if ( dXPos <= pSoldier->sDestXPos )
07748                         {
07749                               fStop = TRUE;
07750                         }
07751                         break;
07752 
07753                   case NORTH:
07754                   case SOUTH:
07755 
07756                         fStop = TRUE;
07757                         break;
07758 
07759             }
07760 
07761             if ( fStop )                         
07762             {
07763                   //dXPos = pSoldier->sDestXPos;
07764                   pSoldier->fPastXDest = TRUE;
07765 
07766                   if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == pSoldier->sFinalDestination )
07767                   {
