07768                         dXPos = pSoldier->sDestXPos;
07769                   }
07770             }
07771       }
07772 
07773       // Find delta Movement for Y pos
07774       dDeltaPos = (FLOAT) (dMovementChange * cos( dAngle ));
07775 
07776       // Find new pos
07777       dYPos = pSoldier->dYPos + dDeltaPos;
07778 
07779       if ( fCheckRange )
07780       {
07781             fStop = FALSE;
07782 
07783             switch( pSoldier->bMovementDirection )
07784             {
07785                   case NORTH:
07786                   case NORTHEAST:
07787                   case NORTHWEST:
07788 
07789                         if ( dYPos <= pSoldier->sDestYPos )
07790                         {
07791                               fStop = TRUE;
07792                         }
07793                         break;
07794 
07795                   case SOUTH:
07796                   case SOUTHWEST:
07797                   case SOUTHEAST:
07798 
07799                         if ( dYPos >= pSoldier->sDestYPos )
07800                         {
07801                               fStop = TRUE;
07802                         }
07803                         break;
07804 
07805                   case EAST:
07806                   case WEST:
07807 
07808                         fStop = TRUE;
07809                         break;
07810 
07811             }
07812 
07813             if ( fStop )                         
07814             {
07815                   //dYPos = pSoldier->sDestYPos;
07816                   pSoldier->fPastYDest = TRUE;
07817 
07818                   if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == pSoldier->sFinalDestination )
07819                   {
07820                         dYPos = pSoldier->sDestYPos;
07821                   }
07822             }
07823       }
07824 
07825       // OK, set new position
07826       EVENT_InternalSetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, dXPos, dYPos, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE );
07827 
07828 //    DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("X: %f Y: %f", dXPos, dYPos ) );
07829 
07830 }
07831 
07832 INT16 GetDirectionFromGridNo( INT16 sGridNo, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
07833 {
07834       INT16 sXPos, sYPos;
07835 
07836       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
07837 
07838       return( GetDirectionFromXY( sXPos, sYPos, pSoldier ) );
07839 }
07840 
07841 INT16 GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( INT16 sGridNoDest, INT16 sGridNoSrc )
07842 {
07843       INT16 sXPos2, sYPos2;
07844       INT16 sXPos, sYPos;
07845 
07846       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNoSrc, &sXPos, &sYPos );
07847       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNoDest, &sXPos2, &sYPos2 );
07848 
07849       return( atan8( sXPos2, sYPos2, sXPos, sYPos ) );
07850 
07851 }
07852 
07853 INT16 GetDirectionFromXY( INT16 sXPos, INT16 sYPos, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
07854 {
07855       INT16 sXPos2, sYPos2;
07856 
07857       ConvertGridNoToXY( pSoldier->sGridNo, &sXPos2, &sYPos2 );
07858 
07859       return( atan8( sXPos2, sYPos2, sXPos, sYPos ) );
07860 }
07861 
07862 #if 0
07863 UINT8  atan8( INT16 x1, INT16 y1, INT16 x2, INT16 y2 )
07864 {
07865 static int trig[8] = { 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 1 };
07866 // returned values are N=1, NE=2, E=3, SE=4, S=5, SW=6, W=7, NW=8
07867       double dx=(x2-x1);
07868       double dy=(y2-y1);
07869       double a;
07870       int i,k;
07871       if (dx==0)
07872             dx=0.00390625; // 1/256th
07873 #define PISLICES (8)
07874       a=(atan2(dy,dx) + PI/PISLICES)/(PI/(PISLICES/2));
07875       i=(int)a;
07876       if (a>0)
07877             k=i; else
07878       if (a<0)
07879             k=i+(PISLICES-1); else
07880             k=0;
07881       return(trig[k]);
07882 }
07883 #endif
07884 
07885 //#if 0
07886 UINT8 atan8( INT16 sXPos, INT16 sYPos, INT16 sXPos2, INT16 sYPos2 )
07887 {
07888       DOUBLE  test_x =  sXPos2 - sXPos;
07889       DOUBLE  test_y =  sYPos2 - sYPos;
07890       UINT8   mFacing = WEST;
07891       INT16                         dDegAngle;
07892       DOUBLE angle;
07893 
07894       if ( test_x == 0 )
07895       {
07896             test_x = 0.04;
07897       }
07898       
07899       angle = atan2( test_x, test_y );
07900 
07901 
07902       dDegAngle = (INT16)( angle * 180 / PI );              
07903       //sprintf( gDebugStr, "Move Angle: %d", (int)dDegAngle );
07904 
07905       do
07906       {
07907             if ( angle >=-PI*.375 && angle <= -PI*.125 )
07908             {
07909                   mFacing = SOUTHWEST;
07910                   break;
07911             }
07912 
07913             if ( angle <= PI*.375 && angle >= PI*.125 )
07914             {
07915                   mFacing = SOUTHEAST;
07916                   break;
07917             }
07918 
07919             if ( angle >=PI*.623 && angle <= PI*.875 )
07920             {
07921                   mFacing = NORTHEAST;
07922                   break;
07923             }
07924 
07925             if ( angle <=-PI*.623 && angle >= -PI*.875 )
07926             {
07927                   mFacing = NORTHWEST;
07928                   break;
07929             }
07930 
07931             if ( angle >-PI*0.125 && angle < PI*0.125 )
07932             {
07933                   mFacing = SOUTH;
07934             }
07935             if ( angle > PI*0.375 && angle < PI*0.623 )
07936             {
07937                   mFacing = EAST;
07938             }
07939             if ( ( angle > PI*0.875 && angle <= PI ) || ( angle > -PI && angle < -PI*0.875 ) )
07940             {
07941                   mFacing = NORTH;
07942             }
07943             if ( angle > -PI*0.623 && angle < -PI*0.375 )
07944             {
07945                   mFacing = WEST;
07946             }
07947 
07948       } while( FALSE );
07949 
07950       return( mFacing );
07951 }
07952 
07953 
07954 UINT8 atan8FromAngle( DOUBLE angle )
07955 {
07956       UINT8   mFacing = WEST;
07957 
07958       if ( angle > PI )
07959       {
07960             angle = ( angle - PI ) - PI;
07961       }
07962       if ( angle < -PI )
07963       {
07964             angle = ( PI - ( fabs( angle ) - PI )  );
07965       }
07966 
07967       do
07968       {
07969             if ( angle >=-PI*.375 && angle <= -PI*.125 )
07970             {
07971                   mFacing = SOUTHWEST;
07972                   break;
07973             }
07974 
07975             if ( angle <= PI*.375 && angle >= PI*.125 )
07976             {
07977                   mFacing = SOUTHEAST;
07978                   break;
07979             }
07980 
07981             if ( angle >=PI*.623 && angle <= PI*.875 )
07982             {
07983                   mFacing = NORTHEAST;
07984                   break;
07985             }
07986 
07987             if ( angle <=-PI*.623 && angle >= -PI*.875 )
07988             {
07989                   mFacing = NORTHWEST;
07990                   break;
07991             }
07992 
07993             if ( angle >-PI*0.125 && angle < PI*0.125 )
07994             {
07995                   mFacing = SOUTH;
07996             }
07997             if ( angle > PI*0.375 && angle < PI*0.623 )
07998             {
07999                   mFacing = EAST;
08000             }
08001             if ( ( angle > PI*0.875 && angle <= PI ) || ( angle > -PI && angle < -PI*0.875 ) )
08002             {
08003                   mFacing = NORTH;
08004             }
08005             if ( angle > -PI*0.623 && angle < -PI*0.375 )
08006             {
08007                   mFacing = WEST;
08008             }
08009 
08010       } while( FALSE );
08011 
08012       return( mFacing );
08013 }
08014 
08015 
08016 void CheckForFullStructures( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08017 {
08018       // This function checks to see if we are near a specific structure type which requires us to blit a
08019       // small obscuring peice
08020       INT16 sGridNo;
08021       UINT16 usFullTileIndex;
08022       INT32       cnt;
08023 
08024 
08025       // Check in all 'Above' directions
08026       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_FULLTILE_DIRECTIONS; cnt++ )
08027       {
08028             sGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo + gsFullTileDirections[ cnt ];
08029 
08030             if ( CheckForFullStruct( sGridNo, &usFullTileIndex ) )
08031             {
08032                   // Add one for the item's obsuring part
08033                   pSoldier->usFrontArcFullTileList[ cnt ] = usFullTileIndex + 1;
08034                   pSoldier->usFrontArcFullTileGridNos[ cnt ] = sGridNo;
08035                   AddTopmostToHead(  sGridNo, pSoldier->usFrontArcFullTileList[ cnt ] );
08036             }
08037             else
08038             {
08039                   if ( pSoldier->usFrontArcFullTileList[ cnt ] != 0 )
08040                   {
08041                         RemoveTopmost( pSoldier->usFrontArcFullTileGridNos[ cnt ], pSoldier->usFrontArcFullTileList[ cnt ] );             
08042                   }
08043                   pSoldier->usFrontArcFullTileList[ cnt ] = 0;
08044                   pSoldier->usFrontArcFullTileGridNos[ cnt ] = 0;
08045             }
08046       }
08047 
08048 }
08049 
08050 
08051 BOOLEAN CheckForFullStruct( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 *pusIndex  )
08052 {
08053       LEVELNODE   *pStruct           = NULL;
08054       LEVELNODE   *pOldStruct        = NULL;
08055       UINT32                        fTileFlags;
08056 
08057       pStruct = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pStructHead;
08058 
08059       // Look through all structs and Search for type
08060 
08061       while( pStruct != NULL )
08062       {
08063 
08064             if ( pStruct->usIndex != NO_TILE && pStruct->usIndex < NUMBEROFTILES )
08065             {
08066 
08067                   GetTileFlags( pStruct->usIndex, &fTileFlags );
08068 
08069                   // Advance to next
08070                   pOldStruct = pStruct;
08071                   pStruct = pStruct->pNext;
08072 
08073                   //if( (pOldStruct->pStructureData!=NULL) && ( pOldStruct->pStructureData->fFlags&STRUCTURE_TREE ) )
08074                   if ( fTileFlags & FULL3D_TILE )
08075                   {
08076                         // CHECK IF THIS TREE IS FAIRLY ALONE!
08077                         if ( FullStructAlone( sGridNo, 2 ) )
08078                         {
08079                               // Return true and return index
08080                               *pusIndex = pOldStruct->usIndex;
08081                               return( TRUE );
08082                         }
08083                         else
08084                         {
08085                               return( FALSE );
08086                         }
08087 
08088                   }
08089 
08090             }
08091             else
08092             {
08093                   // Advance to next
08094                   pOldStruct = pStruct;
08095                   pStruct = pStruct->pNext;
08096             }
08097 
08098       }
08099 
08100       // Could not find it, return FALSE
08101       return( FALSE );
08102 
08103 }
08104 
08105 
08106 BOOLEAN FullStructAlone( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubRadius )
08107 {
08108       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
08109       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
08110       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
08111       INT16  iNewIndex;
08112       INT32  leftmost;
08113 
08114 
08115       // Determine start end end indicies and num rows
08116       sTop        = ubRadius;
08117       sBottom = -ubRadius;
08118       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
08119       sRight  = ubRadius;
08120 
08121       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
08122       {
08123 
08124             leftmost = ( ( sGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
08125 
08126             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
08127             {
08128                   iNewIndex = sGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
08129 
08130 
08131                   if ( iNewIndex >=0 && iNewIndex < WORLD_MAX && 
08132                            iNewIndex >= leftmost && iNewIndex < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
08133                   {
08134                         if ( iNewIndex != sGridNo )
08135                         {
08136                               if ( FindStructure( iNewIndex, STRUCTURE_TREE ) != NULL )
08137                               {
08138                                     return( FALSE );
08139                               }
08140                         }
08141                   }
08142 
08143             }
08144       }
08145 
08146       return( TRUE );
08147 }
08148 
08149 
08150 void AdjustForFastTurnAnimation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08151 {
08152 
08153  // CHECK FOR FASTTURN ANIMATIONS
08154  // ATE: Mod: Only fastturn for OUR guys!
08155  if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_FASTTURN && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_TURNINGFROMHIT ) )
08156  {
08157             if ( pSoldier->bDirection != pSoldier->bDesiredDirection )
08158             {
08159                   pSoldier->sAniDelay = FAST_TURN_ANIM_SPEED;
08160             }
08161             else
08162             {
08163                   SetSoldierAniSpeed( pSoldier );
08164             //    FreeUpNPCFromTurning( pSoldier, LOOK);
08165             }
08166       }
08167 
08168 }
08169 
08170 BOOLEAN IsActionInterruptable( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08171 {
08172       if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_NONINTERRUPT )
08173       {
08174             return( FALSE );
08175       }
08176       return( TRUE );
08177 }
08178 
08179 // WRAPPER FUNCTIONS FOR SOLDIER EVENTS
08180 void SendSoldierPositionEvent( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FLOAT dNewXPos, FLOAT dNewYPos )
08181 {
08182       // Sent event for position update
08183       EV_S_SETPOSITION  SSetPosition;
08184 
08185       SSetPosition.usSoldierID = pSoldier->ubID;
08186       SSetPosition.uiUniqueId = pSoldier -> uiUniqueSoldierIdValue;
08187 
08188       SSetPosition.dNewXPos = dNewXPos;
08189       SSetPosition.dNewYPos = dNewYPos;
08190 
08191       AddGameEvent( S_SETPOSITION, 0, &SSetPosition );
08192 
08193 }
08194 
08195 void SendSoldierDestinationEvent( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usNewDestination )
08196 {
08197       // Sent event for position update
08198       EV_S_CHANGEDEST   SChangeDest;
08199 
08200       SChangeDest.usSoldierID = pSoldier->ubID;
08201       SChangeDest.usNewDestination = usNewDestination;
08202       SChangeDest.uiUniqueId = pSoldier -> uiUniqueSoldierIdValue;
08203 
08204       AddGameEvent( S_CHANGEDEST, 0, &SChangeDest );
08205 
08206 }
08207 
08208 void SendSoldierSetDirectionEvent( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usNewDirection )
08209 {
08210       // Sent event for position update
08211       EV_S_SETDIRECTION SSetDirection;
08212 
08213       SSetDirection.usSoldierID = pSoldier->ubID;
08214       SSetDirection.usNewDirection = usNewDirection;
08215       SSetDirection.uiUniqueId = pSoldier -> uiUniqueSoldierIdValue;
08216 
08217       AddGameEvent( S_SETDIRECTION, 0, &SSetDirection );
08218 
08219 }
08220 
08221 void SendSoldierSetDesiredDirectionEvent( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usDesiredDirection )
08222 {
08223       // Sent event for position update

08225 
08226       SSetDesiredDirection.usSoldierID = pSoldier->ubID;
08227       SSetDesiredDirection.usDesiredDirection = usDesiredDirection;
08228       SSetDesiredDirection.uiUniqueId = pSoldier -> uiUniqueSoldierIdValue;
08229 
08230       AddGameEvent( S_SETDESIREDDIRECTION, 0, &SSetDesiredDirection );
08231 
08232 }
08233 
08234 void SendGetNewSoldierPathEvent( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 sDestGridNo, UINT16 usMovementAnim )
08235 {

08237 
08238       SGetNewPath.usSoldierID                   = pSoldier->ubID;
08239       SGetNewPath.sDestGridNo                   = sDestGridNo;
08240       SGetNewPath.usMovementAnim          = usMovementAnim;

08242 
08243       AddGameEvent( S_GETNEWPATH, 0, &SGetNewPath );
08244 }

08247 void SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubNewStance )
08248 {
08249 #if 0

08251

08254             return;
08255       #endif
08256

08260       SChangeStance.sYPos                       = pSoldier->sY;
08261       SChangeStance.uiUniqueId = pSoldier -> uiUniqueSoldierIdValue;
08262 
08263       AddGameEvent( S_CHANGESTANCE, 0, &SChangeStance );
08264 #endif
08265 
08266       ChangeSoldierStance( pSoldier, ubNewStance );
08267 }

08270 void SendBeginFireWeaponEvent( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sTargetGridNo )
08271 {
08272       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("SendBeginFireWeaponEvent"));
08273       EV_S_BEGINFIREWEAPON          SBeginFireWeapon;
08274 
08275       SBeginFireWeapon.usSoldierID              = pSoldier->ubID;
08276       SBeginFireWeapon.sTargetGridNo            = sTargetGridNo;
08277       SBeginFireWeapon.bTargetLevel             = pSoldier->bTargetLevel;
08278       SBeginFireWeapon.bTargetCubeLevel   = pSoldier->bTargetCubeLevel;
08279       SBeginFireWeapon.uiUniqueId = pSoldier -> uiUniqueSoldierIdValue;
08280 
08281       AddGameEvent( S_BEGINFIREWEAPON, 0, &SBeginFireWeapon );                
08282 
08283 }
08284 
08285 // This function just encapolates the check for turnbased and having an attacker in the first place
08286 void ReleaseSoldiersAttacker( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08287 {
08288       INT32 cnt;
08289       UINT8 ubNumToFree;
08290 
08291       //if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
08292       {
08293             // ATE: Removed...
08294             //if ( pSoldier->ubAttackerID != NOBODY )
08295             {
08296                   // JA2 Gold
08297                   // set next-to-previous attacker, so long as this isn't a repeat attack
08298                   if (pSoldier->ubPreviousAttackerID != pSoldier->ubAttackerID)
08299                   {
08300                         pSoldier->ubNextToPreviousAttackerID = pSoldier->ubPreviousAttackerID;
08301                   }
08302 
08303                   // get previous attacker id
08304                   pSoldier->ubPreviousAttackerID = pSoldier->ubAttackerID;
08305 
08306                   // Copy BeingAttackedCount here....
08307                   ubNumToFree = pSoldier->bBeingAttackedCount;
08308                   // Zero it out BEFORE, as supression may increase it again...
08309                   pSoldier->bBeingAttackedCount = 0;
08310                   
08311                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubNumToFree; cnt++ )
08312                   {
08313                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker of %d (attacker is %d) - releasesoldierattacker num to free is %d", pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->ubAttackerID, ubNumToFree ) );
08314                         ReduceAttackBusyCount( pSoldier->ubAttackerID, FALSE );
08315                   }
08316 
08317                   // ATE: Set to NOBODY if this person is NOT dead
08318                   // otherise, we keep it so the kill can be awarded!
08319                   if ( pSoldier->bLife != 0 && pSoldier->ubBodyType != QUEENMONSTER )
08320                   {
08321                         pSoldier->ubAttackerID = NOBODY;
08322                   }
08323             }
08324       }
08325 }
08326 
08327 BOOLEAN MercInWater( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08328 {
08329       // Our water texture , for now is of a given type
08330       if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == LOW_WATER || pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == MED_WATER || pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
08331       {
08332             return( TRUE );
08333       }
08334       else
08335       {
08336             return( FALSE );
08337       }
08338 }
08339 
08340 
08341 void RevivePlayerTeam( )
08342 {
08343       INT32 cnt;
08344       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
08345 
08346       // End the turn of player charactors
08347       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
08348 
08349   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
08350   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
08351       {     
08352             ReviveSoldier( pSoldier );
08353       }
08354 
08355 }
08356 
08357 
08358 void ReviveSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08359 {
08360       INT16                         sX, sY;
08361 
08362       if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE  && pSoldier->bActive )
08363       {
08364             // If dead or unconscious, revive!
08365             pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= ( ~SOLDIER_DEAD );
08366 
08367             pSoldier->bLife = pSoldier->bLifeMax;
08368             pSoldier->bBleeding = 0;
08369             pSoldier->ubDesiredHeight = ANIM_STAND;
08370 
08371             AddManToTeam( pSoldier->bTeam );
08372 
08373             // Set to standing
08374             pSoldier->fInNonintAnim = FALSE;
08375             pSoldier->fRTInNonintAnim = FALSE;
08376 
08377             // Change to standing,unless we can getup with an animation
08378             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STANDING, 0, TRUE );
08379             BeginSoldierGetup( pSoldier );
08380 
08381             // Makesure center of tile
08382             sX = CenterX( pSoldier->sGridNo );
08383             sY = CenterY( pSoldier->sGridNo );
08384 
08385             EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, (FLOAT) sX, (FLOAT) sY );
08386 
08387             // Dirty INterface
08388             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
08389 
08390       }
08391 
08392 }
08393 
08394 
08395 void HandleAnimationProfile( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16  usAnimState, BOOLEAN fRemove )
08396 {
08397 //#if 0
08398       ANIM_PROF                           *pProfile;
08399       ANIM_PROF_DIR                 *pProfileDir;
08400       ANIM_PROF_TILE          *pProfileTile;
08401       INT8                                      bProfileID;
08402       UINT32                                    iTileCount;
08403       INT16                                     sGridNo;
08404       UINT16                                    usAnimSurface;
08405 
08406       // ATE
08407 
08408       // Get Surface Index
08409       usAnimSurface = DetermineSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, usAnimState );
08410 
08411       CHECKV( usAnimSurface != INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE );
08412 
08413       bProfileID = gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].bProfile;
08414 
08415       // Determine if this animation has a profile
08416       if ( bProfileID != -1 )
08417       {
08418             // Getprofile
08419             pProfile = &(gpAnimProfiles[ bProfileID ] );
08420 
08421             // Get direction
08422             pProfileDir = &( pProfile->Dirs[ pSoldier->bDirection ] );
08423 
08424             // Loop tiles and set accordingly into world
08425             for( iTileCount = 0; iTileCount < pProfileDir->ubNumTiles; iTileCount++ )
08426             {
08427                   pProfileTile = &( pProfileDir->pTiles[ iTileCount ] );
08428 
08429                   sGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo + ( ( WORLD_COLS * pProfileTile->bTileY ) + pProfileTile->bTileX );
08430 
08431                   // Check if in bounds
08432                   if ( !OutOfBounds( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo ) )
08433                   {
08434                         if ( fRemove )
08435                         {
08436                               // Remove from world
08437                               RemoveMerc( sGridNo, pSoldier, TRUE );
08438                         }
08439                         else
08440                         {
08441                               // PLace into world
08442                               AddMercToHead( sGridNo, pSoldier, FALSE );
08443                               //if ( pProfileTile->bTileY != 0 || pProfileTile->bTileX != 0 )
08444                               {
08445                                     gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].pMercHead->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_MERCPLACEHOLDER;
08446                                     gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].pMercHead->uiAnimHitLocationFlags = pProfileTile->usTileFlags;
08447                               }
08448                         }
08449                   }
08450 
08451             }
08452       }
08453 
08454 //#endif
08455 
08456 }
08457 
08458 
08459 LEVELNODE *GetAnimProfileFlags( UINT16 sGridNo, UINT16 *usFlags, SOLDIERTYPE **ppTargSoldier, LEVELNODE *pGivenNode )
08460 {
08461       LEVELNODE                     *pNode;
08462 
08463       (*ppTargSoldier) = NULL;
08464       (*usFlags )              = 0;
08465 
08466       if ( pGivenNode == NULL )
08467       {
08468             pNode = gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].pMercHead;
08469       }
08470       else
08471       {
08472             pNode = pGivenNode->pNext;
08473       }
08474 
08475 //#if 0
08476 
08477       if ( pNode != NULL )
08478       {
08479             if ( pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_MERCPLACEHOLDER )
08480             {
08481                   (*usFlags) = (UINT16)pNode->uiAnimHitLocationFlags;
08482                   (*ppTargSoldier) = pNode->pSoldier;
08483             }
08484       }
08485 
08486 //#endif
08487 
08488       return( pNode );
08489 
08490 }
08491 
08492 
08493 BOOLEAN GetProfileFlagsFromGridno( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usAnimState, UINT16 sTestGridNo, UINT16 *usFlags )
08494 {
08495       ANIM_PROF                           *pProfile;
08496       ANIM_PROF_DIR                 *pProfileDir;
08497       ANIM_PROF_TILE          *pProfileTile;
08498       INT8                                      bProfileID;
08499       UINT32                                    iTileCount;
08500       INT16                                     sGridNo;
08501       UINT16                                    usAnimSurface;
08502 
08503       // Get Surface Index
08504       usAnimSurface = DetermineSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, usAnimState );
08505 
08506       CHECKF( usAnimSurface != INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE );
08507 
08508       bProfileID = gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].bProfile;
08509 
08510       *usFlags = 0;
08511 
08512       // Determine if this animation has a profile
08513       if ( bProfileID != -1 )
08514       {
08515             // Getprofile
08516             pProfile = &(gpAnimProfiles[ bProfileID ] );
08517 
08518             // Get direction
08519             pProfileDir = &( pProfile->Dirs[ pSoldier->bDirection ] );
08520 
08521             // Loop tiles and set accordingly into world
08522             for( iTileCount = 0; iTileCount < pProfileDir->ubNumTiles; iTileCount++ )
08523             {
08524                   pProfileTile = &( pProfileDir->pTiles[ iTileCount ] );
08525 
08526                   sGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo + ( ( WORLD_COLS * pProfileTile->bTileY ) + pProfileTile->bTileX );
08527 
08528                   // Check if in bounds
08529                   if ( !OutOfBounds( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo ) )
08530                   {
08531                         if ( sGridNo == sTestGridNo )
08532                         {
08533                               *usFlags = pProfileTile->usTileFlags;
08534                               return( TRUE );
08535                         }
08536                   }
08537 
08538             }
08539       }
08540 
08541       return( FALSE );
08542 }
08543 
08544 
08545 void EVENT_SoldierBeginGiveItem( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08546 {
08547       SOLDIERTYPE *pTSoldier; 
08548 
08549       if ( VerifyGiveItem( pSoldier, &pTSoldier ) )
08550       {
08551             // CHANGE DIRECTION AND GOTO ANIMATION NOW
08552             pSoldier->bDesiredDirection = pSoldier->bPendingActionData3;
08553             pSoldier->bDirection = pSoldier->bPendingActionData3;             
08554 
08555             // begin animation
08556             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GIVE_ITEM, 0 , FALSE );
08557 
08558       }
08559       else
08560       {
08561             UnSetEngagedInConvFromPCAction( pSoldier );
08562 
08563             MemFree( pSoldier->pTempObject );
08564       }
08565 }
08566 
08567 
08568 void EVENT_SoldierBeginBladeAttack( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection )
08569 {
08570       SOLDIERTYPE *pTSoldier;
08571       //UINT32 uiMercFlags;
08572       UINT16 usSoldierIndex;
08573       UINT8 ubTDirection;
08574       BOOLEAN fChangeDirection = FALSE;
08575       ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse;
08576 
08577       // Increment the number of people busy doing stuff because of an attack
08578       //if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
08579       //{
08580             gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
08581         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Begin blade attack: ATB  %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
08582 
08583       //}
08584 
08585       // CHANGE DIRECTION AND GOTO ANIMATION NOW
08586       EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
08587       EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
08588       // CHANGE TO ANIMATION
08589 
08590       // DETERMINE ANIMATION TO PLAY 
08591       // LATER BASED ON IF TAREGT KNOWS OF US, STANCE, ETC
08592       // GET POINTER TO TAREGT
08593       if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER)
08594       {
08595             UINT8 ubTargetID;
08596 
08597             // Is there an unconscious guy at gridno......
08598             ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
08599             
08600             if ( ubTargetID != NOBODY && ( ( MercPtrs[ ubTargetID ]->bLife < OKLIFE && MercPtrs[ ubTargetID ]->bLife > 0 ) || ( MercPtrs[ ubTargetID ]->bBreath < OKBREATH && MercPtrs[ ubTargetID ]->bCollapsed ) ) )
08601             {
08602                   pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4 = ubTargetID;
08603                   // add regen bonus
08604                   pSoldier->bRegenerationCounter++;
08605                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, MONSTER_BEGIN_EATTING_FLESH, 0, FALSE );
08606             }
08607             else
08608             {
08609                   if ( PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo ) <= 1 )
08610                   {
08611                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, MONSTER_CLOSE_ATTACK, 0, FALSE );
08612                   }
08613                   else
08614                   {
08615                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, ADULTMONSTER_ATTACKING, 0, FALSE );
08616                   }
08617             }
08618       }
08619       else if (pSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT)
08620       {
08621             // Check if it's a claws or teeth...
08622             if ( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem == BLOODCAT_CLAW_ATTACK )
08623             {
08624                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, BLOODCAT_SWIPE, 0, FALSE );
08625             }
08626             else
08627             {
08628                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, BLOODCAT_BITE_ANIM, 0, FALSE );
08629             }
08630       }
08631       else
08632       {
08633             usSoldierIndex = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
08634             if ( usSoldierIndex != NOBODY )
08635             {     
08636                   GetSoldier( &pTSoldier, usSoldierIndex );       
08637 
08638                   // Look at stance of target
08639                   switch( gAnimControl[ pTSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight  )
08640                   {
08641                         case ANIM_STAND:
08642                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
08643 
08644                               // CHECK IF HE CAN SEE US, IF SO RANDOMIZE
08645                               if ( pTSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == 0 && pTSoldier->bTeam != pSoldier->bTeam )
08646                               {
08647                                     // WE ARE NOT SEEN
08648                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STAB, 0 , FALSE );
08649                               }
08650                               else
08651                               {
08652                                     // WE ARE SEEN
08653                                     if ( Random( 50 ) > 25 )
08654                                     {
08655                                           EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STAB, 0 , FALSE );
08656                                     }
08657                                     else
08658                                     {
08659                                           EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, SLICE, 0 , FALSE );
08660                                     }
08661 
08662                                     // IF WE ARE SEEN, MAKE SURE GUY TURNS!
08663                                     // Get direction to target
08664                                     // IF WE ARE AN ANIMAL, CAR, MONSTER, DONT'T TURN
08665                                     if ( !( pTSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_MONSTER | SOLDIER_ANIMAL | SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ) )
08666                                     {
08667                                           // OK, stop merc....
08668                                           EVENT_StopMerc( pTSoldier, pTSoldier->sGridNo, pTSoldier->bDirection );
08669 
08670                                           if ( pTSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
08671                                           {
08672                                                 CancelAIAction( pTSoldier, TRUE );
08673                                           }
08674 
08675                                           ubTDirection = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, pTSoldier );
08676                                           SendSoldierSetDesiredDirectionEvent( pTSoldier, ubTDirection );
08677                                     }
08678                               }
08679 
08680                               break;
08681 
08682                         case ANIM_PRONE:
08683 
08684                               // CHECK OUR STANCE
08685                               if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_CROUCH )
08686                               {
08687                                     // SET DESIRED STANCE AND SET PENDING ANIMATION
08688                                     SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
08689                                     pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = CROUCH_STAB;
08690                               }
08691                               else
08692                               {
08693                                     // USE crouched one
08694                                     // NEED TO CHANGE STANCE IF NOT CROUCHD!
08695                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CROUCH_STAB, 0 , FALSE );
08696                               }
08697                               break;
08698                   }
08699             }
08700             else
08701             {
08702                   // OK, SEE IF THERE IS AN OBSTACLE HERE...
08703                   if ( !NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, FALSE, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
08704                   {
08705                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STAB, 0 , FALSE );
08706                   }
08707                   else
08708                   {
08709                         // Check for corpse!
08710                         pCorpse = GetCorpseAtGridNo( sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
08711 
08712                         if ( pCorpse == NULL )
08713                         {
08714                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CROUCH_STAB, 0 , FALSE );
08715                         }
08716                         else
08717                         {
08718                               if ( IsValidDecapitationCorpse( pCorpse ) )
08719                               {
08720                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, DECAPITATE, 0 , FALSE );
08721                               }
08722                               else
08723                               {
08724                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CROUCH_STAB, 0 , FALSE );
08725                               }
08726                         }
08727                   }
08728             }
08729       }
08730 
08731       // SET TARGET GRIDNO
08732       pSoldier->sTargetGridNo = sGridNo;
08733       pSoldier->bTargetLevel = pSoldier->bLevel;
08734       pSoldier->ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
08735 }
08736 
08737 
08738 void EVENT_SoldierBeginPunchAttack( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection )
08739 {
08740       BOOLEAN                 fMartialArtist = FALSE;
08741       SOLDIERTYPE *pTSoldier;
08742       //UINT32 uiMercFlags;
08743       UINT16 usSoldierIndex;
08744       UINT8 ubTDirection;
08745       BOOLEAN fChangeDirection = FALSE;
08746       UINT16      usItem;
08747 
08748       // Get item in hand...
08749       usItem = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
08750       
08751 
08752       // Increment the number of people busy doing stuff because of an attack
08753       //if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
08754       //{
08755             gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
08756         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Begin HTH attack: ATB  %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
08757 
08758       //}
08759 
08760       // get target.....
08761       usSoldierIndex = WhoIsThere2( pSoldier->sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
08762       if ( usSoldierIndex != NOBODY )
08763       {     
08764             GetSoldier( &pTSoldier, usSoldierIndex );       
08765 
08766             fChangeDirection = TRUE;
08767       }
08768       else
08769       {
08770             return;
08771       }
08772 
08773 
08774       if ( fChangeDirection )
08775       {
08776                   // CHANGE DIRECTION AND GOTO ANIMATION NOW
08777             EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
08778             EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
08779       }
08780 
08781 
08782       // Are we a martial artist?
08783       if ( HAS_SKILL_TRAIT( pSoldier, MARTIALARTS ) )
08784       {
08785             fMartialArtist = TRUE;
08786       }
08787 
08788 
08789       if ( fMartialArtist && !AreInMeanwhile( ) && !Item[usItem].crowbar )
08790       {
08791             // Are we in attack mode yet?
08792             if ( pSoldier->usAnimState != NINJA_BREATH && gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight == ANIM_STAND && gAnimControl[ pTSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight != ANIM_PRONE )
08793             {
08794                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, NINJA_GOTOBREATH, 0 , FALSE );
08795             }
08796             else
08797             {
08798                   DoNinjaAttack( pSoldier );
08799             }
08800       }
08801       else
08802       {
08803             // Look at stance of target
08804             switch( gAnimControl[ pTSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight  )
08805             {
08806                   case ANIM_STAND:
08807                   case ANIM_CROUCH:
08808 
08809                         if ( !Item[usItem].crowbar )
08810                         {
08811                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, PUNCH, 0 , FALSE );                             
08812                         }
08813                         else
08814                         {
08815                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CROWBAR_ATTACK, 0 , FALSE );                          
08816                         }
08817 
08818                         // CHECK IF HE CAN SEE US, IF SO CHANGE DIR
08819                         if ( pTSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == 0 && pTSoldier->bTeam != pSoldier->bTeam )
08820                         {
08821                               // Get direction to target
08822                               // IF WE ARE AN ANIMAL, CAR, MONSTER, DONT'T TURN
08823                               if ( !( pTSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_MONSTER | SOLDIER_ANIMAL | SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) ) )
08824                               {
08825                                     // OK, stop merc....
08826                                     EVENT_StopMerc( pTSoldier, pTSoldier->sGridNo, pTSoldier->bDirection );
08827 
08828                                     if ( pTSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
08829                                     {
08830                                           CancelAIAction( pTSoldier, TRUE );
08831                                     }
08832 
08833                                     ubTDirection = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, pTSoldier );
08834                                     SendSoldierSetDesiredDirectionEvent( pTSoldier, ubTDirection );
08835                               }
08836                         }
08837                         break;
08838 
08839                   case ANIM_PRONE:
08840 
08841                         // CHECK OUR STANCE
08842         // ATE: Added this for CIV body types 'cause of elliot
08843         if ( !IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( pSoldier ) )
08844         {
08845                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, PUNCH, 0 , FALSE );                             
08846         }
08847         else
08848         {
08849                           if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_CROUCH )
08850                           {
08851                                 // SET DESIRED STANCE AND SET PENDING ANIMATION
08852                                 SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
08853                                 pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = PUNCH_LOW;
08854                           }
08855                           else
08856                           {
08857                                 // USE crouched one
08858                                 // NEED TO CHANGE STANCE IF NOT CROUCHD!
08859                                 EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, PUNCH_LOW, 0 , FALSE );
08860                           }
08861         }
08862                         break;
08863             }
08864       }
08865 
08866       // SET TARGET GRIDNO
08867       pSoldier->sTargetGridNo = sGridNo;
08868       pSoldier->bTargetLevel = pSoldier->bLevel;
08869       pSoldier->sLastTarget         = sGridNo;
08870       pSoldier->ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
08871 }
08872 
08873 
08874 void EVENT_SoldierBeginKnifeThrowAttack( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection )
08875 {
08876       // Increment the number of people busy doing stuff because of an attack
08877       //if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
08878       //{
08879             gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
08880       //}
08881       pSoldier->bBulletsLeft = 1;
08882       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting knifethrow attack, bullets left %d", pSoldier->bBulletsLeft) );
08883 
08884       EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, THROW_KNIFE, 0 , FALSE );
08885 
08886       // CHANGE DIRECTION AND GOTO ANIMATION NOW
08887       EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
08888       EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
08889 
08890 
08891       // SET TARGET GRIDNO
08892       pSoldier->sTargetGridNo = sGridNo;
08893       pSoldier->sLastTarget         = sGridNo;
08894       pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = 0;
08895       // NB target level must be set by functions outside of here... but I think it
08896       // is already set in HandleItem or in the AI code - CJC
08897       pSoldier->ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, pSoldier->bTargetLevel );
08898 }
08899 
08900 
08901 void EVENT_SoldierBeginDropBomb( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08902 {
08903       // Increment the number of people busy doing stuff because of an attack
08904       switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
08905       {
08906             case ANIM_STAND:
08907 
08908                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, PLANT_BOMB, 0 , FALSE );
08909                   break;
08910 
08911             default:
08912 
08913                   // Call hander for planting bomb...
08914                   HandleSoldierDropBomb( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2 );
08915                   SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
08916                   break;
08917       }
08918 
08919 }
08920 
08921 
08922 void EVENT_SoldierBeginUseDetonator( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08923 {
08924       // Increment the number of people busy doing stuff because of an attack
08925       switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
08926       {
08927             case ANIM_STAND:
08928 
08929                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, USE_REMOTE, 0 , FALSE );
08930                   break;
08931 
08932             default:
08933 
08934                   // Call hander for planting bomb...
08935                   HandleSoldierUseRemote( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2 );
08936                   break;
08937       }
08938 }
08939 
08940 void EVENT_SoldierBeginFirstAid( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection )
08941 {
08942       SOLDIERTYPE *pTSoldier;
08943       //UINT32 uiMercFlags;
08944       UINT16 usSoldierIndex;
08945       BOOLEAN fRefused = FALSE;
08946 
08947       usSoldierIndex = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
08948       if ( usSoldierIndex != NOBODY )
08949       {     
08950             pTSoldier = MercPtrs[ usSoldierIndex ];
08951 
08952             // OK, check if we should play quote...
08953             if ( pTSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
08954             {
08955                   if ( pTSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && pTSoldier->ubProfile >= FIRST_RPC && pTSoldier->ubProfile < GASTON && !RPC_RECRUITED( pTSoldier ) )
08956                   {
08957                         fRefused = PCDoesFirstAidOnNPC( pTSoldier->ubProfile );
08958                   }
08959 
08960                   if ( !fRefused )
08961                   {
08962                         if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pTSoldier ) )
08963                         {
08964                               // nope!!
08965                               fRefused = TRUE;
08966                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, Message[ STR_REFUSE_FIRSTAID_FOR_CREATURE ] );
08967                         }
08968                         else if ( !pTSoldier->bNeutral && pTSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pTSoldier->bSide != pSoldier->bSide )
08969                         {
08970                               fRefused = TRUE;
08971                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, Message[ STR_REFUSE_FIRSTAID ] );
08972                         }
08973 
08974                   }
08975             }
08976 
08977             if ( fRefused )
08978             {
08979                   UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
08980                   return;
08981             }
08982 
08983             // ATE: We can only give firsty aid to one perosn at a time... cancel
08984             // any now...
08985             InternalGivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier, FALSE );                       
08986 
08987             // CHANGE DIRECTION AND GOTO ANIMATION NOW
08988             EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
08989             EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
08990 
08991             // CHECK OUR STANCE AND GOTO CROUCH IF NEEDED
08992             //if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_CROUCH )
08993             //{
08994                   // SET DESIRED STANCE AND SET PENDING ANIMATION
08995             //    SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH );
08996             //    pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = START_AID;
08997             //}
08998             //else
08999             {
09000                   // CHANGE TO ANIMATION
09001                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, START_AID, 0 , FALSE );
09002             }
09003 
09004             // SET TARGET GRIDNO
09005             pSoldier->sTargetGridNo = sGridNo;
09006       
09007             // SET PARTNER ID
09008             pSoldier->ubServicePartner = (UINT8)usSoldierIndex;
09009 
09010             // SET PARTNER'S COUNT REFERENCE
09011             pTSoldier->ubServiceCount++;
09012 
09013             // If target and doer are no the same guy...
09014             if ( pTSoldier->ubID != pSoldier->ubID && !pTSoldier->bCollapsed )
09015             {
09016                   SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pTSoldier );
09017             }
09018       }
09019 }
09020 
09021 
09022 void EVENT_SoldierEnterVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection )
09023 {
09024       SOLDIERTYPE *pTSoldier;
09025       UINT32 uiMercFlags;
09026       UINT16 usSoldierIndex;
09027 
09028       if ( FindSoldier( sGridNo, &usSoldierIndex, &uiMercFlags, FIND_SOLDIER_GRIDNO ) )
09029       {     
09030             pTSoldier = MercPtrs[ usSoldierIndex ];
09031 
09032             // Enter vehicle...
09033             EnterVehicle( pTSoldier, pSoldier );
09034       }
09035 
09036       UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
09037 }
09038 
09039 
09040 UINT32 SoldierDressWound( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pVictim, INT16 sKitPts, INT16 sStatus )
09041 {
09042  UINT32 uiDressSkill, uiPossible, uiActual, uiMedcost, uiDeficiency, uiAvailAPs, uiUsedAPs;
09043  UINT8 ubBelowOKlife, ubPtsLeft;
09044  BOOLEAN    fRanOut = FALSE;
09045 
09046  if (pVictim->bBleeding < 1 && pVictim->bLife >= OKLIFE )
09047  {
09048    return(0);           // nothing to do, shouldn't have even been called!
09049  }
09050 
09051  if ( pVictim->bLife == 0 )
09052  {
09053        return(0);
09054  }
09055 
09056  // in case he has multiple kits in hand, limit influence of kit status to 100%!
09057  if (sStatus >= 100)
09058  {
09059       sStatus = 100;
09060  }
09061 
09062  // calculate wound-dressing skill (3x medical, 2x equip, 1x level, 1x dex)
09063  uiDressSkill = ( ( 3 * EffectiveMedical( pSoldier ) ) +                            // medical knowledge
09064                                                       ( 2 * sStatus) +                                                                                            // state of medical kit
09065                                                       (10 * EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) ) +                           // battle injury experience
09066                                                                         EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) )    / 7;        // general "handiness"
09067 
09068  // try to use every AP that the merc has left
09069  uiAvailAPs = pSoldier->bActionPoints;
09070 
09071  // OK, If we are in real-time, use another value...
09072  if (!(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
09073  {
09074         // Set to a value which looks good based on our tactical turns duration
09075             uiAvailAPs = RT_FIRST_AID_GAIN_MODIFIER;        
09076  }
09077 
09078  // calculate how much bandaging CAN be done this turn
09079  uiPossible = ( uiAvailAPs * uiDressSkill ) / 50;     // max rate is 2 * fullAPs
09080 
09081  // if no healing is possible (insufficient APs or insufficient dressSkill)
09082  if (!uiPossible)
09083    return(0);
09084 
09085 
09086  if (Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].medicalkit )           // using the GOOD medic stuff
09087  {
09088    uiPossible += ( uiPossible / 2);             // add extra 50 %
09089  }
09090 
09091  uiActual = uiPossible;       // start by assuming maximum possible
09092 
09093 
09094  // figure out how far below OKLIFE the victim is
09095  if (pVictim->bLife >= OKLIFE)
09096  {
09097    ubBelowOKlife = 0;
09098  }
09099  else
09100  {
09101    ubBelowOKlife = OKLIFE - pVictim->bLife;
09102  }
09103 
09104  // figure out how many healing pts we need to stop dying (2x cost)
09105  uiDeficiency = (2 * ubBelowOKlife );
09106 
09107  // if, after that, the patient will still be bleeding
09108  if ( (pVictim->bBleeding - ubBelowOKlife ) > 0)
09109  {
09110    // then add how many healing pts we need to stop bleeding (1x cost)
09111    uiDeficiency += ( pVictim->bBleeding - ubBelowOKlife );
09112  }
09113 
09114  // now, make sure we weren't going to give too much
09115  if ( uiActual > uiDeficiency)      // if we were about to apply too much
09116      uiActual = uiDeficiency; // reduce actual not to waste anything
09117 
09118 
09119  // now make sure we HAVE that much
09120  if (Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].medicalkit )
09121  {
09122     uiMedcost = (uiActual + 1) / 2;       // cost is only half, rounded up
09123 
09124     if ( uiMedcost > (UINT32)sKitPts )                // if we can't afford this
09125     {
09126                   fRanOut = TRUE;
09127                   uiMedcost = sKitPts;          // what CAN we afford?
09128                   uiActual = uiMedcost * 2;           // give double this as aid
09129     }
09130  }
09131  else
09132  {
09133     uiMedcost = uiActual;
09134 
09135     if ( uiMedcost > (UINT32)sKitPts)           // can't afford it
09136             {
09137                   fRanOut = TRUE;
09138       uiMedcost = uiActual = sKitPts;     // recalc cost AND aid
09139             }
09140  }
09141 
09142  ubPtsLeft = (UINT8)uiActual;
09143 
09144 
09145  // heal real life points first (if below OKLIFE) because we don't want the
09146  // patient still DYING if bandages run out, or medic is disabled/distracted!
09147  // NOTE: Dressing wounds for life below OKLIFE now costs 2 pts/life point!
09148  if ( ubPtsLeft && pVictim->bLife < OKLIFE)
09149  {
09150    // if we have enough points to bring him all the way to OKLIFE this turn
09151    if ( ubPtsLeft >= (2 * ubBelowOKlife ) )
09152    {
09153      // raise life to OKLIFE
09154      pVictim->bLife = OKLIFE;
09155 
09156      // reduce bleeding by the same number of life points healed up
09157      pVictim->bBleeding -= ubBelowOKlife;
09158 
09159      // use up appropriate # of actual healing points
09160      ubPtsLeft -= (2 * ubBelowOKlife);
09161    }
09162    else
09163    {
09164      pVictim->bLife += ( ubPtsLeft / 2);
09165      pVictim->bBleeding -= ( ubPtsLeft / 2);
09166 
09167      ubPtsLeft = ubPtsLeft % 2;     // if ptsLeft was odd, ptsLeft = 1
09168    }
09169 
09170    // this should never happen any more, but make sure bleeding not negative
09171    if (pVictim->bBleeding < 0)
09172        {
09173      pVictim->bBleeding = 0;
09174        }
09175 
09176    // if this healing brought the patient out of the worst of it, cancel dying
09177    if (pVictim->bLife >= OKLIFE )
09178    {
09179      //pVictim->dying = pVictim->dyingComment = FALSE;
09180      //pVictim->shootOn = TRUE;
09181 
09182              // turn off merc QUOTE flags
09183              pVictim->fDyingComment = FALSE;
09184 
09185    }
09186 
09187    // update patient's entire panel (could have regained consciousness, etc.)
09188  }
09189 
09190 
09191  // if any healing points remain, apply that to any remaining bleeding (1/1)
09192  // DON'T spend any APs/kit pts to cure bleeding until merc is no longer dying
09193  //if ( ubPtsLeft && pVictim->bBleeding && !pVictim->dying)
09194  if ( ubPtsLeft && pVictim->bBleeding )
09195  {
09196    // if we have enough points to bandage all remaining bleeding this turn
09197    if (ubPtsLeft >= pVictim->bBleeding )
09198    {
09199      ubPtsLeft -= pVictim->bBleeding;
09200      pVictim->bBleeding = 0;
09201    }
09202    else           // bandage what we can
09203    {
09204      pVictim->bBleeding -= ubPtsLeft;
09205      ubPtsLeft = 0;
09206    }
09207 
09208    // update patient's life bar only
09209  }
09210 
09211 
09212  // if wound has been dressed enough so that bleeding won't occur, turn off
09213  // the "warned about bleeding" flag so merc tells us about the next bleeding
09214  if ( pVictim->bBleeding <= MIN_BLEEDING_THRESHOLD )
09215  {
09216        pVictim->fWarnedAboutBleeding = FALSE;
09217  }
09218 
09219 
09220  // if there are any ptsLeft now, then we didn't actually get to use them
09221  uiActual -= ubPtsLeft;
09222 
09223  // usedAPs equals (actionPts) * (%of possible points actually used)
09224  uiUsedAPs = ( uiActual * uiAvailAPs ) / uiPossible;
09225 
09226  if (Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].medicalkit  )    // using the GOOD medic stuff
09227  {
09228    uiUsedAPs = ( uiUsedAPs * 2) / 3;      // reverse 50% bonus by taking 2/3rds
09229  }
09230 
09231  DeductPoints( pSoldier, (INT16)uiUsedAPs, (INT16)( ( uiUsedAPs * BP_PER_AP_LT_EFFORT) ) );
09232 
09233 
09234  if ( PTR_OURTEAM )
09235  {
09236        // MEDICAL GAIN   (actual / 2):  Helped someone by giving first aid
09237        StatChange(pSoldier, MEDICALAMT, (UINT16)(uiActual / 2), FALSE);
09238 
09239        // DEXTERITY GAIN (actual / 6):  Helped someone by giving first aid
09240        StatChange(pSoldier, DEXTAMT,    (UINT16)(uiActual / 6), FALSE);
09241  }
09242 
09243  return( uiMedcost );
09244 }
09245 
09246 
09247 void InternalReceivingSoldierCancelServices( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fPlayEndAnim )
09248 {
09249       SOLDIERTYPE *pTSoldier;
09250       INT32       cnt;
09251 
09252       if ( pSoldier->ubServiceCount > 0 )
09253   {
09254        // Loop through guys who have us as servicing
09255        for ( pTSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS; pTSoldier++, cnt++ )
09256        {
09257                   if ( pTSoldier->bActive )
09258                   {
09259                         if ( pTSoldier->ubServicePartner == pSoldier->ubID )
09260                         {
09261                               // END SERVICE!               
09262                               pSoldier->ubServiceCount--;
09263 
09264                               pTSoldier->ubServicePartner = NOBODY;
09265 
09266                               if ( gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode )
09267                               {
09268                                     pSoldier->ubAutoBandagingMedic = NOBODY;
09269 
09270                                     ActionDone( pTSoldier );
09271                               }
09272                               else
09273                               {
09274                                     // don't use end aid animation in autobandage
09275                                     if ( pTSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pTSoldier->bBreath > 0 && fPlayEndAnim )
09276                                     {
09277                                           EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pTSoldier, END_AID, 0 , FALSE );
09278                                     }
09279                               }
09280 
09281 
09282                         }
09283                   }
09284        }
09285 
09286       }
09287 
09288 }
09289 
09290 
09291 void ReceivingSoldierCancelServices( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
09292 {
09293       InternalReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier, TRUE );
09294 }
09295 
09296 
09297 void InternalGivingSoldierCancelServices( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fPlayEndAnim )
09298 {
09299       SOLDIERTYPE *pTSoldier;
09300 
09301       // GET TARGET SOLDIER
09302       if ( pSoldier->ubServicePartner != NOBODY )
09303       {
09304             pTSoldier = MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubServicePartner ];
09305 
09306             // END SERVICE!
09307             pTSoldier->ubServiceCount--;
09308 
09309             pSoldier->ubServicePartner = NOBODY;
09310 
09311             if ( gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode )
09312             {
09313                   pTSoldier->ubAutoBandagingMedic = NOBODY;
09314 
09315                   ActionDone( pSoldier );
09316             }
09317             else
09318             {
09319                   if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bBreath > 0 && fPlayEndAnim )
09320                   {
09321                               // don't use end aid animation in autobandage
09322                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, END_AID, 0 , FALSE );
09323                   }
09324             }
09325       }
09326 
09327 }
09328 
09329 void GivingSoldierCancelServices( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
09330 {
09331       InternalGivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier, TRUE );
09332 }
09333 
09334 
09335 void HaultSoldierFromSighting( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fFromSightingEnemy )
09336 {
09337       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("HaultSoldierFromSighting") );
09338       // SEND HUALT EVENT!
09339       //EV_S_STOP_MERC                    SStopMerc;
09340 
09341       //SStopMerc.sGridNo                             = pSoldier->sGridNo;
09342       //SStopMerc.bDirection              = pSoldier->bDirection;
09343       //SStopMerc.usSoldierID             = pSoldier->ubID;
09344       //AddGameEvent( S_STOP_MERC, 0, &SStopMerc );
09345 
09346       // If we are a 'specialmove... ignore...
09347       if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_SPECIALMOVE ) )
09348       {
09349             return;
09350       }
09351 
09352       // OK, check if we were going to throw something, and give it back if so!
09353       if ( pSoldier->pTempObject != NULL && fFromSightingEnemy )
09354       {
09355             // Place it back into inv....
09356             AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, pSoldier->pTempObject, FALSE );
09357             MemFree( pSoldier->pTempObject );
09358             pSoldier->pTempObject                           = NULL;
09359             pSoldier->usPendingAnimation  = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
09360             pSoldier->usPendingAnimation2 = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
09361 
09362             // Decrement attack counter...
09363             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Reducing attacker busy count..., ending throw because saw something") );
09364             ReduceAttackBusyCount( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
09365 
09366             // ATE: Goto stationary stance......
09367             SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
09368 
09369             DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
09370       }
09371       
09372 
09373       // Kaiden: Added fix from UB for seeing new enemies when throwing Knives.
09374       // ATE: Dave, don't kill me
09375       // Here, we need to handle the situation when we're throweing a knife and we see somebody
09376       // cause for some reason throwing a knie does not use the pTempObject stuff that all other stuff does...
09377       if ( pSoldier->usPendingAnimation == THROW_KNIFE )
09378       {
09379             // Decrement attack counter...
09380             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Reducing attacker busy count..., ending throw knife because saw something") );
09381             ReduceAttackBusyCount( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
09382 
09383             // ATE: Goto stationary stance......
09384             SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
09385 
09386             DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
09387       }
09388 
09389 
09390 
09391       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
09392       {
09393             EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
09394       }
09395       else
09396       {
09397             // Pause this guy from no APS
09398             AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, TRUE );
09399 
09400             pSoldier->ubReasonCantFinishMove = REASON_STOPPED_SIGHT;
09401 
09402             // ATE; IF turning to shoot, stop!
09403             // ATE: We want to do this only for enemies, not items....
09404             if ( pSoldier->fTurningToShoot && fFromSightingEnemy )
09405             {
09406                   pSoldier->fTurningToShoot = FALSE;
09407                   // Release attacker                 
09408 
09409                   // OK - this is hightly annoying , but due to the huge combinations of
09410                   // things that can happen - 1 of them is that sLastTarget will get unset
09411                   // after turn is done - so set flag here to tell it not to...
09412                   pSoldier->fDontUnsetLastTargetFromTurn = TRUE;
09413                   
09414                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Reducing attacker busy count..., ending fire because saw something") );
09415                   ReduceAttackBusyCount( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
09416             }
09417 
09418             // OK, if we are stopped at our destination, cancel pending action...
09419             if ( fFromSightingEnemy )
09420             {
09421                   if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction != NO_PENDING_ACTION && pSoldier->sGridNo == pSoldier->sFinalDestination )
09422                   {
09423                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
09424                   }
09425 
09426                   // Stop pending animation....
09427                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
09428                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation2 = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
09429 
09430                   // Kaiden: Another UB Bug Fix.
09431                   // ATE: Nasty bug - clear out any fence jumping that may be in progress
09432                   pSoldier->fContinueMoveAfterStanceChange = FALSE;
09433             }
09434 
09435     if ( !pSoldier->fTurningToShoot )
09436     {
09437       pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = FALSE;
09438     }
09439       }
09440 
09441       // Unset UI!
09442       if ( fFromSightingEnemy || ( pSoldier->pTempObject == NULL && !pSoldier->fTurningToShoot ) )
09443       {
09444             UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
09445       }
09446 
09447       pSoldier->bTurningFromUI = FALSE;
09448 
09449       UnSetEngagedInConvFromPCAction( pSoldier );
09450 }
09451 
09452 
09453 // HUALT EVENT IS USED TO STOP A MERC - NETWORKING SHOULD CHECK / ADJUST TO GRIDNO?
09454 void EVENT_StopMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bDirection )
09455 {
09456       INT16 sX, sY;
09457 
09458       // MOVE GUY TO GRIDNO--- SHOULD BE THE SAME UNLESS IN MULTIPLAYER
09459       // Makesure center of tile
09460       sX = CenterX( sGridNo );
09461       sY = CenterY( sGridNo );
09462 
09463 
09464       //Cancel pending events
09465       if ( !pSoldier->fDelayedMovement )
09466       {
09467             pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
09468             pSoldier->usPendingAnimation2 = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
09469             pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = NO_PENDING_DIRECTION;
09470             pSoldier->ubPendingAction            = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
09471       }
09472 
09473       pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode                       = 0;
09474       pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = 0;
09475 
09476       // Cancel path data!
09477       pSoldier->usPathIndex = pSoldier->usPathDataSize = 0;
09478       
09479       // Set ext tile waiting flag off!
09480       pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = FALSE;
09481 
09482       // Turn off reverse...
09483       pSoldier->bReverse = FALSE;
09484 
09485       EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, (FLOAT) sX, (FLOAT) sY );
09486       pSoldier->sDestXPos = (INT16)pSoldier->dXPos;
09487       pSoldier->sDestYPos = (INT16)pSoldier->dYPos;
09488       EVENT_SetSoldierDirection(pSoldier, bDirection);
09489       
09490       if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING )
09491       {
09492             SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
09493       }
09494 
09495       // ATE; IF turning to shoot, stop!
09496       if ( pSoldier->fTurningToShoot )
09497       {
09498             pSoldier->fTurningToShoot = FALSE;
09499             // Release attacker
09500             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Reducing attacker busy count..., ending fire because saw something") );
09501             ReduceAttackBusyCount( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
09502       }
09503 
09504       // Turn off multi-move speed override....
09505       if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == pSoldier->sFinalDestination )
09506       {
09507             pSoldier->fUseMoverrideMoveSpeed = FALSE;
09508       }
09509 
09510       // Unset UI!
09511       UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
09512 
09513       UnMarkMovementReserved( pSoldier );
09514 
09515 }
09516 
09517 
09518 void ReLoadSoldierAnimationDueToHandItemChange( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usOldItem, UINT16 usNewItem )
09519 {
09520       // DON'T continue aiming!
09521       // GOTO STANCE
09522       // CHECK FOR AIMING ANIMATIONS
09523       BOOLEAN     fOldRifle = FALSE;
09524       BOOLEAN     fNewRifle = FALSE;
09525       
09526       // Shutoff burst....
09527       // ( we could be on, then change gun that does not have burst )
09528       if ( Weapon[ usNewItem ].ubShotsPerBurst == 0 && !Weapon[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].NoSemiAuto )
09529       {
09530             pSoldier->bDoBurst            = FALSE;
09531             pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_NORMAL;
09532             pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 0;
09533       }
09534       else if ( Weapon[usNewItem].NoSemiAuto )
09535       {
09536             pSoldier->bDoBurst            = TRUE;
09537             pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_AUTOFIRE;
09538             pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 1;
09539       }
09540 
09541       if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_FIREREADY )
09542       {
09543             // Stop aiming!
09544             SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
09545       }
09546 
09547       // Cancel services...
09548       GivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier );
09549 
09550       // Did we have a rifle and do we now not have one?
09551       if ( usOldItem != NOTHING )
09552       {
09553             if ( Item[ usOldItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
09554             {
09555 //                if ( (Item[ usOldItem ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED) && usOldItem != ROCKET_LAUNCHER )
09556                   if ( (Item[ usOldItem ].twohanded ) && !Item[usOldItem].rocketlauncher )
09557                   {
09558                         fOldRifle = TRUE;
09559                   }
09560             }
09561       }     
09562 
09563       if ( usNewItem != NOTHING )
09564       {
09565             if ( Item[ usNewItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
09566             {
09567 //                if ( (Item[ usNewItem ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED) && usNewItem != ROCKET_LAUNCHER )
09568                   if ( (Item[ usNewItem ].twohanded ) && !Item[usNewItem].rocketlauncher )
09569                   {
09570                         fNewRifle = TRUE;
09571                   }
09572             }
09573       }     
09574 
09575       // Switch on stance!
09576       switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
09577       {
09578             case ANIM_STAND:
09579 
09580                   if ( fOldRifle && !fNewRifle )
09581                   {
09582                         // Put it away!
09583                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, LOWER_RIFLE, 0 , FALSE );
09584                   }
09585                   else if ( !fOldRifle && fNewRifle )
09586                   {
09587                         // Bring it up!
09588                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, RAISE_RIFLE, 0 , FALSE );
09589                   }
09590                   else
09591                   {
09592                         SetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
09593                   }
09594                   break;
09595 
09596             case ANIM_CROUCH:
09597             case ANIM_PRONE:
09598 
09599                   SetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
09600                   break;
09601       }
09602 
09603 }
09604 
09605 
09606 
09607 UINT16 *CreateEnemyGlow16BPPPalette( SGPPaletteEntry *pPalette, UINT32 rscale, UINT32 gscale, BOOLEAN fAdjustGreen )
09608 {
09609       UINT16 *p16BPPPalette, r16, g16, b16, usColor;
09610       UINT32 cnt;
09611       UINT32 rmod, gmod, bmod;
09612       UINT8  r,g,b;
09613 
09614       Assert( pPalette != NULL );
09615 
09616       p16BPPPalette = (UINT16 *) MemAlloc( sizeof( UINT16 ) * 256 );
09617 
09618       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 256; cnt++ )
09619       {
09620             gmod = (pPalette[ cnt ].peGreen);
09621             bmod = (pPalette[ cnt ].peBlue);
09622 
09623             rmod = __max( rscale, (pPalette[ cnt ].peRed) );
09624 
09625             if ( fAdjustGreen )
09626             {
09627                   gmod = __max( gscale, (pPalette[ cnt ].peGreen) );
09628             }
09629 
09630             r = (UINT8)__min(rmod, 255);
09631             g = (UINT8)__min(gmod, 255);
09632             b = (UINT8)__min(bmod, 255);
09633 
09634             if(gusRedShift < 0)
09635                   r16=((UINT16)r>>(-gusRedShift));
09636             else
09637                   r16=((UINT16)r<<gusRedShift);
09638 
09639             if(gusGreenShift < 0)
09640                   g16=((UINT16)g>>(-gusGreenShift));
09641             else
09642                   g16=((UINT16)g<<gusGreenShift);
09643 
09644 
09645             if(gusBlueShift < 0)
09646                   b16=((UINT16)b>>(-gusBlueShift));
09647             else
09648                   b16=((UINT16)b<<gusBlueShift);
09649 
09650             // Prevent creation of pure black color
09651             usColor     = (r16&gusRedMask)|(g16&gusGreenMask)|(b16&gusBlueMask);
09652 
09653             if((usColor==0) && ((r+g+b)!=0))
09654                   usColor=0x0001;
09655 
09656             p16BPPPalette[ cnt ] = usColor;
09657       }
09658       return( p16BPPPalette );
09659 }
09660 
09661  
09662 UINT16 *CreateEnemyGreyGlow16BPPPalette( SGPPaletteEntry *pPalette, UINT32 rscale, UINT32 gscale, BOOLEAN fAdjustGreen )
09663 {
09664       UINT16 *p16BPPPalette, r16, g16, b16, usColor;
09665       UINT32 cnt, lumin;
09666       UINT32 rmod, gmod, bmod;
09667       UINT8  r,g,b;
09668 
09669       Assert( pPalette != NULL );
09670 
09671       p16BPPPalette = (UINT16 *) MemAlloc( sizeof( UINT16 ) * 256 );
09672 
09673       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 256; cnt++ )
09674       {
09675             lumin=(pPalette[ cnt ].peRed*299/1000)+ (pPalette[ cnt ].peGreen*587/1000)+(pPalette[ cnt ].peBlue*114/1000);
09676             rmod=(100*lumin)/256;
09677             gmod=(100*lumin)/256;
09678             bmod=(100*lumin)/256;
09679 
09680 
09681 
09682             rmod = __max( rscale, rmod );
09683 
09684             if ( fAdjustGreen )
09685             {
09686                   gmod = __max( gscale, gmod );
09687             }
09688 
09689 
09690             r = (UINT8)__min(rmod, 255);
09691             g = (UINT8)__min(gmod, 255);
09692             b = (UINT8)__min(bmod, 255);
09693 
09694             if(gusRedShift < 0)
09695                   r16=((UINT16)r>>(-gusRedShift));
09696             else
09697                   r16=((UINT16)r<<gusRedShift);
09698 
09699             if(gusGreenShift < 0)
09700                   g16=((UINT16)g>>(-gusGreenShift));
09701             else
09702                   g16=((UINT16)g<<gusGreenShift);
09703 
09704 
09705             if(gusBlueShift < 0)
09706                   b16=((UINT16)b>>(-gusBlueShift));
09707             else
09708                   b16=((UINT16)b<<gusBlueShift);
09709 
09710             // Prevent creation of pure black color
09711             usColor     = (r16&gusRedMask)|(g16&gusGreenMask)|(b16&gusBlueMask);
09712 
09713             if((usColor==0) && ((r+g+b)!=0))
09714                   usColor=0x0001;
09715 
09716             p16BPPPalette[ cnt ] = usColor;
09717       }
09718       return( p16BPPPalette );
09719 }
09720 
09721 
09722 void ContinueMercMovement( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
09723 {
09724       INT16       sAPCost;    
09725       INT16       sGridNo;
09726 
09727       sGridNo = pSoldier->sFinalDestination;
09728 
09729       // Can we afford this?
09730       if ( pSoldier->bGoodContPath )
09731       {
09732             sGridNo = pSoldier->sContPathLocation;
09733       }
09734       else
09735       {
09736             // ATE: OK, don't cancel count, so pending actions are still valid...
09737             pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
09738       }
09739 
09740       // get a path to dest...
09741       if ( FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NO_COPYROUTE, 0 ) )
09742       {
09743             sAPCost = PtsToMoveDirection( pSoldier, (UINT8)guiPathingData[ 0 ] );
09744 
09745             if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 , (BOOLEAN)( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )  ) )
09746             {
09747                   // Acknowledge
09748                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
09749                   {
09750                         DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_OK1 );
09751 
09752                         // If we have a face, tell text in it to go away!
09753                         if ( pSoldier->iFaceIndex != -1 )
09754                         {
09755                               gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].fDisplayTextOver = FACE_ERASE_TEXT_OVER;
09756                         }
09757                   }
09758 
09759                   AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, FALSE );
09760 
09761                   SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
09762 
09763                   // OK, try and get a path to out dest!
09764                   EVENT_InternalGetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, FALSE, TRUE );
09765             }
09766       }
09767 }
09768 
09769 
09770 BOOLEAN CheckForBreathCollapse( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
09771 {
09772       // Check if we are out of breath!
09773       // Only check if > 70
09774       if ( pSoldier->bBreathMax > 70 )
09775       {
09776             if ( pSoldier->bBreath < 20 && !(pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_LOW_BREATH ) && 
09777                         gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND )
09778             {
09779                   // WARN!
09780                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_OUT_OF_BREATH );             
09781 
09782                   // Set flag indicating we were warned!
09783                   pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_LOW_BREATH;
09784             }
09785       }
09786 
09787       // Check for drowing.....
09788       //if ( pSoldier->bBreath < 10 && !(pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_DROWNING ) && pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
09789       //{
09790             // WARN!
09791       //    TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_DROWNING );                  
09792             
09793             // Set flag indicating we were warned!
09794       //    pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_DROWNING;
09795 
09796     // WISDOM GAIN (25):  Starting to drown
09797   //  StatChange( pSoldier, WISDOMAMT, 25, FALSE );
09798 
09799       //}
09800 
09801       if ( pSoldier->bBreath == 0 && !pSoldier->bCollapsed && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_VEHICLE | SOLDIER_ANIMAL | SOLDIER_MONSTER ) ) )
09802       {
09803             // Collapse!
09804             // OK, Set a flag, because we may still be in the middle of an animation what is not interruptable...
09805             pSoldier->bBreathCollapsed = TRUE;
09806 
09807             return( TRUE );
09808       }
09809 
09810       return( FALSE );
09811 }
09812 
09813 
09814 BOOLEAN InternalIsValidStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bDirection, INT8 bNewStance )
09815 {
09816       UINT16                                                usOKToAddStructID=0;
09817       STRUCTURE_FILE_REF            *pStructureFileRef;
09818       UINT16                                                usAnimSurface=0;
09819       UINT16                                                usAnimState;
09820 
09821       // Check, if dest is prone, we can actually do this!
09822 
09823       // If we are a vehicle, we can only 'stand'
