09824       if ( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && bNewStance != ANIM_STAND )
09825       {     
09826             return( FALSE );
09827       }
09828 
09829       // Check if we are in water?
09830       if ( MercInWater( pSoldier ) )
09831       {
09832             if ( bNewStance == ANIM_PRONE || bNewStance == ANIM_CROUCH )
09833             {
09834                   return( FALSE );
09835             }
09836       }
09837 
09838   if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == ROBOTNOWEAPON && bNewStance != ANIM_STAND )
09839   {
09840     return( FALSE );
09841   }
09842 
09843       // Check if we are in water?
09844       if ( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
09845       {
09846             if ( bNewStance == ANIM_PRONE )
09847             {
09848                   return( FALSE );
09849             }
09850             else
09851             {
09852                   return( TRUE );
09853             }
09854       }
09855 
09856 
09857       if ( pSoldier->bCollapsed )
09858       {
09859             if ( bNewStance == ANIM_STAND || bNewStance == ANIM_CROUCH )
09860             {
09861                   return( FALSE );
09862             }
09863       }
09864 
09865       // Check if we can do this....
09866       if ( pSoldier->pLevelNode && pSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData != NULL )
09867       {
09868             usOKToAddStructID = pSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData->usStructureID;
09869       }
09870       else
09871       {
09872             usOKToAddStructID = INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID;
09873       }
09874 
09875       switch( bNewStance )
09876       {
09877             case ANIM_STAND:
09878 
09879                   usAnimState = STANDING;
09880                   break;
09881 
09882             case ANIM_CROUCH:
09883 
09884                   usAnimState = CROUCHING;
09885                   break;
09886 
09887 
09888             case ANIM_PRONE:
09889 
09890                   usAnimState = PRONE;
09891                   break;
09892 
09893             default:
09894 
09895       // Something gone funny here....
09896       usAnimState = pSoldier->usAnimState;
09897                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Wrong desired stance given: %d, %d.", bNewStance, pSoldier->usAnimState );
09898       }
09899 
09900       usAnimSurface = DetermineSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier,  usAnimState );
09901 
09902       // Get structure ref........
09903       pStructureFileRef = GetAnimationStructureRef( pSoldier->ubID, usAnimSurface, usAnimState );
09904 
09905       if ( pStructureFileRef != NULL )
09906       {
09907             // Can we add structure data for this stance...?
09908             if ( !OkayToAddStructureToWorld( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, &(pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[gOneCDirection[ bDirection ]]), usOKToAddStructID ) )
09909             {
09910                   return( FALSE );
09911             }
09912       }
09913 
09914       return( TRUE );
09915 }
09916 
09917 
09918 BOOLEAN IsValidStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bNewStance )
09919 {
09920       return( InternalIsValidStance( pSoldier, pSoldier->bDirection, bNewStance ) );
09921 }
09922 
09923 
09924 BOOLEAN IsValidMovementMode( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 usMovementMode )
09925 {
09926       // Check, if dest is prone, we can actually do this!
09927 
09928       // Check if we are in water?
09929       if ( MercInWater( pSoldier ) )
09930       {
09931             if ( usMovementMode == RUNNING || usMovementMode == SWATTING || usMovementMode == CRAWLING )
09932             {
09933                   return( FALSE );
09934             }
09935       }
09936 
09937       return( TRUE );
09938 }
09939 
09940 
09941 void SelectMoveAnimationFromStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
09942 {
09943       // Determine which animation to do...depending on stance and gun in hand...
09944       switch ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
09945       {
09946             case ANIM_STAND:
09947                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, WALKING, 0 , FALSE );
09948                   break;
09949 
09950             case ANIM_PRONE:
09951                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CRAWLING, 0 , FALSE );
09952                   break;
09953 
09954             case ANIM_CROUCH:
09955                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, SWATTING, 0 , FALSE );
09956                   break;
09957 
09958       }
09959 
09960 }
09961 
09962 
09963 void GetActualSoldierAnimDims( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 *psHeight, INT16 *psWidth )
09964 {
09965       UINT16            usAnimSurface;
09966       ETRLEObject *pTrav;
09967 
09968       usAnimSurface = GetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
09969 
09970       if ( usAnimSurface == INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE )
09971       {
09972             *psHeight                           = (INT16)5;
09973             *psWidth                            = (INT16)5;
09974             
09975             return;
09976       }
09977 
09978       if ( gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject == NULL )
09979       {
09980             *psHeight                           = (INT16)5;
09981             *psWidth                            = (INT16)5;       
09982             return;
09983       }
09984 
09985       // OK, noodle here on what we should do... If we take each frame, it will be different slightly
09986       // depending on the frame and the value returned here will vary thusly. However, for the
09987       // uses of this function, we should be able to use just the first frame...
09988 
09989       if ( pSoldier->usAniFrame >= gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject->usNumberOfObjects )
09990       {
09991             //int i = 0;
09992             return;
09993       }
09994 
09995       pTrav = &(gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject->pETRLEObject[ pSoldier->usAniFrame ] );
09996 
09997       *psHeight                           = (INT16)pTrav->usHeight;
09998       *psWidth                            = (INT16)pTrav->usWidth;
09999 }
10000 
10001 void GetActualSoldierAnimOffsets( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 *sOffsetX, INT16 *sOffsetY )
10002 {
10003       UINT16                                                                   usAnimSurface;
10004       ETRLEObject *pTrav;
10005 
10006       usAnimSurface = GetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
10007 
10008       if ( usAnimSurface == INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE )
10009       {
10010             *sOffsetX                           = (INT16)0;
10011             *sOffsetY                           = (INT16)0;
10012 
10013             return;
10014       }
10015 
10016   if ( gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject == NULL )
10017   {
10018             *sOffsetX                           = (INT16)0;
10019             *sOffsetY                           = (INT16)0;       
10020             return;
10021   }
10022 
10023       pTrav = &(gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject->pETRLEObject[ pSoldier->usAniFrame ] );
10024 
10025       *sOffsetX                           = (INT16)pTrav->sOffsetX;
10026       *sOffsetY                           = (INT16)pTrav->sOffsetY;
10027 }
10028 
10029 
10030 void SetSoldierLocatorOffsets( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10031 {
10032       INT16 sHeight, sWidth;
10033       INT16 sOffsetX, sOffsetY;
10034 
10035 
10036       // OK, from our animation, get height, width
10037       GetActualSoldierAnimDims( pSoldier, &sHeight, &sWidth );
10038       GetActualSoldierAnimOffsets( pSoldier, &sOffsetX, &sOffsetY );
10039 
10040       // OK, here, use the difference between center of animation ( sWidth/2 ) and our offset!
10041       //pSoldier->sLocatorOffX = ( abs( sOffsetX ) ) - ( sWidth / 2 );
10042 
10043       pSoldier->sBoundingBoxWidth         = sWidth;
10044       pSoldier->sBoundingBoxHeight  = sHeight;
10045       pSoldier->sBoundingBoxOffsetX = sOffsetX;
10046       pSoldier->sBoundingBoxOffsetY = sOffsetY;
10047 
10048 }
10049 
10050 BOOLEAN SoldierCarriesTwoHandedWeapon( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10051 {
10052       UINT16 usItem;
10053 
10054       usItem = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
10055 
10056 //    if ( usItem != NOTHING && (Item[ usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_TWO_HANDED) )
10057       if ( usItem != NOTHING && (Item[ usItem ].twohanded ) )
10058       {
10059             return( TRUE );
10060       }
10061 
10062       return( FALSE );
10063 
10064 }
10065 
10066 
10067 
10068 INT32 CheckBleeding( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10069 {
10070  INT8       bBandaged; //,savedOurTurn;
10071  INT32      iBlood = NOBLOOD;
10072 
10073  if ( pSoldier->bLife != 0 )
10074  {
10075        // if merc is hurt beyond the minimum required to bleed, or he's dying
10076        if ( ( pSoldier->bBleeding > MIN_BLEEDING_THRESHOLD) || pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
10077        {
10078                   // if he's NOT in the process of being bandaged or DOCTORed
10079                   if ( ( pSoldier->ubServiceCount == 0 ) && ( AnyDoctorWhoCanHealThisPatient( pSoldier, HEALABLE_EVER ) == NULL ) )
10080                   {
10081                    // may drop blood whether or not any bleeding takes place this turn
10082                    if ( pSoldier->bTilesMoved < 1 )
10083                    {
10084                          iBlood = ( ( pSoldier->bBleeding - MIN_BLEEDING_THRESHOLD ) / BLOODDIVISOR ); // + pSoldier->dying;
10085                          if ( iBlood > MAXBLOODQUANTITY )
10086                          {
10087                                     iBlood = MAXBLOODQUANTITY;
10088                          }
10089                    }
10090                    else
10091                    {
10092                          iBlood = NOBLOOD;
10093                    }
10094 
10095                    // Are we in a different mode?
10096                    if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
10097                    {
10098                          pSoldier->dNextBleed -= (FLOAT)RT_NEXT_BLEED_MODIFIER;
10099                    }
10100                    else
10101                    {
10102                          // Do a single step descrease
10103                          pSoldier->dNextBleed--;
10104                    }
10105 
10106                    // if it's time to lose some blood
10107                    if ( pSoldier->dNextBleed <= 0)
10108                    {
10109                          // first, calculate if soldier is bandaged
10110                          bBandaged = pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bBleeding - pSoldier->bLife;
10111 
10112                          // as long as he's bandaged and not "dying"
10113                          if ( bBandaged && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
10114                          {
10115                                // just bleeding through existing bandages
10116                                pSoldier->bBleeding++;
10117 
10118                                SoldierBleed( pSoldier, TRUE );
10119                          }
10120                          else // soldier is either not bandaged at all or is dying
10121                          {
10122                                if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )          // if he's dying
10123                                {
10124                                      // if he's conscious, and he hasn't already, say his "dying quote"
10125                                      if ( ( pSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS ) && !pSoldier->fDyingComment )
10126                                      {
10127                                            TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_SERIOUSLY_WOUNDED );
10128 
10129                                            pSoldier->fDyingComment = TRUE;
10130                                      }
10131 
10132                                      // can't permit lifemax to ever bleed beneath OKLIFE, or that
10133                                      // soldier might as well be dead!
10134                                      if (pSoldier->bLifeMax >= OKLIFE)
10135                                           {
10136                                            // bleeding while "dying" costs a PERMANENT point of life each time!
10137                                            pSoldier->bLifeMax--;
10138                                            pSoldier->bBleeding--;
10139                                           }
10140                                     }
10141                               }
10142 
10143                               // either way, a point of life (health) is lost because of bleeding
10144                               // This will also update the life bar
10145 
10146                               SoldierBleed( pSoldier, FALSE );
10147 
10148 
10149                               // if he's not dying (which includes him saying the dying quote just
10150                               // now), and he hasn't warned us that he's bleeding yet, he does so
10151                               // Also, not if they are being bandaged....
10152                               if ( ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE ) && !pSoldier->fDyingComment && !pSoldier->fWarnedAboutBleeding && !gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode && pSoldier->ubServiceCount == 0 )
10153                               {
10154                                     TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_STARTING_TO_BLEED );
10155 
10156                                     // "starting to bleed" quote
10157                                     pSoldier->fWarnedAboutBleeding = TRUE;
10158                               }
10159 
10160                               pSoldier->dNextBleed = CalcSoldierNextBleed( pSoldier );
10161 
10162                         }
10163                   }
10164             }
10165       } 
10166   return( iBlood );
10167 }
10168 
10169 
10170 void SoldierBleed( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fBandagedBleed )
10171 {
10172       INT8 bOldLife;
10173 
10174       // OK, here make some stuff happen for bleeding
10175       // A banaged bleed does not show damage taken , just through existing bandages      
10176 
10177       // ATE: Do this ONLY if buddy is in sector.....
10178       if ( ( pSoldier->bInSector && guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN ) || guiCurrentScreen != GAME_SCREEN )
10179       {
10180             pSoldier->fFlashPortrait = TRUE;
10181             pSoldier->bFlashPortraitFrame = FLASH_PORTRAIT_STARTSHADE;
10182             RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->PortraitFlashCounter, FLASH_PORTRAIT_DELAY );
10183 
10184             // If we are in mapscreen, set this person as selected
10185             if ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
10186             {
10187                   SetInfoChar( pSoldier->ubID );
10188             }
10189       }
10190 
10191       bOldLife = pSoldier->bLife;
10192 
10193       // If we are already dead, don't show damage!
10194       if ( !fBandagedBleed )
10195       {
10196             SoldierTakeDamage( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH, 1, 100, TAKE_DAMAGE_BLOODLOSS, NOBODY, NOWHERE, 0, TRUE );
10197       }
10198 
10199 }
10200 
10201 
10202 void SoldierCollapse( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10203 {
10204       BOOLEAN fMerc = FALSE;
10205 
10206       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType <= REGFEMALE )
10207       {
10208             fMerc = TRUE;
10209       }
10210 
10211       // If we are an animal, etc, don't do anything....
10212       switch( pSoldier->ubBodyType )
10213       {
10214             case ADULTFEMALEMONSTER:
10215             case AM_MONSTER:
10216             case YAF_MONSTER:
10217             case YAM_MONSTER:
10218             case LARVAE_MONSTER:
10219             case INFANT_MONSTER:
10220             case QUEENMONSTER:
10221 
10222                   // Give breath back....
10223                   DeductPoints( pSoldier,0, (INT16)-5000 );
10224                   return;
10225                   break;
10226       }     
10227 
10228       pSoldier->bCollapsed                 = TRUE;
10229 
10230       ReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier );
10231 
10232   // CC has requested - handle sight here...
10233       HandleSight( pSoldier, SIGHT_LOOK );
10234 
10235       // Check height
10236       switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
10237       {
10238                   case ANIM_STAND:
10239 
10240                         if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
10241                         {
10242                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, DEEP_WATER_DIE, 0, FALSE );               
10243                         }
10244                         else if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == LOW_WATER )
10245                         {
10246                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, WATER_DIE, 0, FALSE );              
10247                         }
10248                         else
10249                         {
10250           BeginTyingToFall( pSoldier );
10251                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FALLFORWARD_FROMHIT_STAND, 0, FALSE );
10252                         }
10253                         break;
10254 
10255                   case ANIM_CROUCH:
10256 
10257                         // Crouched or prone, only for mercs!
10258         BeginTyingToFall( pSoldier );
10259 
10260                         if ( fMerc )
10261                         {
10262                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FALLFORWARD_FROMHIT_CROUCH, 0 , FALSE);
10263                         }
10264                         else
10265                         {
10266                               // For civs... use fall from stand...
10267                               EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FALLFORWARD_FROMHIT_STAND, 0 , FALSE);
10268                         }
10269                         break;
10270 
10271                   case ANIM_PRONE:
10272 
10273                         switch( pSoldier->usAnimState )
10274                         {
10275                               case FALLFORWARD_FROMHIT_STAND:
10276                               case ENDFALLFORWARD_FROMHIT_CROUCH:
10277 
10278                                     ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, STAND_FALLFORWARD_STOP, 0, FALSE );
10279                                     break;
10280 
10281                               case FALLBACK_HIT_STAND:
10282                                     ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, FALLBACKHIT_STOP, 0, FALSE );
10283                                     break;
10284 
10285                               default:
10286                                           EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, PRONE_LAY_FROMHIT, 0 , FALSE );
10287                                           break;
10288                         }
10289                         break;
10290       }
10291 
10292       if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ENEMY)
10293       {
10294 
10295             if ( !(gTacticalStatus.bPanicTriggerIsAlarm) && (gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne == pSoldier->ubID) )
10296             {
10297                   // replace this guy as the chosen one!
10298                   gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne = NOBODY;
10299                   MakeClosestEnemyChosenOne();
10300             }
10301 
10302             if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_UNDERAICONTROL))
10303             {     
10304                   #ifdef TESTAICONTROL
10305                         DebugAI( (STR)String("Ending turn for %d because of error from HandleItem", pSoldier->ubID ) );
10306                   #endif
10307 
10308                   EndAIGuysTurn( pSoldier );
10309             }
10310       }
10311 
10312       // DON'T DE-SELECT GUY.....
10313       //else
10314       //{
10315             // Check if this is our selected guy...
10316       //    if ( pSoldier->ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
10317       //    {
10318       //          SelectNextAvailSoldier( pSoldier );             
10319       //          }
10320       //}
10321 }
10322 
10323 
10324 FLOAT CalcSoldierNextBleed( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10325 {
10326       INT8        bBandaged;
10327 
10328       // calculate how many turns before he bleeds again
10329       // bleeding faster the lower life gets, and if merc is running around
10330       //pSoldier->nextbleed = 2 + (pSoldier->life / (10 + pSoldier->tilesMoved));  // min = 2
10331 
10332       // if bandaged, give 1/2 of the bandaged life points back into equation
10333       bBandaged = pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife - pSoldier->bBleeding;
10334 
10335       return( (FLOAT)1 + (FLOAT)( (pSoldier->bLife + bBandaged / 2) / (10 + pSoldier->bTilesMoved) ) );  // min = 1
10336 }
10337 
10338 FLOAT CalcSoldierNextUnmovingBleed( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10339 {
10340       INT8        bBandaged;
10341 
10342       // calculate bleeding rate without the penalty for tiles moved
10343 
10344       // if bandaged, give 1/2 of the bandaged life points back into equation
10345       bBandaged = pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife - pSoldier->bBleeding;
10346       
10347       return( (FLOAT)1 + (FLOAT)( (pSoldier->bLife + bBandaged / 2) / 10 ) );  // min = 1
10348 }
10349 
10350 void HandlePlacingRoofMarker( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fSet, BOOLEAN fForce )
10351 {
10352       LEVELNODE *pRoofNode;
10353       LEVELNODE *pNode;
10354 
10355       if ( pSoldier->bVisible == -1 && fSet )
10356       {
10357             return;
10358       }
10359 
10360       if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
10361       {
10362             //return;
10363       }
10364 
10365       // If we are on the roof, add roof UI peice!
10366       if ( pSoldier->bLevel == SECOND_LEVEL )
10367       {
10368             // Get roof node
10369             pRoofNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pRoofHead;
10370 
10371             // Return if we are still climbing roof....
10372             if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CLIMBUPROOF && !fForce )
10373             {
10374                   return;
10375             }
10376 
10377             if ( pRoofNode != NULL )
10378             {
10379                   if ( fSet )
10380                   {
10381                         if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED )
10382                         {
10383                               // Set some flags on this poor thing
10384                               //pRoofNode->uiFlags |= ( LEVELNODE_USEBESTTRANSTYPE | LEVELNODE_REVEAL | LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC  );
10385                               //pRoofNode->uiFlags |= ( LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
10386                               //pRoofNode->uiFlags &= ( ~LEVELNODE_HIDDEN );
10387                               //ResetSpecificLayerOptimizing( TILES_DYNAMIC_ROOF );
10388                         }
10389                   }
10390                   else
10391                   {
10392                         if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED )
10393                         {
10394                               // Remove some flags on this poor thing
10395                               //pRoofNode->uiFlags &= ~( LEVELNODE_USEBESTTRANSTYPE | LEVELNODE_REVEAL | LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
10396 
10397                               //pRoofNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_HIDDEN;
10398                         }
10399                   }
10400 
10401                   if ( fSet )
10402                   {
10403                         // If it does not exist already....
10404                         if ( !IndexExistsInRoofLayer( sGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS11 ) )
10405                         {
10406                               pNode = AddRoofToTail( sGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS11 );
10407                               pNode->ubShadeLevel                       =DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
10408                               pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
10409                         }
10410                   }
10411                   else
10412                   {
10413                         RemoveRoof( sGridNo, FIRSTPOINTERS11 );
10414                   }
10415             }
10416       }
10417 }
10418 
10419 void PositionSoldierLight( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10420 {
10421       // DO ONLY IF WE'RE AT A GOOD LEVEL
10422       if ( ubAmbientLightLevel < MIN_AMB_LEVEL_FOR_MERC_LIGHTS )
10423       {
10424             return;
10425       }
10426 
10427       if ( !pSoldier->bInSector )
10428       {
10429             return;
10430       }
10431 
10432       if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
10433       {
10434             return;
10435       }
10436 
10437       if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
10438       {
10439             return;
10440       }
10441 
10442       //if the player DOESNT want the merc to cast light
10443       if( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MERC_CASTS_LIGHT ] )
10444       {
10445             return;
10446       }
10447 
10448       if ( pSoldier->iLight == -1 )
10449       {
10450             CreateSoldierLight( pSoldier );
10451       }
10452 
10453       //if ( pSoldier->ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
10454       {
10455             LightSpritePower(pSoldier->iLight, TRUE);
10456             LightSpriteFake(pSoldier->iLight);
10457 
10458             LightSpritePosition( pSoldier->iLight, (INT16)(pSoldier->sX/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(pSoldier->sY/CELL_Y_SIZE));
10459       }
10460 }
10461 
10462 void SetCheckSoldierLightFlag( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10463 {
10464             PositionSoldierLight( pSoldier );
10465       //pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_RECHECKLIGHT;
10466 }
10467 
10468 
10469 void PickPickupAnimation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iItemIndex, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bZLevel )
10470 {
10471       INT8                    bDirection;
10472       STRUCTURE         *pStructure;
10473       BOOLEAN                 fDoNormalPickup = TRUE;
10474 
10475 
10476       // OK, Given the gridno, determine if it's the same one or different....
10477       if ( sGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo )
10478       {
10479             // Get direction to face....
10480             bDirection = (INT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sGridNo, pSoldier );
10481             pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = bDirection;
10482 
10483             // Change to pickup animation
10484             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, ADJACENT_GET_ITEM, 0 , FALSE );
10485 
10486             if (!(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC))
10487             {
10488                   // set "pending action" value for AI so it will wait
10489                   pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_PENDING_ACTION;
10490             }
10491 
10492       }
10493       else
10494       {
10495             // If in water....
10496             if ( MercInWater( pSoldier ) )
10497             {
10498                   UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
10499                   HandleSoldierPickupItem( pSoldier, iItemIndex, sGridNo, bZLevel );
10500                   SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
10501                   if (!(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC))
10502                   {
10503                         // reset action value for AI because we're done!
10504                         ActionDone( pSoldier );
10505                   }
10506 
10507             }
10508             else
10509             {
10510                   // Don't show animation of getting item, if we are not standing
10511                   switch ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
10512                   {
10513                         case ANIM_STAND:
10514                   
10515                               // OK, if we are looking at z-level >0, AND
10516                               // we have a strucxture with items in it
10517                               // look for orientation and use angle accordingly....
10518                               if ( bZLevel > 0 )
10519                               {
10520 //#if 0
10521                                     // Get direction to face....
10522                                     if ( ( pStructure = FindStructure( (INT16)sGridNo, ( STRUCTURE_HASITEMONTOP | STRUCTURE_OPENABLE ) ) ) != NULL )
10523                                     {
10524                                           fDoNormalPickup = FALSE;
10525 
10526                                           // OK, look at orientation
10527                                           switch( pStructure->ubWallOrientation )
10528                                           {
10529                                                 case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
10530                                                 case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
10531 
10532                                                             bDirection = (INT8)NORTH;
10533                                                             break;
10534 
10535                                                 case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
10536                                                 case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
10537 
10538                                                             bDirection = (INT8)WEST;
10539                                                             break;
10540 
10541                                                 default:
10542 
10543                                                             bDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
10544                                                             break;
10545                                           }
10546 
10547                                           //pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = bDirection;
10548                                           EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, bDirection );
10549                                           EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, bDirection );
10550 
10551                                           // Change to pickup animation
10552                                           EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, ADJACENT_GET_ITEM, 0 , FALSE );
10553                                     }
10554 //#endif
10555                               }
10556 
10557                               if ( fDoNormalPickup )
10558                               {
10559                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, PICKUP_ITEM, 0 , FALSE );
10560                               }
10561 
10562                               if (!(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC))
10563                               {
10564                                     // set "pending action" value for AI so it will wait
10565                                     pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_PENDING_ACTION;
10566                               }
10567                               break;
10568                   
10569                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
10570                         case ANIM_PRONE:
10571 
10572                               UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
10573                               HandleSoldierPickupItem( pSoldier, iItemIndex, sGridNo, bZLevel );
10574                               SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
10575                               if (!(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC))
10576                               {
10577                                     // reset action value for AI because we're done!
10578                                     ActionDone( pSoldier );
10579                               }
10580                               break;
10581                   }
10582             }
10583       }
10584 }
10585 
10586 void PickDropItemAnimation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10587 {
10588       // Don't show animation of getting item, if we are not standing
10589       switch ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
10590       {
10591             case ANIM_STAND:
10592       
10593                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, DROP_ITEM, 0 , FALSE );
10594                   break;
10595       
10596             case ANIM_CROUCH:
10597             case ANIM_PRONE:
10598 
10599                   SoldierHandleDropItem( pSoldier );
10600                   SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
10601                   break;
10602       }
10603 }
10604 
10605 
10606 void EVENT_SoldierBeginCutFence( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection )
10607 {
10608       // Make sure we have a structure here....
10609       if ( IsCuttableWireFenceAtGridNo( sGridNo ) )
10610       {
10611             // CHANGE DIRECTION AND GOTO ANIMATION NOW
10612             EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10613             EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10614 
10615             //BOOLEAN CutWireFence( INT16 sGridNo )
10616 
10617             // SET TARGET GRIDNO
10618             pSoldier->sTargetGridNo = sGridNo;
10619 
10620             // CHANGE TO ANIMATION
10621             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CUTTING_FENCE, 0 , FALSE );
10622       }
10623 }
10624 
10625 
10626 void EVENT_SoldierBeginRepair( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection )
10627 {
10628       INT8 bRepairItem;
10629       UINT8 ubID;
10630 
10631       // Make sure we have a structure here....
10632       bRepairItem = IsRepairableStructAtGridNo( sGridNo, &ubID );
10633 
10634       if ( bRepairItem )
10635       {
10636             // CHANGE DIRECTION AND GOTO ANIMATION NOW
10637             EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10638             EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10639 
10640             //BOOLEAN CutWireFence( INT16 sGridNo )
10641 
10642             // SET TARGET GRIDNO
10643             //pSoldier->sTargetGridNo = sGridNo;
10644 
10645             // CHANGE TO ANIMATION
10646             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GOTO_REPAIRMAN, 0 , FALSE );
10647             // SET BUDDY'S ASSIGNMENT TO REPAIR...
10648 
10649             // Are we a SAM site? ( 3 == SAM )
10650             if ( bRepairItem == 3 )
10651             {
10652                   SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, REPAIR, TRUE, FALSE, -1 );
10653             }
10654             else if ( bRepairItem == 2 ) // ( 2 == VEHICLE )
10655             {
10656                   SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, REPAIR, FALSE, FALSE, ubID );
10657             }
10658 
10659       }
10660 }
10661 
10662 void EVENT_SoldierBeginRefuel( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection )
10663 {
10664       INT8 bRefuelItem;
10665       UINT8 ubID;
10666 
10667       // Make sure we have a structure here....
10668       bRefuelItem = IsRefuelableStructAtGridNo( sGridNo, &ubID );
10669 
10670       if ( bRefuelItem )
10671       {
10672             // CHANGE DIRECTION AND GOTO ANIMATION NOW
10673             EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10674             EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10675 
10676             //BOOLEAN CutWireFence( INT16 sGridNo )
10677 
10678             // SET TARGET GRIDNO
10679             //pSoldier->sTargetGridNo = sGridNo;
10680 
10681             // CHANGE TO ANIMATION
10682             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, REFUEL_VEHICLE, 0 , FALSE );
10683             // SET BUDDY'S ASSIGNMENT TO REPAIR...
10684       }
10685 }
10686 
10687 
10688 void EVENT_SoldierBeginTakeBlood( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection )
10689 {
10690       ROTTING_CORPSE *pCorpse;
10691 
10692 
10693       // See if these is a corpse here....
10694       pCorpse = GetCorpseAtGridNo( sGridNo , pSoldier->bLevel );
10695 
10696       if ( pCorpse != NULL )
10697       {
10698             pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4 = pCorpse->iID;
10699 
10700             // CHANGE DIRECTION AND GOTO ANIMATION NOW
10701             EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10702             EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10703 
10704             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, TAKE_BLOOD_FROM_CORPSE, 0 , FALSE );
10705       }
10706       else
10707       {
10708             // Say NOTHING quote...
10709             DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_NOTHING );
10710       }
10711 }
10712 
10713 
10714 void EVENT_SoldierBeginAttachCan( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection )
10715 {
10716       STRUCTURE *             pStructure;
10717       DOOR_STATUS *           pDoorStatus;
10718 
10719       // OK, find door, attach to door, do animation...., remove item....
10720 
10721       // First make sure we still have item in hand....
10722       if ( !Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].canandstring )
10723       {
10724             return;
10725       }
10726 
10727       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
10728 
10729       if ( pStructure == NULL )
10730       {
10731             return;
10732       }
10733 
10734       // Modify door status to make sure one is created for this door
10735       // Use the current door state for this
10736       if ( !(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN) )
10737       {
10738             ModifyDoorStatus( sGridNo, FALSE, FALSE );
10739       }
10740       else
10741       {
10742             ModifyDoorStatus( sGridNo, TRUE, TRUE );
10743       }     
10744 
10745       // Now get door status...
10746       pDoorStatus = GetDoorStatus( sGridNo );
10747       if ( pDoorStatus == NULL )
10748       {
10749             // SOmething wrong here...
10750             return;
10751       }
10752             
10753       // OK set flag!
10754       pDoorStatus->ubFlags |= DOOR_HAS_TIN_CAN;
10755 
10756       // Do animation
10757       EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10758       EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10759 
10760       EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, ATTACH_CAN_TO_STRING, 0 , FALSE );
10761 
10762       // Remove item...
10763       DeleteObj( &(pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ) );
10764       fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
10765 
10766 }
10767 
10768 
10769 void EVENT_SoldierBeginReloadRobot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection, UINT8 ubMercSlot )
10770 {
10771       UINT8 ubPerson;
10772 
10773       // Make sure we have a robot here....
10774       ubPerson = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel );
10775 
10776       if ( ubPerson != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ ubPerson ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
10777       {
10778             // CHANGE DIRECTION AND GOTO ANIMATION NOW
10779             EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10780             EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10781 
10782             // CHANGE TO ANIMATION
10783             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, RELOAD_ROBOT, 0 , FALSE );
10784 
10785       }
10786 }
10787

10789 
10790 void ResetSoldierChangeStatTimer( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
10791 {
10792       pSoldier->uiChangeLevelTime = 0;
10793       pSoldier->uiChangeHealthTime = 0;
10794       pSoldier->uiChangeStrengthTime= 0;
10795       pSoldier->uiChangeDexterityTime= 0;
10796       pSoldier->uiChangeAgilityTime= 0;
10797       pSoldier->uiChangeWisdomTime= 0;
10798       pSoldier->uiChangeLeadershipTime= 0;
10799       pSoldier->uiChangeMarksmanshipTime= 0;
10800       pSoldier->uiChangeExplosivesTime= 0;
10801       pSoldier->uiChangeMedicalTime= 0;
10802       pSoldier->uiChangeMechanicalTime= 0;
10803 
10804 
10805       return;
10806 }
10807 
10808 
10809 void ChangeToFlybackAnimation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bDirection )
10810 {
10811       UINT16 usNewGridNo;
10812 
10813       // Get dest gridno, convert to center coords
10814       usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( gOppositeDirection[ bDirection ] ) );
10815       usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)usNewGridNo, DirectionInc( gOppositeDirection[ bDirection ] ) );
10816 
10817       // Remove any previous actions
10818       pSoldier->ubPendingAction            = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
10819 
10820       // Set path....
10821       pSoldier->usPathDataSize = 0;
10822       pSoldier->usPathIndex    = 0;
10823       pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = gOppositeDirection[ pSoldier->bDirection ];
10824       pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
10825       pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = gOppositeDirection[ pSoldier->bDirection ];
10826       pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
10827       pSoldier->sFinalDestination = usNewGridNo;
10828       EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDestination( pSoldier, pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ], FALSE, FLYBACK_HIT );
10829 
10830       // Get a new direction based on direction
10831       EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FLYBACK_HIT, 0 , FALSE );
10832 }
10833 
10834 void ChangeToFallbackAnimation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bDirection )
10835 {
10836       UINT16 usNewGridNo;
10837 
10838       // Get dest gridno, convert to center coords
10839       usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( gOppositeDirection[ bDirection ] ) );
10840       //usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)usNewGridNo, (UINT16)(-1 * DirectionInc( bDirection ) ) );
10841 
10842       // Remove any previous actions
10843       pSoldier->ubPendingAction            = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
10844 
10845       // Set path....
10846       pSoldier->usPathDataSize = 0;
10847       pSoldier->usPathIndex    = 0;
10848       pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathDataSize ] = gOppositeDirection[ pSoldier->bDirection ];
10849       pSoldier->usPathDataSize++;
10850       pSoldier->sFinalDestination = usNewGridNo;
10851       EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDestination( pSoldier, pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ], FALSE, FALLBACK_HIT_STAND );
10852 
10853       // Get a new direction based on direction
10854       EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, FALLBACK_HIT_STAND, 0 , FALSE );
10855 }
10856 
10857 
10858 void SetSoldierCowerState( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fOn )
10859 {
10860   // Robot's don't cower!
10861   if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == ROBOTNOWEAPON )
10862   {
10863             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("ERROR: Robot was told to cower!" ) );
10864     return;
10865   }
10866 
10867       // OK< set flag and do anim...
10868       if ( fOn )
10869       {
10870             if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_COWERING ) )
10871             {
10872                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, START_COWER, 0, FALSE );
10873                   
10874                   pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_COWERING;
10875 
10876                   pSoldier->ubDesiredHeight = ANIM_CROUCH;
10877             }
10878       }
10879       else
10880       {
10881             if ( (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_COWERING) )
10882             {
10883                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, END_COWER, 0, FALSE );
10884                   
10885                   pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_COWERING );
10886 
10887                   pSoldier->ubDesiredHeight = ANIM_STAND;
10888             }
10889       }
10890 }
10891 
10892 void MercStealFromMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pTarget )
10893 {
10894             INT16 sActionGridNo, sGridNo, sAdjustedGridNo;
10895             UINT8 ubDirection;
10896 
10897 
10898             // OK, find an adjacent gridno....
10899             sGridNo = pTarget->sGridNo;
10900 
10901             // See if we can get there to punch 
10902             sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
10903             if ( sActionGridNo != -1 )
10904             {
10905                   // SEND PENDING ACTION
10906                   pSoldier->ubPendingAction = MERC_STEAL;
10907                   pSoldier->sPendingActionData2  = pTarget->sGridNo;
10908                   pSoldier->bPendingActionData3  = ubDirection;
10909                   pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
10910 
10911                   // CHECK IF WE ARE AT THIS GRIDNO NOW
10912                   if ( pSoldier->sGridNo != sActionGridNo )
10913                   {
10914                         // WALK UP TO DEST FIRST
10915                         SendGetNewSoldierPathEvent( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
10916                   }
10917                   else
10918                   {
10919                         EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
10920                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STEAL_ITEM, 0 , FALSE );
10921                   }
10922 
10923                   // OK, set UI
10924                   gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
10925                   // reset attacking item (hand)
10926                   pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon = 0;
10927                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting STEAL attack, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
10928 
10929                   SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
10930             }
10931 }
10932 
10933 SOLDIERTYPE                   *pTMilitiaSoldier;
10934 BOOLEAN PlayerSoldierStartTalking( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubTargetID, BOOLEAN fValidate )
10935 {
10936       INT16                                     sFacingDir, sXPos, sYPos, sAPCost;
10937       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pTSoldier;
10938       UINT32                                    uiRange;
10939 
10940       if ( ubTargetID == NOBODY )
10941       {
10942             return( FALSE );
10943       }
10944 
10945       pTSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubTargetID ];
10946 
10947       // Check distance again, to be sure
10948       if ( fValidate )
10949       {
10950             // OK, since we locked this guy from moving
10951             // we should be close enough, so talk ( unless he is now dead )
10952             if ( !IsValidTalkableNPC( (UINT8)ubTargetID, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE ) )
10953             {
10954                   return( FALSE );
10955             }     
10956 
10957             uiRange = GetRangeFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, pTSoldier->sGridNo );
10958 
10959             if ( uiRange > ( NPC_TALK_RADIUS * 2 ) )
10960             {
10961                   // Todo here - should we follow dude?
10962                   return( FALSE );
10963             }
10964 
10965 
10966       }
10967 
10968       // Get APs...
10969       sAPCost = AP_TALK;
10970 
10971       if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) || (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME) ) //lal
10972       {
10973             ConvertGridNoToXY( pTSoldier->sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
10974 
10975             // Get direction from mouse pos
10976             sFacingDir = GetDirectionFromXY( sXPos, sYPos, pSoldier );
10977 
10978             // Set our guy facing
10979             SendSoldierSetDesiredDirectionEvent( pSoldier, sFacingDir );
10980 
10981             // Set NPC facing
10982             SendSoldierSetDesiredDirectionEvent( pTSoldier, gOppositeDirection[ sFacingDir ] );
10983 
10984             // Stop our guys...
10985             EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
10986       }
10987 
10988       pTMilitiaSoldier = pTSoldier; //lal
10989 
10990       //lal 
10991       // ATE; Check for normal civs...
10992       if ( GetCivType( pTSoldier ) != CIV_TYPE_NA )
10993       {
10994             //lal
10995             if ( ( pTSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM ) && ( gGameExternalOptions.fAllowTacticalMilitiaCommand == TRUE ) && (pSoldier->bSide == pTSoldier->bSide) )
10996             {
10997                   PopupMilitiaControlMenu( pTSoldier );
10998                   return( FALSE );
10999             }
11000             else
11001             {
11002                   // Deduct points from our guy....
11003                   DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 );
11004 
11005                   StartCivQuote( pTSoldier );
11006                   return( FALSE );
11007             }
11008       }
11009 
11010 
11011 
11012 
11013       // Are we an EPC that is being escorted?
11014       if ( pTSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && pTSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC )
11015       {
11016             return( InitiateConversation( pTSoldier, pSoldier, APPROACH_EPC_WHO_IS_RECRUITED, 0 ) );
11017                   //Converse( pTSoldier->ubProfile, pSoldier->ubProfile, APPROACH_EPC_WHO_IS_RECRUITED, 0 );
11018       }
11019       else if (pTSoldier->bNeutral)
11020       {
11021             switch( pTSoldier->ubProfile )
11022             {
11023                   case JIM:
11024                   case JACK:
11025                   case OLAF:
11026                   case RAY:
11027                   case OLGA:
11028                   case TYRONE:
11029                         // Start combat etc
11030                         DeleteTalkingMenu();
11031                         CancelAIAction( pTSoldier, TRUE );
11032                         AddToShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuoteList( pTSoldier->ubID );
11033                         break;
11034                   default:
11035                         // Start talking!
11036                         return( InitiateConversation( pTSoldier, pSoldier, NPC_INITIAL_QUOTE, 0 ) );
11037                         break;
11038             }
11039       }
11040       else
11041       {
11042             // Start talking with hostile NPC
11043             return( InitiateConversation( pTSoldier, pSoldier, APPROACH_ENEMY_NPC_QUOTE, 0 ) );
11044       }
11045 
11046       return( TRUE );
11047 }
11048 
11049 
11050 BOOLEAN IsValidSecondHandShot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11051 {
11052       if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[ SECONDHANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN && 
11053                    !(Item[ pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS ].usItem ].twohanded ) &&
11054                    !pSoldier->bDoBurst && 
11055                    !Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].grenadelauncher &&
11056                    Item[ pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN &&
11057                    pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].bGunStatus >= USABLE &&
11058                    pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].ubGunShotsLeft > 0 )
11059       {
11060             return( TRUE );
11061       }
11062 
11063       return( FALSE );
11064 }
11065 
11066 BOOLEAN IsValidSecondHandShotForReloadingPurposes( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11067 {
11068       // should be maintained as same as function above with line
11069       // about ammo taken out!
11070       if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[ SECONDHANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN && 
11071                    !pSoldier->bDoBurst && 
11072                    !Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].grenadelauncher &&
11073                    Item[ pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN &&
11074                    pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].bGunStatus >= USABLE //&&
11075 //                 pSoldier->inv[SECONDHANDPOS].ubGunShotsLeft > 0 &&
11076 //                 gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_PRONE )
11077                   )
11078       {
11079             return( TRUE );
11080       }
11081 
11082       return( FALSE );
11083 }
11084 
11085 
11086 
11087 BOOLEAN CanRobotBeControlled( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11088 {
11089       SOLDIERTYPE *pController;
11090       
11091       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT ) )
11092       {
11093             return( FALSE );
11094       }
11095 
11096       if ( pSoldier->ubRobotRemoteHolderID == NOBODY )
11097       {
11098             return( FALSE );
11099       }
11100 
11101       pController = MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubRobotRemoteHolderID ];
11102 
11103       if ( pController->bActive )
11104       {
11105             if ( ControllingRobot( pController ) )
11106             {
11107                   // ALL'S OK!
11108                   return( TRUE );
11109             }
11110       }
11111 
11112       return( FALSE );
11113 }
11114 
11115 
11116 BOOLEAN ControllingRobot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11117 {
11118       SOLDIERTYPE *pRobot;
11119       INT8                    bPos;
11120 
11121       if ( !pSoldier->bActive )
11122       {
11123             return( FALSE );
11124       }
11125 
11126       // EPCs can't control the robot (no inventory to hold remote, for one)
11127       if ( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
11128       {
11129             return( FALSE );
11130       }
11131 
11132       // Don't require pSoldier->bInSector here, it must work from mapscreen!
11133 
11134       // are we in ok shape?
11135       if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE || ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum ) )
11136       {
11137             return( FALSE );
11138       }
11139 
11140       // allow control from within vehicles - allows strategic travel in a vehicle with robot!
11141       if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY ) && ( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE ) )
11142       {
11143             return( FALSE );
11144       }
11145 
11146       // is the soldier wearing a robot remote control?
11147       bPos = FindRemoteControl( pSoldier );
11148       if ( bPos == NO_SLOT )
11149       {
11150             return( FALSE );
11151       }
11152 
11153       // Find the robot
11154       pRobot = FindSoldierByProfileID( ROBOT, TRUE );
11155       if ( !pRobot )
11156       {
11157             return( FALSE );
11158       }
11159 
11160       if ( pRobot->bActive )
11161       {
11162             // Are we in the same sector....?
11163             // ARM: CHANGED TO WORK IN MAPSCREEN, DON'T USE WorldSector HERE
11164             if ( pRobot->sSectorX == pSoldier->sSectorX &&
11165                          pRobot->sSectorY == pSoldier->sSectorY &&
11166                          pRobot->bSectorZ == pSoldier->bSectorZ )
11167             {
11168                   // they have to be either both in sector, or both on the road
11169                   if ( pRobot->fBetweenSectors == pSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
11170                   {
11171                         // if they're on the road...
11172                         if ( pRobot->fBetweenSectors )
11173                         {
11174                               // they have to be in the same squad or vehicle
11175                               if ( pRobot->bAssignment != pSoldier->bAssignment )
11176                               {
11177                                     return( FALSE );
11178                               }
11179 
11180                               // if in a vehicle, must be the same vehicle
11181                               if ( pRobot->bAssignment == VEHICLE && ( pRobot->iVehicleId != pSoldier->iVehicleId ) )
11182                               {
11183                                     return( FALSE );
11184                               }
11185                         }
11186 
11187                         // all OK!
11188                         return( TRUE );
11189                   }
11190             }
11191       }
11192 
11193       return( FALSE );
11194 }
11195 
11196 
11197 SOLDIERTYPE *GetRobotController( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11198 {
11199       if ( pSoldier->ubRobotRemoteHolderID == NOBODY )
11200       {
11201             return( NULL );
11202       }
11203       else
11204       {
11205             return( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubRobotRemoteHolderID ] );
11206       }
11207 }
11208 
11209 void UpdateRobotControllerGivenRobot( SOLDIERTYPE *pRobot )
11210 {
11211       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
11212       INT32 cnt = 0;
11213 
11214       // Loop through guys and look for a controller!
11215 
11216       // set up soldier ptr as first element in mercptrs list
11217       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;   
11218 
11219       // run through list
11220       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pTeamSoldier++)
11221       {
11222             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive )
11223             {
11224                   if ( ControllingRobot( pTeamSoldier ) )
11225                   {
11226                     pRobot->ubRobotRemoteHolderID = pTeamSoldier->ubID;
11227                         return;
11228                   }
11229             }
11230       }
11231 
11232       pRobot->ubRobotRemoteHolderID = NOBODY;
11233 }
11234 
11235 
11236 void UpdateRobotControllerGivenController( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11237 {
11238       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
11239       INT32 cnt = 0;
11240 
11241       // First see if are still controlling the robot
11242       if ( !ControllingRobot( pSoldier ) )
11243       {
11244             return;
11245       }
11246       
11247       // set up soldier ptr as first element in mercptrs list
11248       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;   
11249 
11250       // Loop through guys to find the robot....
11251       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pTeamSoldier++)
11252       {
11253             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && ( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT ) )
11254             {
11255                   pTeamSoldier->ubRobotRemoteHolderID = pSoldier->ubID;
11256             }
11257       }
11258 }
11259 
11260 
11261 void HandleSoldierTakeDamageFeedback( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11262 {
11263       // Do sound.....
11264       // if ( pSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
11265       {
11266     // ATE: Limit how often we grunt...
11267     if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - pSoldier->uiTimeSinceLastBleedGrunt ) > 1000 )
11268     {
11269       pSoldier->uiTimeSinceLastBleedGrunt = GetJA2Clock( );
11270 
11271               DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_HIT1 + Random( 2 ) ) );
11272     }
11273       }
11274 
11275       // Flash portrait....
11276       pSoldier->fFlashPortrait = TRUE;
11277       pSoldier->bFlashPortraitFrame = FLASH_PORTRAIT_STARTSHADE;
11278       RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->PortraitFlashCounter, FLASH_PORTRAIT_DELAY );
11279 }
11280 
11281 
11282 void HandleSystemNewAISituation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fResetABC )
11283 {
11284       // Are we an AI guy?
11285       if ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam != gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
11286       {
11287             if ( pSoldier->bNewSituation == IS_NEW_SITUATION )
11288             {
11289                   // Cancel what they were doing....
11290                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation  = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
11291                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation2 = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
11292                   pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = FALSE;
11293                   pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = NO_PENDING_DIRECTION;
11294                   pSoldier->ubPendingAction            = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
11295                   pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode     = 0;
11296 
11297                   // if this guy isn't under direct AI control, WHO GIVES A FLYING FLICK?
11298                   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_UNDERAICONTROL )
11299                   {
11300         if ( pSoldier->fTurningToShoot )
11301         {
11302                       pSoldier->fTurningToShoot = FALSE;
11303                       // Release attacker             
11304                       // OK - this is hightly annoying , but due to the huge combinations of
11305                       // things that can happen - 1 of them is that sLastTarget will get unset
11306                       // after turn is done - so set flag here to tell it not to...
11307                       pSoldier->fDontUnsetLastTargetFromTurn = TRUE;                    
11308                       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Reducing attacker busy count..., ending fire because saw something: DONE IN SYSTEM NEW SITUATION") );
11309                       ReduceAttackBusyCount( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
11310         }
11311 
11312             if ( pSoldier->pTempObject != NULL )
11313             {
11314                   // Place it back into inv....
11315                   AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, pSoldier->pTempObject, FALSE );
11316                   MemFree( pSoldier->pTempObject );
11317                   pSoldier->pTempObject                           = NULL;
11318                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation  = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
11319                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation2 = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
11320 
11321                   // Decrement attack counter...
11322                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Reducing attacker busy count..., ending throw because saw something: DONE IN SYSTEM NEW SITUATION") );
11323                   ReduceAttackBusyCount( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
11324             }
11325 
11326                   }
11327             }
11328       }
11329 }
11330 
11331 void InternalPlaySoldierFootstepSound( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
11332 {
11333       UINT8                         ubRandomSnd;
11334       INT8                          bVolume = MIDVOLUME;
11335       // Assume outside
11336       UINT32                              ubSoundBase = WALK_LEFT_OUT;
11337       UINT8                         ubRandomMax = 4;
11338 
11339       // Determine if we are on the floor
11340       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
11341       {
11342             if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == HOPFENCE )
11343             {
11344                   bVolume = HIGHVOLUME;
11345             }
11346 
11347         if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
11348         {
11349                   PlaySoldierJA2Sample( pSoldier->ubID, ROBOT_BEEP, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( bVolume, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ), TRUE );                
11350       return;
11351     }
11352 
11353             //if ( SoldierOnScreen( pSoldier->ubID ) )
11354             {
11355                   if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == CRAWLING )
11356                   {
11357                         ubSoundBase = CRAWL_1;
11358                   }
11359                   else
11360                   {
11361                         // Pick base based on terrain over....
11362                         if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == FLAT_FLOOR )
11363                         {
11364                               ubSoundBase = WALK_LEFT_IN;
11365                         }
11366                         else if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DIRT_ROAD || pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == PAVED_ROAD )
11367                         {
11368                               ubSoundBase = WALK_LEFT_ROAD;
11369                         }
11370                         else if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == LOW_WATER || pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == MED_WATER )
11371                         {
11372                               ubSoundBase = WATER_WALK1_IN;
11373                               ubRandomMax = 2;
11374                         }
11375                         else if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
11376                         {
11377                               ubSoundBase = SWIM_1;
11378                               ubRandomMax = 2;
11379                         }
11380                   }
11381 
11382                   // Pick a random sound...
11383                   do
11384                   {
11385                         ubRandomSnd = (UINT8)Random( ubRandomMax );
11386 
11387                   } while ( ubRandomSnd == pSoldier->ubLastFootPrintSound );
11388 
11389                   pSoldier->ubLastFootPrintSound = ubRandomSnd;
11390 
11391                   // OK, if in realtime, don't play at full volume, because too many people walking around
11392                   // sounds don't sound good - ( unless we are the selected guy, then always play at reg volume )
11393                   if ( ! ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ( pSoldier->ubID != gusSelectedSoldier ) )
11394                   {
11395                         bVolume = LOWVOLUME;
11396                   }
11397 
11398                   PlaySoldierJA2Sample( pSoldier->ubID, ubSoundBase + pSoldier->ubLastFootPrintSound, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( bVolume, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ), TRUE );                  
11399             }
11400       }
11401 }
11402 
11403 void PlaySoldierFootstepSound( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11404 {
11405       // normally, not in stealth mode
11406       if ( !pSoldier->bStealthMode )
11407       {
11408             InternalPlaySoldierFootstepSound( pSoldier );
11409       }
11410 }
11411 
11412 void PlayStealthySoldierFootstepSound( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11413 {
11414       // even if in stealth mode
11415       InternalPlaySoldierFootstepSound( pSoldier );
11416 }
11417 
11418 
11419 
11420 void CrowsFlyAway( UINT8 ubTeam )
11421 {
11422       UINT32                        cnt;
11423       SOLDIERTYPE       *pTeamSoldier;
11424 
11425       for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeam ].bFirstID, pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeam ].bLastID; cnt++, pTeamSoldier++ )
11426       {
11427             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
11428             {
11429                   if ( pTeamSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW && pTeamSoldier->usAnimState != CROW_FLY )
11430                   {
11431                         // fly away even if not seen!
11432                         HandleCrowFlyAway( pTeamSoldier );
11433                   }
11434             }
11435       }
11436 }
11437 
11438 
11439 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
11440 void DebugValidateSoldierData( )
11441 {
11442       UINT32 cnt;
11443       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
11444       CHAR16 sString[ 1024 ];
11445       BOOLEAN fProblemDetected = FALSE;
11446       static UINT32 uiFrameCount = 0;
11447 
11448 
11449       // this function is too slow to run every frame, so do the check only every 50 frames
11450       if ( uiFrameCount++ < 50 )
11451       {
11452             return;
11453       }
11454 
11455       // reset frame counter
11456       uiFrameCount = 0;
11457 
11458 
11459       // Loop through our team...
11460       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
11461       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
11462       {     
11463             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
11464             {
11465                   // OK, first check for alive people
11466                   // Don't do this check if we are a vehicle...
11467                   if ( pSoldier->bLife > 0  && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
11468                   {
11469                         // Alive -- now check for proper group IDs
11470                         if ( pSoldier->ubGroupID == 0 && pSoldier->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT && pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_DRIVER | SOLDIER_PASSENGER ) ) )
11471                         {
11472                               // This is bad!
11473                               swprintf( sString, L"Soldier Data Error: Soldier %d is alive but has a zero group ID.", cnt );
11474                               fProblemDetected = TRUE;
11475                         }
11476                         else if ( ( pSoldier->ubGroupID != 0 ) && ( GetGroup( pSoldier->ubGroupID ) == NULL ) )
11477                         {
11478                               // This is bad!
11479                               swprintf( sString, L"Soldier Data Error: Soldier %d has an invalid group ID of %d.", cnt, pSoldier->ubGroupID );
11480                               fProblemDetected = TRUE;
11481                         }
11482                   }
11483                   else
11484                   {
11485                         if ( pSoldier->ubGroupID != 0 && ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
11486                         {
11487                               // Dead guys should have 0 group IDs
11488                               //swprintf( sString, L"GroupID Error: Soldier %d is dead but has a non-zero group ID.", cnt );
11489                               //fProblemDetected = TRUE;
11490                         }
11491                   }
11492 
11493                   // check for invalid sector data
11494                   if ( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT ) &&
11495                                ( ( pSoldier->sSectorX <= 0 ) || ( pSoldier->sSectorX >= 17 ) ||
11496                                      ( pSoldier->sSectorY <= 0 ) || ( pSoldier->sSectorY >= 17 ) ||
11497                                      ( pSoldier->bSectorZ  < 0 ) || ( pSoldier->bSectorZ >   3 ) ) )
11498                   {
11499                         swprintf( sString, L"Soldier Data Error: Soldier %d is located at %d/%d/%d.", cnt, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
11500                         fProblemDetected = TRUE;
11501                   }
11502             }
11503 
11504             if ( fProblemDetected )
11505             {
11506                   SAIReportError( sString );
11507 /*
11508                   if ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
11509                         DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, sString, MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, MapScreenDefaultOkBoxCallback );
11510                   else
11511                         DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, sString, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
11512 */
11513                   break;
11514             }
11515       }
11516 
11517 
11518       // also do this
11519       ValidatePlayersAreInOneGroupOnly();
11520 }
11521 #endif
11522 
11523 
11524 
11525 void BeginTyingToFall( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11526 {
11527       pSoldier->bStartFallDir = pSoldier->bDirection;
11528       pSoldier->fTryingToFall = TRUE;
11529 
11530   // Randomize direction 
11531   if ( Random( 50 ) < 25 )
11532   {
11533     pSoldier->fFallClockwise = TRUE;
11534   }
11535   else
11536   {
11537     pSoldier->fFallClockwise = FALSE;
11538   }
11539 }
11540 
11541 void SetSoldierAsUnderAiControl( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldierToSet )
11542 {
11543       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier=NULL;
11544       INT32 cnt;
11545 
11546       if ( pSoldierToSet == NULL )
11547       {
11548             return;
11549       }
11550 
11551       // Loop through ALL teams...
11552       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
11553       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ LAST_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
11554       {     
11555             if( pSoldier->bActive )
11556             {
11557                   pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= ~SOLDIER_UNDERAICONTROL;
11558             }
11559       }
11560 
11561       pSoldierToSet->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_UNDERAICONTROL;
11562 }
11563 
11564 void HandlePlayerTogglingLightEffects( BOOLEAN fToggleValue )
11565 {
11566       if( fToggleValue )
11567       {
11568             //Toggle light status
11569             if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MERC_CASTS_LIGHT ] )
11570                   gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MERC_CASTS_LIGHT ] = FALSE;
11571             else
11572                   gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MERC_CASTS_LIGHT ] = TRUE;
11573       }
11574 
11575       //Update all the mercs in the sector
11576       EnableDisableSoldierLightEffects( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MERC_CASTS_LIGHT ] );
11577 
11578       SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
11579 }
11580 
11581 
11582 void EnableDisableSoldierLightEffects( BOOLEAN fEnableLights )
11583 {
11584       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier=NULL;
11585       INT32 cnt;
11586 
11587       // Loop through player teams...
11588       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
11589       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
11590       {
11591             //if the soldier is in the sector
11592             if( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
11593             {
11594                   //if we are to enable the lights
11595                   if( fEnableLights )
11596                   {
11597                         //Add the light around the merc
11598                         PositionSoldierLight( pSoldier );               
11599                   }
11600                   else
11601                   {
11602                         //Delete the fake light the merc casts
11603                         DeleteSoldierLight( pSoldier );
11604 
11605                         //Light up the merc though
11606                         SetSoldierPersonalLightLevel( pSoldier );
11607                   }
11608             }
11609       }
11610 }
11611 
11612 void SetSoldierPersonalLightLevel( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
11613 {
11614       if( pSoldier == NULL )
11615       {
11616             return;
11617       }
11618 
11619       if( pSoldier->sGridNo == NOWHERE )
11620       {
11621             return;
11622       }
11623 
11624       //THe light level for the soldier
11625       gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubShadeLevel = 3;
11626       gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubSumLights = 5;
11627       gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubMaxLights = 5;
11628       gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pMercHead->ubNaturalShadeLevel = 5;
11629 }
